title_en: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Eye Refreshing Gel Cream 15 ml - Instant Hydration for Refreshed Eyes

description_en:
Product Description:
Hydration is the foundation of healthy-looking skin. Factors like lack of sleep, stress, and insufficient water intake can lead to dehydrated, dull, and tired-looking skin and eyes. Introducing **Neutrogena Hydro Boost Eye Refreshing Gel Cream**, a refreshing shot of hydration that works in three ways to combat tired-looking eyes. Formulated with a hyaluronic gel matrix, **Neutrogena Hydro Boost Eye Refreshing Gel Cream** boosts hydration and strengthens the skin barrier around the delicate under-eye area. Its lightweight, quick-absorbing formula helps fade away signs of tired eyes while instantly sinking into the skin to smoothly prepare it for makeup. It locks in moisture for 24 hours, helping to prevent loss of suppleness and keeping your eyes looking fresh every day. Achieve intense hydration with **Neutrogena Hydro Boost Eye Refreshing Gel Cream**!

â­ Intensely hydrating and long-lasting.
â­ Lightweight and fast-absorbing formula.
â­ 100% oil-free and alcohol-free.
â­ Non-comedogenic and suitable for all skin types.
â­ Dermatologist tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Neutrogena Hydro Boost Eye Refreshing Gel Cream**
â­ Apply sparingly with fingertips, starting from the top of your cheekbone and circling around your eyes.
â­ Suitable for sensitive skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Neutrogena Hydro Boost Eye Refreshing Gel Cream**
â­ Aqua, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Cetearyl Olivate, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Polyacrylamide, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Sorbitan Olivate, Dimethiconol, Laureth-7, C12-14 Pareth-12, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Carbomer, Synthetic Beeswax, Sodium Hydroxide, Benzoic Acid, Chlorphenesin, Methylparaben, Phenoxyethanol.

#Neutrogena #HydroBoost #EyeCream #SkinHydration #Skincare #SaudiBeauty #HealthySkin #BeautyProducts #EyeCare #DeepHydration

title_en: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Triple Micellar Water Face & Eye 400ml
title_ar: Ù†ÙŠÙˆØªØ±ÙˆØ¬ÙŠÙ†Ø§ Ù‡ÙŠØ¯Ø±ÙˆØ¨ÙˆØ³Øª Ù…Ø§Ø¡ Ù…ÙŠØ³ÙŠÙ„Ø§Ø± Ù…Ù†Ø¸Ù 400 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
**Neutrogena Hydro Boost Triple Micellar Water Face & Eye 400ml**: Don't just moisturize, hydrate! Hydration is the foundation of healthy-looking skin. **Neutrogena Hydro Boost Triple Micellar Water Face & Eye 400ml** helps replenish and nourish your skin, providing a much-needed boost of vital hydration to combat tiredness and dullness caused by daily factors. This unique cleanser gently removes makeup and impurities, even waterproof mascara and lip color, thanks to its innovative formula combining hyaluronic acid and triple micellar molecules. It also protects your skin's natural moisture barrier, leaving it supple and visibly radiant. Make **Neutrogena Hydro Boost Triple Micellar Water Face & Eye 400ml** an essential part of your daily skincare routine for vibrantly hydrated and dewy skin.

â­ Gently removes makeup and impurities.
â­ Provides intense skin hydration.
â­ Contains Hyaluronic Acid for skin renewal.
â­ Effective against waterproof makeup.
â­ Protects the skin's natural moisture barrier.
â­ Suitable for sensitive skin.
â­ Paraben-free.
â­ Dermatologist tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Neutrogena Hydro Boost Triple Micellar Water Face & Eye 400ml**
â­ Apply the cleanser to a cotton pad and gently sweep over face and eyes.
â­ No rinsing required after use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Neutrogena Hydro Boost Triple Micellar Water Face & Eye 400ml**
â­ Aqua
â­ PEG-6 Caprylic/Capric Glycerides
â­ Polysorbate 20
â­ Butylene Glycol
â­ PEG-8
â­ Sodium Hyaluronate
â­ Poloxamer 407
â­ Disodium EDTA
â­ Citric Acid
â­ BHT
â­ Sodium Benzoate
â­ Parfum

#Neutrogena #HydroBoost #MicellarWater #Skincare #SkinHydration #MakeupRemover #HealthySkin #WaterproofMakeup #SaudiBeauty #Beauty

description_en:
Discover clearer skin with **Neutrogena Spot Controlling+ Facial Wash 200ml**. This facial wash is formulated with a powerful combination of AHA (glycolic acid), BHA (salicylic acid), and PHA (gluconolactone). It features Salicylic Acid, a purifying agent known to help prevent breakouts. Powered by a 4% AHA/PHA blend, it includes 2% Glycolic Acid, a micro-exfoliator that helps fade post-acne marks, and 2% Gluconolactone, a resurfacing agent to refine skin texture.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Neutrogena Spot Controlling+ Facial Wash 200ml**:
â­ Wet your face.
â­ Apply to hands, add water, and gently massage your face.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ Start with one application daily, then increase to two if desired.
â­ If dryness or peeling occurs, reduce application to once a day or every other day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Neutrogena Spot Controlling+ Facial Wash 200ml**:
â­ Aqua
â­ Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate
â­ Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine
â­ Sorbitol
â­ Glycolic Acid
â­ Gluconolactone
â­ Sodium Hydroxide
â­ Salicylic Acid
â­ Sodium Lauryl Sulfate
â­ Sodium Chloride

description_en:
Introducing **Neutrogena Retinol Boost Night Cream 50 ML**, your ultimate solution to combat visible signs of aging and enhance your skin's youthful appearance. Dermatologist-developed, this cream works to reduce the appearance of wrinkles, dryness, and age spots, while improving skin firmness and radiance. Its lightweight, fast-absorbing formula leaves no greasy residue, allowing pure retinol to penetrate deeply to fight aging signs and improve overall skin appearance. Enjoy visibly younger and healthier-looking skin in just one week.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Neutrogena Retinol Boost Night Cream 50 ML**

â­ Every evening, apply 2 pumps of cream onto your palms.
â­ Gently massage over face and neck.
â­ Turn the pump to the â€œclosedâ€ position when not in use.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes.
â­ Use sunscreen the morning after, as retinol may increase sun sensitivity.
â­ You may experience redness, a warm, tingling sensation, or flaking in the first few days; these are normal, temporary indications that the formula is working. If effects cause discomfort, limit use to once every other day until your skin adjusts.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Neutrogena Retinol Boost Night Cream 50 ML**

â­ Pure Retinol: Scientifically proven to increase collagen production and promote renewal of surface skin cells.
â­ Myrthus Plant Extract: Known for its skin-regenerating benefits.
â­ Hyaluronic Acid: Provides intense hydration and plumping moisture.

#Neutrogena #Retinol #NightCream #AntiAging #Skincare #HealthySkin #YouthfulSkin #SaudiArabia #Hydration #Beauty

title_ar: Ù†ÙŠØªØ±ÙˆØ¬ÙŠÙ†Ø§ Ù…Ù‚Ø´Ø± Ø§Ù„Ø±Ø¤ÙˆØ³ Ø§Ù„Ø³ÙˆØ¯Ø§Ø¡ Ø§Ù„ÙŠÙˆÙ…ÙŠ 150 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Achieve a refined complexion with the **Neutrogena** Daily Blackhead Eliminating Scrub, your ultimate solution for clear, blemish-free skin. This scrub features a clinically-proven formula with purifying salicylic acid, designed to eliminate and prevent blackheads from day one. Powered by natural cellulose exfoliators, **Neutrogena Blackhead Eliminating Scrub** works deep within pores to unclog them by removing trapped dirt and excess oil, while minimizing pore appearance without over-drying. Reveal clearer, smoother skin with daily use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Neutrogena Blackhead Eliminating Scrub**:
â­ Apply daily, morning and evening.
â­ Dispense a small amount into your palm.
â­ Gently massage onto a wet face, focusing on blackhead-prone areas.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Neutrogena Blackhead Eliminating Scrub**:
â­ Clinically proven formula with purifying Salicylic acid.
â­ Natural cellulose exfoliators.
â­ Unclogs pores without over-drying.
â­ Removes trapped dirt and excess oil.
â­ Minimizes the appearance of pores.
â­ Suitable for everyday use.
â­ For a refined, blackhead-prone complexion.
â­ Free from sulphates and mineral oil.
â­ Dermatologist tested.

#Neutrogena #BlackheadScrub #Skincare #ClearSkin #PoreMinimizer #SaudiBeauty #SkinHealth #BeautyProducts #DailyScrub #BlackheadTreatment

Experience a fresh and clean complexion with **Neutrogena Makeup Remover Wipes Deep Clean**. These ultra-soft, oil-free wipes are infused with a light cleansing lotion to effectively and gently remove all types of makeup, dirt, and oil, including waterproof mascara, without leaving any greasy residue. Achieve perfectly clean, clear, and radiant skin in one simple step â€“ no rinsing needed!

description_en:
Experience a burst of freshness with **Neutrogena Deep Clean Invigorating Daily Scrub**. This unique, gentle formula cleanses deep into your pores, purifying your skin and leaving it feeling refreshed, invigorated, and beautifully clean. 

â­ Cleanses deep into pores and purifies skin.
â­ Leaves skin feeling refreshed, invigorated, and beautifully clean.
â­ Enriched with a cooling mint gel formula and natural exfoliating microbeads.
â­ Sweeps away pore-clogging dead skin cells, impurities, oil, and traces of makeup.
â­ Gentle enough for daily use.
â­ Suitable for normal to combination skin types.
â­ Dermatologist tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Neutrogena Deep Clean Invigorating Daily Scrub**:
â­ Wet your face and apply the scrub, massaging gently, avoiding the eye area.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Neutrogena Deep Clean Invigorating Daily Scrub**:
â­ Aqua, Glycerin, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Lauryl Glucoside, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Sodium Benzotriazolyl Butylphenol Sulfonate, Menthol, Synthetic Wax, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Hydroxide, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Parfum, CI 77007, CI 42090.

#Neutrogena #FaceWash #SkinScrub #Skincare #HealthySkin #DeepClean #InvigoratingSkin #Moisturizing #SaudiBeauty #DailyCare

description_en:
Reveal your clearest, most refreshed complexion with **Neutrogena Fresh & Clear Daily Exfoliator**. This invigorating, oil-free daily facial scrub, infused with pink grapefruit and Vitamin C, gently buffs away dead skin cells to purify and reveal a healthy-looking, silky-smooth finish.

â­ Gently exfoliates and removes dead skin cells.
â­ Reveals a healthy-looking, silky-smooth complexion.
â­ Deeply cleanses to prevent imperfections without over-drying.
â­ Ideal for blemish-prone skin.
â­ Oil-free and suitable for everyday use.
â­ Dermatologist tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Neutrogena Fresh & Clear Daily Exfoliator**:
â­ Gently massage the scrub onto your wet face once daily.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Neutrogena Fresh & Clear Daily Exfoliator**:
â­ Contains pink grapefruit and Vitamin C.
â­ Features natural exfoliators.

description_en:
Rediscover your skin's youthful vitality with **Neutrogena Retinol Boost Serum 30 ML**. Developed by dermatologists, this advanced serum combats visible signs of aging, promoting firmer, more radiant skin by reducing the appearance of wrinkles, dryness, and age spots.

Its silky, lightweight formula delivers Pure Retinol deep into the skin's surface to fight multiple signs of aging, visibly improving skin health and youthfulness in just one week.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Neutrogena Retinol Boost Serum 30 ML**:
â­ Apply 2 pumps of serum onto palms.
â­ Gently massage over face and neck.
â­ Use once daily.

Avoid contact with eyes. Mild redness, warmth, or tingling are normal, temporary signs of the formula working. If discomfort occurs, limit use to once every other day until skin adjusts, or discontinue use if effects persist.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Neutrogena Retinol Boost Serum 30 ML**:
â­ Pure Retinol: Proven to boost collagen production and promote skin cell renewal.
â­ Myrthus Plant Extract: Known for its skin-regenerating benefits.
â­ Hyaluronic Acid: Provides deep hydration and plumping moisture.

description_en:
Discover the power of balance with **Neutrogena Oil Balancing Facial Wash**. This innovative daily gel cleanser is specially formulated to purify your skin and rebalance excess oil for a lasting mattifying effect. With its natural cleanser lime and soothing aloe vera, **Neutrogena Oil Balancing Facial Wash** deeply cleanses to unclog pores and remove excess oil, leaving your complexion flawless and beautifully mattified.

**Features & Benefits:**
â­ Contains natural cleanser Lime.
â­ Leaves skin looking flawless and mattified.
â­ Cleanses and removes excess oil for a mattifying effect.
â­ Oil-free.
â­ Suitable for everyday use.
â­ For oily skin.
â­ Dermatologist tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Neutrogena Oil Balancing Facial Wash**:
â­ Use daily in the morning and evening.
â­ Massage onto wet face.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Neutrogena Oil Balancing Facial Wash**:
â­ Aqua, Glycerin, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cellulose, Lauryl Glucoside, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Citrus Aurantifolia Juice, Propylene Gylcol, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Sulfite, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Parfum, CI 15985, CI 42090.

#Neutrogena #FacialWash #SkinCare #OilySkin #OilControl #FaceCleanser #BeautyProducts #SaudiArabia #SkincareRoutine #HealthySkin

title_en: Neutrogena Retinol Boost Eye Cream 15 ML
title_ar: Ù†ÙŠÙˆØªØ±ÙˆØ¬ÙŠÙ†Ø§ Ø±ÙŠØªÙŠÙ†ÙˆÙ„ Ø¨ÙˆØ³Øª ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ø§Ù„Ø¹ÙŠÙ† 15 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Discover the secret to timeless beauty with **Neutrogena Retinol Boost Eye Cream 15 ML**. Expertly developed by dermatologists, this cream combats visible signs of aging by improving skin tone and texture, and significantly reducing the appearance of fine lines and crow's feet around the eyes.

Its concentrated formula allows pure retinol to penetrate deeply into the delicate eye area, effectively enhancing its appearance. Clinical studies have proven the efficacy of **Neutrogena Retinol Boost Eye Cream 15 ML** in nourishing and smoothing skin, fading the look of fine lines and stubborn crow's feet, while brightening and evening out the under-eye area. This cream has delivered noticeable results for 100% of testers.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Neutrogena Retinol Boost Eye Cream 15 ML**:
â­ Once daily, apply three small dots to the under-eye area.
â­ Gently pat around the eye contour, avoiding direct contact with eyes.
â­ In the following morning, use sunscreen as retinol can increase sun sensitivity.
â­ You may experience redness, peeling, or a warming/tingling sensation in the initial days; these are normal, temporary signs of the formula's efficacy. If discomfort occurs, reduce usage to every other day until your skin adapts, or discontinue use if effects persist.
â­ For new retinol users, gradually introduce it by using it 2-3 times a week for the first three weeks, then increase to daily evening application.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Neutrogena Retinol Boost Eye Cream 15 ML**:
â­ Pure Retinol: Scientifically proven to boost collagen production and promote surface skin cell renewal.
â­ Myrthus Plant Extract: Known for its skin-regenerating benefits.
â­ Hyaluronic Acid: Provides intense hydration and plumping moisture.

#Neutrogena #EyeCream #Retinol #AntiAging #Skincare #Beauty #Hydration #SkinRenewal #SaudiArabia #HealthySkin

title_ar: Ù†ÙŠØªØ±ÙˆØ¬ÙŠÙ†Ø§ ØºØ³ÙˆÙ„ Ùˆ Ù‚Ù†Ø§Ø¹ ÙÙŠØ²ÙŠØ¨Ù„ÙŠ ÙƒÙ„ÙŠØ± (2*1) 150 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Discover the dual power of **Neutrogena Spot Controlling Oil-free Wash Mask**, your ultimate solution for blemish-prone skin. This clinically-proven, oil-free formula, boosted with Salicylic Acid, works to tackle stubborn spots and help prevent future breakouts. With the effective Kaolin White Clay, **Neutrogena Spot Controlling Oil-free Wash Mask** deeply cleanses your skin to remove impurities while respecting the skin's natural barrier, leaving you with clear and refined skin.

â­ Clinically proven oil-free formula to tackle stubborn spots.
â­ Contains Kaolin White Clay to absorb excess oil and impurities.
â­ Deeply cleanses the skin without stripping it.
â­ Helps defend against future breakouts.
â­ Ideal for stubborn spots and breakout-prone skin.
â­ Dermatologist tested for efficacy and safety.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Neutrogena Spot Controlling Oil-free Wash Mask**
â­ As a wash: Use morning and evening. Gently massage onto a wet face to work into a foamy lather, avoiding the delicate eye area. Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Neutrogena Spot Controlling Oil-free Wash Mask**
â­ Aqua, Glycerin, Kaolin, Bentonite, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, CI 77891, Trideceth-9, C12-15 Alkyl Lactate, Salicylic Acid, Cetyl Lactate, Cocamidopropyl PG-Dimonium Chloride Phosphate, Menthol, Cetyl Alcohol, PEG-5 Ethylhexanoatel, Sodium Chloride, Xanthan Gum, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Hydroxide, Chlorphenesin, Benzalkonium Chloride, Parfum.

#Neutrogena #FaceWash #Skincare #HealthySkin #AcneTreatment #ClearSkin #SaudiArabia #Jeddah #Riyadh #Beauty

description_en:
Achieve a refreshed and radiant complexion with **Neutrogena Bright Boost Gel Cream 50ml**. This lightweight, non-greasy gel cream is your skin's fresh start! Powered by Neoglucosamine, a prestige ingredient scientifically proven to boost skin brightness, smoothness, and evenness, revealing a healthier, more luminous you.

â­ Scientifically proven formula for skin renewal.
â­ Lightweight and fast-absorbing gel texture.
â­ Formulated with prestige ingredient Neoglucosamine for enhanced radiance.
â­ Reduces the appearance of dark spots, uneven skin tone, and fine lines.
â­ Non-comedogenic formula.
â­ Suitable for all skin tones and types.
â­ Developed with Dermatologists.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Neutrogena Bright Boost Gel Cream 50ml**
â­ Apply daily to cleansed face and neck.
â­ Smooth in with massaging strokes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Neutrogena Bright Boost Gel Cream 50ml**
â­ Aqua, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Mandelic Acid, Gluconolactone, Acetyl Glucosamine, Triethyl Citrate, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Butylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Squalane, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Dimethiconol, Mica, Silica, Tin Oxide, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Sorbitan Isostearate, Polysorbate 60, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Coco-Glucoside, t-Butyl Alcohol, Succinoglycan, Disodium Edta, Sodium Hydroxide, Chlorphenesin, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Ci 77891, Ci 16035.

description_en:
Experience the calming power of turmeric with **Neutrogena Soothing Clear Mousse Cleanser**. Specially formulated for stressed, spot-prone skin, this gentle mousse cleanser effectively cleanses and soothes. Enriched with skin-friendly turmeric, celebrated for its antioxidant and calming properties, this rich cleanser removes pore-clogging dirt, oil, and makeup without stripping the skin. Ideal for sensitive, spot-prone, combination, or dehydrated skin, its oil-free formula rinses clean, leaving your skin feeling soft and looking healthy. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Neutrogena Soothing Clear Mousse Cleanser**:
â­ Wet your face.
â­ Pump cleanser into hands and gently massage onto face.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ Use up to twice daily.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Neutrogena Soothing Clear Mousse Cleanser**:
â­ Aqua
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Glycerin
â­ Decyl Glucoside
â­ Curcuma Longa Extract (Turmeric)
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate
â­ And other active ingredients.

#Neutrogena #TurmericCleanser #Skincare #HealthySkin #SensitiveSkin #AcneProneSkin #SkinHydration #SaudiBeauty #GlowingSkin #FacialCleanser

description_en:
Achieve healthy, radiant skin with **Neutrogena Soothing Clear Turmeric Moisturizer**. This oil-free, lightweight formula instantly hydrates to soothe stressed, spot-prone skin. It effectively absorbs pore-clogging oils that can lead to breakouts, helping to prevent acne. Enriched with skin-friendly Turmeric extract, it delivers deep hydration, leaving your skin feeling nourished, soft, and healthy without any sticky residue. Dermatologist-tested and suitable for sensitive, spot-prone, combination, or even dry skin, it's your go-to for a calm and clear complexion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Neutrogena Soothing Clear Turmeric Moisturizer**
â­ Start with a clean face.
â­ Squeeze an appropriate amount of moisturizer onto your fingertips.
â­ Smooth it all over your face, avoiding the eye area.
â­ Enjoy all-day hydrated and protected skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Neutrogena Soothing Clear Turmeric Moisturizer**
â­ Advanced formula with Turmeric extract for skin nourishment and calming.
â­ Made without mineral oil, ensuring a non-comedogenic finish.
â­ Quick-absorbing water gel texture for a smooth, non-greasy feel.
â­ Dermatologist-tested, ideal for sensitive and spot-prone skin.
â­ Key Ingredients: Aqua, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Curcuma Longa Extract, Zea Mays Starch, Ethylhexylglycerin, Panthenol.

#Neutrogena #TurmericCream #SkinMoisturizer #Skincare #HealthySkin #AcneTreatment #BeautyProducts #SaudiArabia #SkinHydration #GlowingSkin

description_en:
Experience the powerful efficacy of **Neutrogena Spot Controlling Facial Scrub**, an oil-free exfoliating facial scrub specifically formulated to tackle stubborn spots and help prevent future breakouts. Its clinically proven formula, powered by Salicylic Acid and natural cellulose exfoliators, works to unclog pores and deeply cleanse the skin, helping to clear spots while respecting your skin's barrier. Achieve clearer, healthier-looking skin with this dermatologist-tested scrub.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Neutrogena Spot Controlling Facial Scrub**:
â­ Wet your face with water.
â­ Apply a suitable amount of the product onto your hands.
â­ Add water and gently massage your face in circular motions.
â­ Rinse your face thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Neutrogena Spot Controlling Facial Scrub**:
â­ Salicylic Acid: To treat spots and purify the skin.
â­ Natural Cellulose Exfoliators: For pore unclogging and deep cleansing.
â­ Oil-Free Formula: To ensure pores remain unblocked.
â­ D-Panthenol: For soothing and hydrating the skin.
â­ Gentle Cleansing Agents: To ensure efficacy while respecting the skin barrier.

title_ar: Ù†ÙŠÙˆØªØ±ÙˆØ¬ÙŠÙ†Ø§ Ø¨Ø±Ø§ÙŠØª Ø¨ÙˆØ³Øª ÙˆØ§Ù‚ÙŠ Ø´Ù…Ø³ Ø¬Ù„ 30 Ù…Ù„ 50
description_en:
Unveil your skin's radiance with **Neutrogena Bright Boost SPF 30 Gel 50ml**. This SPF 30 Gel Fluid is formulated with antioxidants, UVA/UVB broad-spectrum SPF 30 and the prestige ingredient Neoglucosamine to help boost the skin's natural surface cell turnover, enhanced with Vitamins C & E. Its lightweight, non-greasy formula targets dark spots and uneven skin tone, promoting a more youthful, brighter complexion, and is suitable for all skin tones.

â­ Scientifically proven formula that helps boost the natural surface skin cell turnover.
â­ Formulated with Neoglucosamine and Vitamins C & E.
â­ For brighter, healthier looking, more even-toned skin.
â­ Reduces the appearance of dark spots, uneven skin tone, and fine lines.
â­ Suitable for all skin tones.
â­ Developed with dermatologists.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Neutrogena Bright Boost SPF 30 Gel 50ml**
â­ Apply evenly onto skin daily.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Neutrogena Bright Boost SPF 30 Gel 50ml**
â­ Aqua, Homosalate, Glycerin, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Caprylyl Methicone, Phenylbenzimidazole Sulfonic Acid, Octocrylene, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Diisopropyl Adipate, Acetyl Glucosamine, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, C14-22 Alcohols, Moringa Oleifera Seed Extract, Hydroxyacetophenone, Bis-Ethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine, Mica, Caprylyl Glycol, Tin Oxide, Silica, Isohexadecane, Glyceryl Stearate, Sorbitan Isostearate, C12-20 Alkyl Glucoside, PEG-100 Stearate, Polysorbate 60, Acrylates Copolymer, Xanthan Gum, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Hydroxide, Citric Acid, Disodium Phosphate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin, Parfum, Citronellol, Benzyl Salicylate, CI 77891, CI 16035.

#Neutrogena #Sunscreen #Skincare #Brightening #HealthySkin #Moisturizer #Beauty #SaudiArabia #SkinProducts #BrightBoost

description_en:
Introducing **Neutrogena Retinol Boost Day Cream SPF 15**, an innovative formula developed by dermatologists to effectively combat visible signs of aging. This cream aims to firm the skin, enhance its radiance, and reduce the appearance of wrinkles and age spots, while also protecting the skin from photo-aging. The cream is designed to deliver Pure Retinol deep into the skin to improve its health and youthful appearance. Experience clinically proven results for visibly younger, healthier-looking skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Neutrogena Retinol Boost Day Cream SPF 15**:
â­ Apply the cream every morning.
â­ Dispense 2 pumps onto your palm.
â­ Gently massage over face and neck.
â­ Turn the pump to the "closed" position when not in use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Neutrogena Retinol Boost Day Cream SPF 15**:
â­ Pure Retinol: Scientifically proven to increase collagen production and promote skin cell renewal.
â­ Myrthus Plant Extract: Known for its skin-regenerating benefits.
â­ Hyaluronic Acid: Provides intense hydration and plumping moisture.

#Neutrogena #RetinolBoost #DayCream #AntiAging #Skincare #Hydration #SPFProtection #Beauty #YouthfulSkin #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Discover clear, calm skin with the **Neutrogena Soothing Clear Turmeric Mask**. This mask is specially formulated to absorb pore-clogging oils that can cause breakouts and to soothe stressed, spot-prone skin. Enriched with skin-friendly Turmeric, celebrated for its antioxidant and calming properties, the **Neutrogena Soothing Clear Turmeric Mask** preserves essential moisture, soothing skin for a balanced, healthy look. Perfect for sensitive spot-prone, combination, or dehydrated skin, its oil-free and sulphate-free formula leaves no residue.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Neutrogena Soothing Clear Turmeric Mask**:
â­ Smooth a thin layer over dry skin and leave on for up to three minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ Use up to 3 times a week maximum.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Neutrogena Soothing Clear Turmeric Mask**:
â­ Aqua
â­ Glycerin
â­ Kaolin
â­ Bentonite
â­ Curcuma Longa Root Extract
â­ Salicylic Acid
â­ Menthol
â­ Free from oils and sulphates

title_ar: Ù†ÙŠÙˆØªØ±ÙˆØ¬ÙŠÙ†Ø§ Ø³ÙŠØ±ÙˆÙ… ÙŠÙˆÙ…ÙŠ Ù„Ù„ØªØ­ÙƒÙ… Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ø­Ø¨ÙˆØ¨ 30 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Achieve clear, blemish-free skin with **Neutrogena Spot Controlling+ Daily Serum 30ml**. Developed with dermatologists, this clinically proven daily serum is formulated with a powerful combination of AHA (glycolic acid, mandelic acid), BHA (salicylic acid), and PHA (gluconolactone) to effectively combat acne. Salicylic Acid, a purifying agent, helps prevent breakouts, leaving you with clearer, healthier-looking skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Neutrogena Spot Controlling+ Daily Serum 30ml**
â­ New users: Apply product to small areas during the first 3 days.
â­ If no discomfort occurs: Apply a thin layer once a day on a clean face.
â­ To increase effectiveness: Increase application to twice a day if desired.
â­ If dryness or peeling occurs: Reduce application to once a day or every other day.
â­ Caution: Avoid contact with eyes. Contains AHAs that may increase your skinâ€™s sensitivity to the sun and sunburn. Use a sunscreen and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Neutrogena Spot Controlling+ Daily Serum 30ml**
â­ Aqua
â­ Propylene Glycol
â­ Glycolic Acid
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Sodium Hydroxide
â­ Mandelic Acid
â­ Gluconolactone
â­ Neopentyl Glycol Diheptanoate
â­ Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer
â­ Salicylic Acid
â­ t-Butyl Alcohol
â­ Dimethicone Crosspolymer
â­ Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6
â­ Polysorbate 60
â­ Sorbitan Isostearate
â­ Disodium EDTA

#Neutrogena #AcneSerum #AcneTreatment #ClearSkin #Skincare #SkincareRoutine #SaudiBeauty #Beauty #FaceCare #SaudiArabia

title_ar: Ù†ÙŠØªØ±ÙˆØ¬ÙŠÙ†Ø§ ÙÙŠØ²ÙŠØ¨Ù„ÙŠ ÙƒÙ„ÙŠØ± Ø¨ÙˆØ±& Ø´Ø§ÙŠÙ† Ù…Ù‚Ø´Ø± ÙŠÙˆÙ…ÙŠ - 150 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Discover a purified, shine-free complexion with **Neutrogena Oil Balancing Daily Exfoliator**. This unique double-action formula works to purify your skin and rebalance oil for a lasting mattifying effect. Infused with natural cellulose exfoliators, lime, and aloe vera, the **Neutrogena Oil Balancing Daily Exfoliator** deeply cleanses to unclog and tighten pores, leaving your skin looking flawless and mattified.

â­ Features natural cellulose exfoliators.
â­ Enriched with soothing lime and aloe vera.
â­ Delivers a flawless and mattified skin appearance.
â­ Purifies, unclogs pores, and effectively rebalances oil.
â­ Oil-free and suitable for oily skin.
â­ Ideal for daily use and dermatologist tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Neutrogena Oil Balancing Daily Exfoliator**:
â­ Gently massage onto your wet face once daily.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Neutrogena Oil Balancing Daily Exfoliator**:
â­ Aqua, Glycerin, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cellulose, Lauryl Glucoside, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Citrus Aurantifolia Juice, Propylene Gylcol, Menthyl Lactate, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Sulfite, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Parfum.

#Neutrogena #DailyExfoliator #Skincare #OilySkin #OilBalancing #SkinPurifying #Beauty #FaceCare #Saudi #OilySkinCare

description_en:
Discover the secret to soft, radiant skin with **Neutrogena Hydrogel Mask Fine Line Smoother**, specifically designed to reduce fine lines and give you a more youthful appearance. This hydrogel mask features a unique 100% hydrogel formula that contours to your skin, promoting optimal absorption of active ingredients for clinically proven results. **Neutrogena Hydrogel Mask Fine Line Smoother** provides intense hydration and leaves your skin feeling soft, smooth, and with a healthy-looking glow.

â­ Intensely hydrating for plump, revitalized skin.
â­ 100% hydrogel formula for maximum active ingredient absorption.
â­ Effectively reduces fine lines and wrinkles.
â­ Gentle on skin and suitable for sensitive skin.
â­ Non-comedogenic (won't clog pores).
â­ Dermatologist-tested for safety and efficacy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Neutrogena Hydrogel Mask Fine Line Smoother**
â­ Cleanse your face thoroughly before application.
â­ Peel off the white film backing from the mask sheet and discard.
â­ Apply the mask to your face and leave on for 15-30 minutes.
â­ Remove the mask and gently massage any remaining product onto your face and neck.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Neutrogena Hydrogel Mask Fine Line Smoother**
â­ Innovative hydrogel material to enhance absorption.
â­ Adenosine to soothe and smooth the skin.
â­ Moisturizing ingredients for deep hydration.

description_en:
**Neutrogena Bright Boost Serum** is your ultimate solution for brighter, more even-toned skin. It features a unique formula with the highest concentration of Neoglucosamine, a prestige ingredient scientifically proven to enhance skin brightness, smoothness, and evenness. This serum targets dullness, redness, dark spots, hyperpigmentation, and uneven skin tone, reducing the appearance of imperfections for improved skin clarity. It also helps activate the skin's natural renewal process, giving you a brighter, more even-toned complexion. **Neutrogena Bright Boost Serum** is suitable for all skin tones and was developed in collaboration with dermatologists to ensure maximum efficacy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Neutrogena Bright Boost Serum**:
â­ Apply daily to your skin.
â­ Massage gently until fully absorbed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Neutrogena Bright Boost Serum**:
â­ Aqua, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Acetyl Glucosamine, Propylene Glycol.
â­ Amodimethicone, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hexylresorcinol, Dimethiconol, Silica, Mica.
â­ Pentylene Glycol, Carbomer, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Hydroxide.
â­ Tetrahydrodiferuloylmethane, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Ci 77891.

#Neutrogena #BrightBoost #BrighteningSerum #SkinBrightening #HealthySkin #Skincare #SaudiArabia #Beauty #SkinRenewal #SaudiMakeup

description_en:
Neutrogena Bright Boost Peeling works to activate the skin's natural renewal process. This polish enhances the natural turnover of surface skin cells to reduce dark spots, even out skin tone, and minimize fine lines, revealing brighter, more radiant, and even-looking skin. Formulated with Alpha Hydroxy Acids (AHA) and Polyhydroxy Acids (PHA), it gently exfoliates the skin, removing dull and tired cells. Neutrogena Bright Boost Peeling is suitable for all skin types.

â­ Scientifically proven formula to activate the skinâ€™s natural renewal process.
â­ Contains AHAs and natural exfoliators.
â­ Awakens dull skin cells for a brighter looking skin tone.
â­ Reduces the appearance of dark spots, uneven skin tone, and fine lines.
â­ Suitable for all skin types.
â­ Developed with Dermatologists.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Neutrogena Bright Boost Peeling**
â­ Use 1-3 times a week.
â­ Massage gently onto wet facial skin.
â­ Rinse the face and pat dry gently.
â­ For external use only.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Neutrogena Bright Boost Peeling**
â­ Aqua, Cetyl Alcohol, Cellulose, PPG-15 Stearyl Ether, Glycerin, Mandelic Acid, Glycolic Acid, Polysorbate 60, Steareth-21, Sodium Hydroxide, Caprylyl Glycol, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Xanthan Gum, Disodium EDTA, Tocopheryl Acetate, BHT, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum.

description_en:
Experience clear, soothed skin with **Neutrogena Soothing Clear Micellar Jelly Makeup Remover**. This micellar jelly is specially formulated for instant makeup removal while soothing stressed, spot-prone skin. Enriched with Turmeric, it gently melts into your skin, effectively removing all traces of makeup, even waterproof, without irritation. It leaves your skin balanced and healthy-looking. The oil-free formula leaves no unwanted residue.

â­ Instantly removes makeup, even waterproof.
â­ Soothes stressed, spot-prone skin.
â­ Enriched with natural Turmeric extract.
â­ Suitable for combination and dry skin.
â­ Oil-free and non-comedogenic.
â­ Dermatologist tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Neutrogena Soothing Clear Micellar Jelly Makeup Remover**:
â­ Apply jelly onto a cotton pad.
â­ Gently massage over face, keeping eyes closed.
â­ Wipe clean with the cotton pad.
â­ Rinse off if desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Neutrogena Soothing Clear Micellar Jelly Makeup Remover**:
â­ Aqua, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Polysorbate 20, Curcuma Longa Extract, Caprylyl Glycol, Poloxamer 188, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Hydroxide, BHT, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin, Parfum, Limonene, Eugenol, Benzyl Benzoate, Geraniol, CI 15985

description_en:
Reveal a brighter, cleaner complexion with **Neutrogena Skin Detox Cooling Scrub**! This unique formula is specifically designed to target and remove 100% of daily toxins and pollution without stripping your skin's moisture, leaving you with a naturally radiant glow.

â­ Deeply cleanses and purifies pores from dirt, oil, and makeup residue.
â­ Features micro-exfoliators and glycolic acid to effectively unclog pores.
â­ Preserves your skin's natural moisture for a soft and refreshed feel.
â­ Suitable for all skin types and gentle enough for daily use.
â­ Dermatologist-tested and non-comedogenic.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Neutrogena Skin Detox Cooling Scrub**:
â­ Wet your face.
â­ Apply to hands, add water, and gently massage onto your face.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Neutrogena Skin Detox Cooling Scrub**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Cellulose, Sorbitol, Acrylates Crosspolymer-4, Sodium Hydrolyzed Potato Starch Dodecenylsuccinate, Cera Microcristallina, Salicylic Acid, Disodium Tetrapropenyl Succinate, Menthol, Polysorbate 20, Sodium Chloride, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Glycolic Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Parfum, CI 77510, CI 42053.

description_en:
Neutrogena Hydro Boost Makeup Remover Wipes are your ultimate solution for effective makeup removal and intense skin hydration. These soft wipes are infused with a refreshing cleansing lotion to instantly sweep away all traces of makeup and impurities, even waterproof mascara, while quenching dry skin with a boost of vital hydration. Powered by hyaluronic acid, **Neutrogena Hydro Boost Makeup Remover Wipes** cleanse effectively while protecting the skinâ€™s natural barrier to help lock in moisture. They leave your skin feeling smooth, supple, and visibly revitalized, with a bounce-back look. Experience intense hydration and unparalleled freshness with **Neutrogena Hydro Boost Makeup Remover Wipes**!

â­ Effectively removes waterproof mascara.

â­ 100% alcohol-free, ensuring gentleness on the skin.
â­ Suitable for sensitive skin, offering a safe care experience.
â­ Dermatologist tested for safety and efficacy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Neutrogena Hydro Boost Makeup Remover Wipes**:

description_en:
Revitalize your skin with the **Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hydrogel Recovery Mask**. Infused with hyaluronic acid, it instantly quenches dry skin, leaving it feeling hydrated and supple. The **Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hydrogel Recovery Mask** boasts an innovative 100% hydrogel formula that contours to your skin for optimal absorption of active ingredients, delivering clinically proven results. Gentle on the skin and suitable for sensitive complexions, its enriched active serum leaves your skin feeling intensely hydrated and refreshed.

â­ Intensely hydrating and revitalizing.
â­ Unique 100% hydrogel formula enriched with active serum.
â­ Non-comedogenic (wonâ€™t clog pores).
â­ Suitable for sensitive skin.
â­ Dermatologist tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hydrogel Recovery Mask**:
â­ Cleanse your face.
â­ Peel white film backing from the mask sheet & discard.
â­ Place the hydrogel mask on face and leave it on for 15 to 30 minutes.
â­ Remove mask and massage remaining product onto face and neck.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hydrogel Recovery Mask**:
â­ Water, Dipropylene Glycol, Propanediol, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Xanthan Gum, Chondrus Crispus Extract, Chlorphenesin, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Chloride, Fragrance, Disodium EDTA, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Tremella Fuciformis Sporocarp Extract, Plukenetia Volubilis Seed Oil, Sucrose Cocoate, Tocopherol, Blue 1.

#Neutrogena #FaceMask #SkinHydration #Skincare #HealthySkin #Beauty #IntenseHydration #Cosmetics #SaudiArabia #RiyadhSkincare

description_en:
**Neutrogena Purifying Boost Hydrogel Recovery Mask**, your ultimate solution for instantly refreshed and soothed tired skin. This innovative mask, made from a 100% hydrogel purifying formula, contours your skin perfectly for optimal absorption of active ingredients, delivering clinically proven results. Gentle on the skin and infused with Vitamin B3 and seaweed extract, **Neutrogena Purifying Boost Hydrogel Recovery Mask** leaves your skin feeling purified, detoxified, and with a healthy-looking glow. It provides intense hydration without clogging pores, making it suitable for sensitive skin and dermatologist-tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Neutrogena Purifying Boost Hydrogel Recovery Mask**:
â­ Cleanse your face.
â­ Peel white film backing from the mask sheet & discard.
â­ Place the hydrogel mask on face and leave it on for 15 to 30 minutes.
â­ Remove mask and massage remaining product onto face and neck.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Neutrogena Purifying Boost Hydrogel Recovery Mask**:
â­ 100% hydrogel purifying formula
â­ Enriched with seaweed extract
â­ Intense hydration
â­ Non-comedogenic (wonâ€™t clog pores)
â­ Suitable for sensitive skin
â­ Dermatologist tested

description_en:
Give your child the ideal nutrition with **Nido One Plus**, a growing-up formula specifically designed for children aged 1 to 3 years. The advanced formula is rich in Probiotics, Iron, and Vitamins A & C for strong immunity, plus DHA for brain development. With 2X more Vitamin D than before, **Nido One Plus** supports stronger bones, and it's free from added sucrose for healthier growth. **Nido One Plus** is the perfect choice for your child's complete nutritional needs.

**Caution & Warnings:**
* Consult your doctor before using the product.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nido One Plus**:
â­ Add 6 scoops of **Nido One Plus** to 225 ml of warm water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nido One Plus**:
â­ Skimmed Cowâ€™s Milk, Maltodextrin, Cowâ€™s Milk Whey Protein, Milk Fat, Lactose, Vegetable Oils (Corn Oil, Low Erucic Rapeseed Oil, Palm Olein).
â­ Honey, Oligofructose, Inulin, Calcium Carbonate, Emulsifier (Lecithin Soya).
â­ Fish Oil (From Tuna Fish), Lactobacillus rhamnosus, Flavor (Vanillin).
â­ Minerals: Potassium Citrate, Iron (Ferrous Sulfate), Zinc (Zinc Sulfate), Sodium Citrate, Sodium Selenite.
â­ Vitamins: Vitamin C (Ascorbic Acid), Vitamin E, Nicotinamide, Pantothenic acid, Vitamin B1, Vitamin B6, Vitamin A, Vitamin B2, Folic Acid, Vitamin K, Biotin, Vitamin D3, Vitamin B12.
â­ Contains: Milk, Soy, and Fish.

description_en:
Discover complete nutrition for your child with **Nido 1+ Gum**, a growing-up formula specifically designed for toddlers aged 1 to 3 years. **Nido 1+ Gum** boosts immunity with its content of Probiotics, Iron, Vitamins A & C, and supports brain development with added DHA. It also features more Vitamin D for stronger bones and no added sucrose for healthier growth. **Nido 1+ Gum** is not a breast-milk substitute, but a formula specially suited to healthy young children from 1 to 3 years as part of a balanced diet.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nido 1+ Gum**

â­ Add 6 scoops of **Nido 1+ Gum** milk to 210 ml of warm water.
â­ Give your child 2 servings daily.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nido 1+ Gum**

â­ Skimmed Cowâ€™s Milk, Maltodextrin, Cowâ€™s Milk Whey Protein, Milk Fat, Lactose, Vegetable Oils (Corn Oil, Low Erucic Rapeseed Oil, Palm Olein), Honey, Oligofructose, Inulin, Calcium Carbonate, Emulsifier (Lecithin Soya).
â­ Fish Oil (From Tuna Fish), Lactobacillus rhamnosus, Flavor (Vanillin).
â­ Minerals: Potassium Citrate, Iron (Ferrous Sulfate), Zinc (Zinc Sulfate), Sodium Citrate, Sodium Selenite.
â­ Vitamins: Vitamin C (Ascorbic Acid), Vitamin E, Nicotinamide, Pantothenic acid, Vitamin B1, Vitamin B6, Vitamin A, Vitamin B2, Folic Acid, Vitamin K, Biotin, Vitamin D3, Vitamin B12.
â­ Allergens: Contains Milk, Soy, and Fish.

description_en:
Discover **Nido Three Plus No Sucrose 3 Years Onwards** â€“ the ideal solution to support your child's growth from 3 years old and above. This formula is meticulously designed to provide your little one with everything they need for their active growth phase. It is enriched with Probiotics, Iron, Zinc, Selenium, Vitamins A, C & D for stronger immunity, plus DHA for brain development and more Vitamin D for stronger bones. Most importantly, **Nido Three Plus No Sucrose 3 Years Onwards** contains no added sucrose, contributing to your child's healthier growth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nido Three Plus No Sucrose 3 Years Onwards**:
â­ Add 3 level tablespoons (tablespoon measure) of milk powder to 250 ml of warm water.
â­ Mix well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Serve to your child at an appropriate temperature.
â­ Ensure the tin is tightly closed after each use.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place.
â­ Use within 1 month of opening.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nido Three Plus No Sucrose 3 Years Onwards**:
â­ Skimmed Cowâ€™s Milk, Lactose, Cowâ€™s Milk Whey Protein, Milk Fat, Vegetable Oils (Corn Oil, Low Erucic Rapeseed Oil, Palm Olein).
â­ Honey, Oligofructose, Inulin.
â­ Calcium Carbonate, Emulsifier (Lecithin Soya).
â­ Fish Oil (From Tuna Fish), Lactobacillus rhamnosus, Flavor (Vanillin).

â­ Allergens: Contains Milk, Soy, and Fish.

â­ Supports immunity with Probiotics, Iron, Vitamin A & C.

â­ No added sucrose for healthier growth.
â­ **Nido One Plus** is a balanced nutritional formula suitable for healthy young children.

description_en:
Introducing **Nido One Plus**, the perfect growing-up formula designed for your toddler aged 1 to 3 years. Enriched with probiotics, iron, and essential vitamins like A, C, and D for stronger immunity. **Nido One Plus** also includes DHA for brain development and Vitamin D for stronger bones. Its sucrose-free formulation supports healthy growth and a peaceful sleep. This formula is not a breast-milk substitute but a nutritious supplement for healthy children from 1 to 3 years, as part of a balanced diet.

â­ Contains Probiotics, Iron, Zinc, Selenium, Vitamins A, C, & D for stronger immunity.
â­ Enriched with DHA for optimal brain development.
â­ Fortified with Vitamin D for stronger bones.
â­ No added sucrose for healthier growth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nido One Plus**:
â­ Add 6 scoops of **Nido One Plus** milk to 210 ml of warm water. Give your child 2 servings daily.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nido One Plus**:
â­ Skimmed Cowâ€™s Milk, Maltodextrin, Cowâ€™s Milk Whey Protein, Milk Fat, Lactose, Vegetable Oils (Corn Oil, Low Erucic Rapeseed Oil, Palm Olein), Honey, Oligofructose, Inulin, Calcium Carbonate, Emulsifier (Lecithin Soya), Fish Oil (From Tuna Fish), Lactobacillus rhamnosus, Flavor (Vanillin), Minerals: Potassium Citrate, Iron (Ferrous Sulfate), Zinc (Zinc Sulfate), Sodium Citrate, Sodium Selenite, Vitamins: Vitamin C (Ascorbic Acid), Vitamin E, Nicotinamide, Pantothenic acid, Vitamin B1, Vitamin B6, Vitamin A, Vitamin B2, Folic Acid, Vitamin K, Biotin, Vitamin D3, Vitamin B12.

description_en:
**Nido One Plus** is a premium growing-up formula meticulously crafted for toddlers aged 1-3 years, supporting their healthy development journey. It's enriched with Probiotics, Iron, Zinc, Selenium, and Vitamins A, C, and D to bolster immunity, alongside DHA for crucial brain development and increased Vitamin D for stronger bones. A key benefit of **Nido One Plus** is its 'no added sucrose' formulation, promoting healthier growth and peaceful sleep. While it's a suitable nutritional supplement for healthy young children from 1 to 3 years, it's important to remember that breast milk remains the optimal nutrition for infants.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nido One Plus**:
â­ Prepare your child's cup by adding 6 scoops of the milk powder to 210 ml of warm water.
â­ It is recommended to give 2 servings daily to support optimal growth.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nido One Plus**:
â­ Skimmed Cowâ€™s Milk, Maltodextrin, Cowâ€™s Milk Whey Protein, Milk Fat, Lactose, Vegetable Oils (Corn Oil, Low Erucic Rapeseed Oil, Palm Olein), Honey, Oligofructose, Inulin, Calcium Carbonate.
â­ Emulsifier (Lecithin Soya), Fish Oil (From Tuna Fish), Lactobacillus rhamnosus, Flavor (Vanillin).
â­ Minerals: Potassium Citrate, Iron (Ferrous Sulfate), Zinc (Zinc Sulfate), Sodium Citrate, Sodium Selenite.
â­ Vitamins: Vitamin C (Ascorbic Acid), Vitamin E, Nicotinamide, Pantothenic acid, Vitamin B1, Vitamin B6, Vitamin A, Vitamin B2, Folic Acid, Vitamin K, Biotin, Vitamin D3, Vitamin B12.
â­ Allergens: Contains Milk, Soy, and Fish.

description_en:
Boost your child's growth and development with **Nido Three Plus**, specially formulated for children aged 3 to 5 years. Fortified with Probiotics, Iron, and Vitamins A, C & D, this milk provides stronger immunity and healthy bone development. With added DHA, **Nido Three Plus** supports healthy brain development and is free from added sucrose for healthy teeth and peaceful sleep.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nido Three Plus**:
â­ Add 3 standard scoops (tablespoon) of milk powder to 250 ml of warm water.
â­ Give your child two servings daily.
â­ Consult your doctor before using the product to know the right way to use it.
â­ Keep the tin tightly closed after each use.
â­ Store in a cool and dry place.
â­ Use before the expiry date (EXP) indicated on the bottom of the tin.
â­ Use within 1 month of opening.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nido Three Plus**:
â­ Skimmed Cowâ€™s Milk, Lactose, Cowâ€™s Milk Whey Protein, Milk Fat, Vegetable Oils (Corn Oil, Low Erucic Rapeseed Oil, Palm Olein).
â­ Honey, Oligofructose, Inulin, Calcium Carbonate, Emulsifier (Lecithin Soya).
â­ Fish Oil (From Tuna Fish), Lactobacillus rhamnosus, Flavor (Vanillin).
â­ Minerals: Potassium Citrate, Iron (Ferrous Sulfate), Zinc (Zinc Sulfate), Sodium Citrate, Sodium Selenite.
â­ Vitamins: Vitamin C (L-Ascorbic Acid), Vitamin E, Nicotinamide, Pantothenic acid, Vitamin B1, Vitamin B6, Vitamin A, Vitamin B2, Folic Acid, Vitamin K, Biotin, Vitamin D3, Vitamin B12.
â­ Allergens: Contains Milk, Soy, and Fish.

description_en:
Nido Full Cream Milk Powder with FortiGrow offers a rich, creamy taste and is expertly formulated to support your child's optimal growth. Packed with essential vitamins and minerals, it strengthens your child's muscles, bones, and teeth, making it an ideal choice for comprehensive nutrition. **Nido Full Cream Milk Powder with FortiGrow** is an excellent source of calcium and Vitamin D, providing a delicious and instantly prepared milk.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nido Full Cream Milk Powder with FortiGrow**:
â­ Mix 3 tablespoons of the powder with 250 ml of lukewarm water and stir.
â­ Serve to your child to support their growth and development.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nido Full Cream Milk Powder with FortiGrow**:
â­ Full cream Cow's Milk Powder.
â­ Emulsifier (Soya Lecithin).
â­ Essential Vitamins and Minerals.

Discover complete nutritional power with **Nido Fortified Full Cream Milk Powder 1800 gm**. We present a unique full cream milk powder with a rich, creamy taste, specifically designed to support your child's healthy growth and development. It contains essential vitamins and minerals to strengthen muscles, bones, and teeth, making it the ideal choice to ensure your child receives the nutrition they need for optimal growth.

description_en:
NIDO 5 Plus milk is specifically formulated to support the brain development of children aged 5 to 10 years. Fortified with Iron, Zinc, and DHA, this milk helps enhance cognitive functions, brain focus, and memory development during their crucial growth years.

â­ Boosts mental focus in children.
â­ Supports memory development and cognitive functions.
â­ Contains essential vitamins and minerals for child growth.
â­ Suitable for children aged 5 to 10 years.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nido 5 Plus**
â­ Add three tablespoons of **Nido 5 Plus** milk powder to 200ml of warm or cold previously boiled water.
â­ Stir or shake well until the powder is fully dissolved.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place.
â­ Use within the recommended period after opening.
â­ Consult a healthcare professional before introducing new food products.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nido 5 Plus**
â­ Iron
â­ Zinc
â­ DHA (Docosahexaenoic Acid)
â­ Various Vitamins

description_en:
Nido 5 Plus Biscuit Flavour Milk is a milk powder enriched with essential nutrients like Iron, Zinc, and DHA (an Omega-3 fatty acid) to support healthy cognitive function in children aged 5 years and above. The natural caramel biscuit flavor adds an appealing taste that attracts children, encouraging regular consumption.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nido 5 Plus Biscuit Flavour Milk**:

*   **Preparation:** Add three tablespoons of the milk powder to 200ml of warm or cold previously boiled water. Stir well until fully dissolved.
*   **Serving:** Serve immediately after preparation.
*   **Storage:** Keep in a cool, dry place. Once opened, store in an airtight container and use within the recommended period indicated on the packaging.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nido 5 Plus Biscuit Flavour Milk**:

*   Full cream cow's milk powder
*   Whey powder
*   Polydextrose (corn fiber)
*   Natural flavor (caramel biscuit)
*   DHA (from tuna fish)
*   Vitamin A
*   Vitamin D
*   Vitamin C
*   Vitamin B9 (Folic Acid)
*   Iron
*   Zinc
*   Natural colorant (malt extract)
*   Emulsifier from plant origin: soya lecithin

description_en:
Achieve silky smooth skin with **Nair Hair Removal Cream Rose Fragrance 110 gm**. Say goodbye to razor irritation, cuts, and nicks, and embrace long-lasting smoothness with this effective cream. **Nair Hair Removal Cream Rose Fragrance** gently removes unwanted hair, deeply moisturizes your skin, leaving it feeling incredibly soft and giving you unparalleled confidence. With its unique formula and refreshing rose fragrance, **Nair Hair Removal Cream Rose Fragrance** offers a comfortable and hassle-free hair removal experience, even for sensitive skin. Enjoy refreshed, smooth skin ready for any occasion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nair Hair Removal Cream Rose Fragrance**
â­ Apply the cream gently onto clean, dry skin.
â­ Leave on for 3-6 minutes, depending on hair thickness.
â­ Use the spatula provided to gently sweep away the cream and hair.
â­ Rinse the area thoroughly with lukewarm water and pat dry.
â­ Enjoy smooth, hair-free skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nair Hair Removal Cream Rose Fragrance**
â­ Water
â­ Calcium Thioglycolate
â­ Paraffinum Liquidum
â­ Calcium Hydroxide
â­ Almond Oil
â­ Rose Fragrance
â­ Vitamin E

description_en:
Say goodbye to skin irritation and cuts with **Nair Hair Removal Spray Rose Fragrance**.

Achieve smooth, silky skin with the new hair removal spray from Nair. **Nair Hair Removal Spray Rose Fragrance** provides long-lasting results without causing any discomfort or harm to your delicate skin. It gently removes unwanted hair and deeply moisturizes the skin, leaving you feeling refreshed with a fragrant rose scent.

**Nair Hair Removal Spray Rose Fragrance** is easy to use, works quickly and effectively, even on sensitive skin. It's the perfect solution to eliminate painful and irritating methods like shaving and waxing, giving your skin ultimate smoothness and renewed confidence. Plus, it's free from dyes and parabens thanks to its natural ingredients.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nair Hair Removal Spray Rose Fragrance**
â­ Gently apply the spray to your skin and leave it on for 10 minutes.
â­ Gently wipe away the spray and hair with the provided spatula.
â­ Rinse the area with lukewarm water and massage the skin until dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nair Hair Removal Spray Rose Fragrance**
â­ Aqua
â­ Paraffinum Liquidum
â­ Calcium Thioglycolate
â­ Benzyl Salicylate
â­ Linalool
â­ Parfum
â­ Celeth-20
â­ Calcium Hydroxide
â­ Sodium Hydroxide
â­ Amyl Cinnamal

description_en:
Say goodbye to skin irritation and razor bumps! Enjoy silky smooth skin with **Nair Hair Removal Cream** in a gentle formula with a refreshing lemon fragrance.

**Nair Hair Removal Cream** effectively and gently removes unwanted hair, leaving your skin moisturized and smooth. Its unique formula provides long-lasting results, eliminating the need for painful traditional methods like waxing.

Perfect for sensitive skin, it's free from dyes and parabens, giving you the confidence to express your natural beauty. The invigorating lemon scent makes you feel refreshed and relaxed.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nair Hair Removal Cream**:
â­ Gently apply the cream to clean, dry skin.
â­ Leave on for 3-6 minutes (depending on hair type and thickness).
â­ Remove the cream and hair using the provided spatula or a damp cloth.
â­ Rinse the area with lukewarm water and pat dry gently.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nair Hair Removal Cream**:
â­ Aqua, Calcium Thioglycolate, Mineral Oil, Calcium Hydroxide, Paraffinum Liquidum, Cetostearyl Alcohol, Fragrance, Citric Acid.

#Nair #HairRemoval #SmoothSkin #Skincare #BeautyProducts #SaudiArabia #Beauty #Softness #PersonalCare #YourBeauty

description_en:
Product Description:
Say yes to smooth and silky skin with **Nair Hair Removal Spray Lemon Fragrance**. Replace the feeling of irritation while shaving and bid farewell to unwanted cuts and wounds with long-lasting results of **Nair Hair Removal Spray**. The **Nair Hair Removal Spray** far exceeds the results of shaving, providing effective results without causing fuss or harm to your delicate skin.

â­ Gently melts away unwanted hair.
â­ Deeply moisturizes and effectively smooths the skin.
â­ Easy to use with quick steps and an included guide.
â­ Works quickly and effectively, leaving you feeling fresh with a citrus scent.
â­ Ideal for sensitive skin, a gentle alternative to painful methods like waxing.
â­ Provides a feeling of energy and relaxation while soothing the skin.
â­ Delivers silky smooth skin and boosts confidence.
â­ Long-lasting effect to save you time.
â­ Free from dyes and parabens.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nair Hair Removal Spray**:
â­ Apply the spray gently to your skin in the shower or bathtub, and leave the applied area under water for about 10 minutes.
â­ After the time period, gently wipe away the product and hair with the spatula provided inside the box.
â­ Rinse the area with lukewarm water using a damp cloth.
â­ Pat your skin dry, and you're ready for any event.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nair Hair Removal Spray**:
â­ Aqua, Paraffinum Liquidum, Calcium Thioglycolate, Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool, Parfum, Celeth-20, Calcium Hydroxide, Sodium Hydroxide, Amyl Cinnamal.

#Nair #HairRemoval #Skincare #SmoothSkin #HairRemovalSpray #Beauty #BeautyHealth #Fragrance #BodyCare #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience ultimate smoothness with **Nair Hair Remover Legs & Body Cocoa Butter Cream**. Specially formulated for easy and quick hair removal, even in the shower. **Nair Hair Remover Legs & Body Cocoa Butter Cream** leaves your skin feeling soft and moisturized for up to 7 days, free from nicks and cuts. Indulge your skin with this rich cocoa butter cream for amazing results.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nair Hair Remover Legs & Body Cocoa Butter Cream**:
â­ Smooth on the cream in a thick, even layer, covering the hair to be removed. Do not rub in.
â­ After 5-6 minutes, test a small area. If hair does not come away easily, leave on for a few minutes longer. Do not leave for more than 10 minutes in total.
â­ Remove cream with spatula.
â­ Shower off with lukewarm water or using a wet cloth & pat skin dry with a soft towel. Do not rub or use soap.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nair Hair Remover Legs & Body Cocoa Butter Cream**:
â­ Cocoa Butter
â­ Effective Hair Removal Agents
â­ Moisturizers for Skin Softness

#Nair #HairRemovalCream #SoftSkin #SkinMoisture #CreamHairRemoval #Skincare #BeautyProducts #Cosmetics #SaudiBeauty #DubaiStyle

title_ar: Ù†ÙŠØ± Ø´Ø±Ø§Ø¦Ø­ Ø´Ù…Ø¹ÙŠØ© Ù„Ø¥Ø²Ø§Ù„Ø© Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø§Ù„ÙˆØ¬Ù‡ Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø´Ù…Ø´ - 20 Ù‚Ø·Ø¹Ø©
description_en:
Experience long-lasting smooth, hair-free skin with **Nair Facial Wax Strips with Apricot**. Specially formulated for your face, these strips effectively remove even short hair from the root, leaving your skin soft and moisturized for up to 4 weeks. Enjoy slower, finer, and less visible hair regrowth with our gentle, dermatologically tested formula enriched with natural ingredients.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nair Facial Wax Strips with Apricot**:
â­ Slowly separate the wax strips, using one at a time. No rubbing required.
â­ Apply the wax strip firmly in the direction of hair growth.
â­ Hold skin taut and quickly pull the strip off in the opposite direction, parallel to the skin.
â­ Use the included post-wax wipes to remove any residue and moisturize your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nair Facial Wax Strips with Apricot**:
â­ Natural origin ingredients.
â­ Apricot Milk Extracts.
â­ Starch.
â­ Dermatologically tested.

title_ar: Ù†ÙŠØ± ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ø¥Ø²Ø§Ù„Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø¨Ø²ÙŠØª Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø±ØºØ§Ù† - 110 Ù…Ù„: Ù†Ø¹ÙˆÙ…Ø© ÙØ§Ø¦Ù‚Ø© ØªØ­Øª Ø§Ù„Ø¯Ø´
description_en:
Introducing the **Nair Hair Removal Cream with Argan Oil 110ml**, your ultimate solution for quick and effective hair removal, even in the shower. Infused with nourishing Argan Oil, **Nair Hair Removal Cream with Argan Oil** deeply moisturizes and hydrates your skin, leaving it feeling incredibly soft and smooth for up to 7 days. Perfect for use on legs, bikini line, and underarms, even on sensitive skin, it ensures your skin is left soft and revitalized.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nair Hair Removal Cream with Argan Oil**

â­ Smooth on a thick, even layer of cream using the provided spatula, covering the hair to be removed. Do not rub into the skin.
â­ After 5-6 minutes, test a small area to check the cream's effectiveness.
â­ If the hair does not come away easily from the test area, leave the cream on for a few minutes longer.
â­ Do not leave the cream on for more than 10 minutes in total.
â­ Remove the cream with the spatula.
â­ Shower off with lukewarm water or a wet cloth, then gently pat your skin dry with a soft towel.
â­ Avoid rubbing the skin or using soap after removal.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nair Hair Removal Cream with Argan Oil**

â­ Contains Argan Oil for deep skin hydration and nourishment.
â­ Gentle and effective formula for root hair removal.
â­ Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin.
â­ Provides long-lasting skin smoothness.
â­ Leaves skin soft and revitalized.

#Nair #HairRemoval #ArganOil #SmoothSkin #Skincare #EasyHairRemoval #SoftSkin #SaudiBeauty #BeautyProducts #SaudiDeals

description_en:
Experience ultimate smoothness with **Nair Hair Remover Wax Strips With Coconut Milk**. These strips are your perfect solution for hair-free skin that lasts up to 4 weeks. Designed for sensitive skin, they efficiently remove short, unwanted hair from the root, enriched with natural extracts to nourish your skin. Enjoy silky-soft, refreshed skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nair Hair Remover Wax Strips With Coconut Milk**
â­ Slowly separate the wax strips, using one strip at a time. No need for pre-rubbing.
â­ Apply the wax strip to the desired area by pressing down firmly with the palm of your hand over the hair in the direction of hair growth.
â­ Holding the skin taut, quickly pull off the strip in the opposite direction parallel to the skin, not up and away from the body.
â­ After waxing, use a post-wax wipe to soothe and moisturize the skin, and remove any wax residue.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nair Hair Remover Wax Strips With Coconut Milk**
â­ 97% natural origin ingredients.
â­ Coconut Milk Extract to soothe sensitive skin.
â­ Effective in removing short hair from the root.
â­ Dermatologically tested for sensitive skin safety.
â­ Provides smooth skin for up to 4 weeks.

#Nair #HairRemoval #WaxStrips #SmoothSkin #CoconutMilk #Skincare #Moisturizing #Beauty #Cosmetics #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience ultimate smoothness with **Nair Hair Removal Cherry Blossom Cream**. This effective and easy-to-use formula removes unwanted hair in minutes, leaving your skin soft and refreshed for up to 7 days.

â­ Achieve maximum skin softness with minimal effort.
â­ Enriched with Cherry Blossom extract for skin hydration and radiance.
â­ Long-lasting results, up to 7 days.
â­ Convenient and quick hair removal formula.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nair Hair Removal Cherry Blossom Cream**:
â­ Smooth on the cream in a thick, even layer, covering the hair to be removed. Do not rub in.
â­ After 5-6 minutes, test a small area.
â­ If hair doesn't come away easily, leave on for a few minutes longer. Do not leave for more than 10 minutes in total.
â­ Remove cream with spatula.
â­ Shower off with lukewarm water or using a wet cloth if required & pat skin dry with a soft towel.
â­ Do not rub or use soap.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nair Hair Removal Cherry Blossom Cream**:
â­ Nourishing and moisturizing Cherry Blossom extract.
â­ Effective ingredients for smooth hair removal.

#Nair #HairRemoval #Skincare #SmoothSkin #Beauty #SaudiArabia #BodyCare #Epilation #SoftSkin #BeautyProducts

description_en:
Say goodbye to difficult hair removal and embrace smooth skin with **Nair Hair Remover Wax Strips With Mango Extract**. These ready-to-use strips require no pre-rubbing and are suitable for sensitive and normal skin. Dermatologically tested, they remove short hair from the roots, leaving your skin smooth and moisturized for up to 4 weeks. With continued use, hair will grow back slower and finer.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nair Hair Remover Wax Strips With Mango Extract**
â­ Slowly separate one wax strip at a time. No need for rubbing.
â­ Apply the wax strip to the desired area by pressing down firmly with the palm of your hand in the direction of hair growth.
â­ Holding the skin taut, quickly pull off the strip in the opposite direction parallel to the skin.
â­ After waxing, use a post-wax wipe to soothe and moisturize the skin, removing any waxy residue.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nair Hair Remover Wax Strips With Mango Extract**
â­ 97% natural origin ingredients.
â­ Dermatologically tested.
â­ Removes short hair safely and smoothly.
â­ Smooth skin for up to 4 weeks.
â­ Made with Mango Extract for sensitive skin.

description_en:
Achieve silky-smooth skin that lasts up to 4 weeks with **Nair** Wax Strips infused with Milk & Honey Extract. This easy-to-use, 'peel and place' application effectively removes unwanted hair from the root. Specifically designed for your legs, arms, and underarms, **Nair** Wax Strips utilize the nourishing power of milk and honey, making them suitable for sensitive skin. Formulated with 97% natural origin ingredients and dermatologically tested, these strips offer a gentle yet effective hair removal experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nair** Hair Remover Wax Strips with Milk & Honey Extract:
â­ Slowly separate one wax strip at a time. No prior rubbing is needed.
â­ Apply the wax strip to the desired area by pressing down firmly with your palm over the hair in the direction of hair growth.
â­ Hold the skin taut and quickly pull off the strip in the opposite direction, parallel to the skin, not straight up.
â­ After waxing, use a post-wax wipe to soothe, moisturize the skin, and remove any wax residue.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nair** Hair Remover Wax Strips with Milk & Honey Extract:
â­ Formulated with 97% natural origin ingredients.
â­ Enriched with Milk & Honey Extract to soothe and nourish the skin.
â­ Dermatologically tested for sensitive skin.

#Nair #WaxStrips #HairRemoval #SmoothSkin #Skincare #MilkAndHoney #SaudiBeauty #BodyCare #SayNoToUnwantedHair #SaudiBeautyProducts

description_en:
Achieve silky smooth skin with **Nair Wax Strips with Cherry Extract**. These innovative strips, made with 97% natural origin ingredients, effectively remove even the shortest hairs from the roots, providing you with up to 4 weeks of smoothness. **Nair Wax Strips with Cherry Extract** are dermatologically tested and suitable for sensitive skin, ensuring gentle yet effective hair removal. With continued use, you'll notice slower, finer, and less numerous hair regrowth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nair Wax Strips with Cherry Extract**:
â­ Slowly separate the wax strips, using one strip at a time. No rubbing required.
â­ Apply the wax strip to the desired area by pressing down firmly with your palm over the hair in the direction of hair growth.
â­ Hold the skin taut, then quickly pull off the strip in the opposite direction of hair growth, parallel to the skin.
â­ After waxing, use a post-wax finishing wipe to soothe, moisturize the skin, and remove any wax residue.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nair Wax Strips with Cherry Extract**:
â­ 97% natural origin ingredients.
â­ Cherry Extract for softening and moisturizing delicate skin.
â­ Dermatologically tested for suitability on sensitive skin.

#Nair #HairRemoval #WaxStrips #SmoothSkin #Skincare #Waxing #EasyHairRemoval #SkinMoisture #Beauty #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Introducing the **NIVEA Rich Nourishing Body Lotion**, your ultimate solution for dry to very dry skin. This lotion deeply nourishes, leaving your skin incredibly soft and smooth for up to 48 hours.

â­ Infused with NIVEA's deep moisture serum to visibly reduce skin dryness.
â­ Enriched with natural almond oil and vitamin E, providing intensive nourishment and comfort.
â­ The formula locks in deep moisture for 48 hours, keeping your skin hydrated all day.
â­ Result: Noticeably reduced roughness of very dry skin after just 1 application, leaving skin soft, smooth, and well-moisturized.
â­ Suitable for dry and very dry skin. Skin compatibility is dermatologically approved.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **NIVEA Rich Nourishing Body Lotion**

â­ Apply this body lotion daily all over your body.
â­ Gently massage into your skin until fully absorbed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **NIVEA Rich Nourishing Body Lotion**

â­ Aqua, Paraffinum Liquidum, Isohexadecane, Glycerin, Isopropyl Palmitate, PEG-40 Sorbitan Perisostearate, Cera Microcristallina, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil, Tocopherol, Magnesium Sulfate, Sodium Citrate, Citric Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, Potassium Sorbate, Linalool, Limonene, Benzyl Alcohol, Geraniol, Citronellol, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Benzoate, Parfum.

#NIVEA #BodyLotion #SkinMoisture #DrySkin #Skincare #DeepHydration #DailyCare #SaudiArabia #BeautyProducts #SkinHealth

description_en:
Experience unparalleled smoothness and radiance with **Nivea Pearl & Beauty Antiperspirant Spray**. This expertly formulated antiperspirant provides reliable 48-hour sweat and odor protection, keeping you fresh and confident. Infused with precious pearl extracts, **Nivea Pearl & Beauty Antiperspirant Spray** works to soften and even out the skin tone in your underarms, revealing beautiful, smooth skin. Free from ethyl alcohol and colorants, its skin compatibility is dermatologically proven, making it the perfect choice for your delicate skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Pearl & Beauty Antiperspirant Spray**
â­ Hold the can 15cm from your underarm and spray.
â­ Allow the product to dry completely.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Pearl & Beauty Antiperspirant Spray**
â­ Butane, Isobutane, Propane, Cyclomethicone, Aluminum Chlorohydrate, Isopropyl Palmitate.
â­ Parfum, Hydrolyzed Pearl, Persea Gratissima Oil, Octyldodecanol.
â­ Disteardimonium Hectorite, Dimethicone, Propylene Carbonate, Dimethiconol, Geraniol, Benzyl Alcohol.

description_en:
Experience deep cleansing and refined skin with **Nivea Face Skin Refining Clear-Up Strips**.

Activated with water, these innovative strips bond with blackheads and impurities, offering a deep cleanse. Their special soft-touch fleece ensures a perfect fit to uneven facial areas, especially the nose, leaving your skin feeling fresh with a pleasant lemon scent. Achieve a healthy and beautiful complexion, as skin compatibility is dermatologically approved.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Face Skin Refining Clear-Up Strips**:
â­ Use once a week as part of your face care routine.
â­ Wet the desired area with water.
â­ Apply the strip and let it dry for 10-15 minutes.
â­ Carefully remove the strip and follow with your Nivea Visage daily or nightly skincare products.

description_en:
Experience the ultimate care for your underarms with **Nivea Natural Fairness Roll-On**. This antiperspirant is specially formulated to soften and visibly fairer underarms, providing you with confidence that lasts. Enjoy reliable 48-hour antiperspirant protection combined with Nivea's gentle care. It's free from alcohol and colorants, and its skin tolerance is dermatologically proven.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Natural Fairness Roll-On**:
â­ Apply smoothly to the underarm area.
â­ Do not apply to irritated or damaged skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Natural Fairness Roll-On**:
â­ Aqua, Aluminum Chlorohydrate, PPG-15 Stearyl Ether, Steareth-2, Steareth-21, Parfum, Glycyrrhiza Glabra Root Extract, Hydrolyzed Pearl, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Persea Gratissima Oil, Glycerin, Trisodium EDTA, Linalool, Geraniol, Citronellol, Limonene.

Indulge your skin with **Nivea All Purpose Moisturizing Cream 400Ml**, the versatile cream specially formulated to provide deep hydration and superior nourishment for your skin. Its rich formula, infused with EuceritÂ®, Panthenol, and Glycerin, offers intensive protection and leaves your skin feeling soft and smooth. It's perfect for daily use on your face, hands, and body, especially on dry areas like knees, feet, and elbows.

**Nivea All Purpose Moisturizing Cream 400Ml** is completely safe for children's skin as it is preservative-free and dermatologically approved for all skin types.

description_en:
Experience unparalleled smoothness and radiance with **Nivea Pearl & Beauty Antiperspirant Roll-On for Women**. Enjoy reliable 48-hour antiperspirant protection with a formula that's gentle on your skin. Infused with natural pearl extracts, it leaves your underarm skin feeling soft and even-toned, giving you confidence throughout the day.

â­ Effective sweat and odor protection for 48 hours.
â­ Enriched with pearl extracts to soften and even out underarm skin tone.
â­ Free from alcohol and colorants, making it gentle on the skin.
â­ Dermatologically tested and approved for skin compatibility.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Pearl & Beauty Antiperspirant Roll-On for Women**:
â­ Apply to clean, dry underarm skin.
â­ Do not apply to irritated or damaged skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Pearl & Beauty Antiperspirant Roll-On for Women**:
â­ Aqua, Aluminum Chlorohydrate, PPG-15 Stearyl Ether, Steareth-2, Steareth-21, Parfum, Hydrolyzed Pearl, Persea Gratissima, Trisodium EDTA, BHT, Geraniol, Benzyl Alcohol.

description_en:
Experience a brighter, more even-toned complexion with **Nivea Natural Glow Body Lotion**. Its ultralight, fast-absorbing formula is enriched with an even-tone complex and vitamin C, working to naturally brighten and even out skin tone. Enjoy intense hydration for 48 hours thanks to its Vitamin C and Glycerin content, while UVA/UVB filters provide essential protection against sun damage. Suitable for normal to dry skin, **Nivea Natural Glow Body Lotion** is your go-to for healthy, radiant skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Natural Glow Body Lotion**:
â­ Apply this body lotion daily all over your body.
â­ Gently massage into your skin for optimal absorption.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Natural Glow Body Lotion**:
â­ Enriched with Vitamin C for intense hydration.
â­ Formulated with UVA/UVB filters for well-protected, even-toned skin.
â­ Ultralight, fast-absorbing formula.
â­ Contains Glycyrrhiza Glabra Root Extract, Fragaria Ananassa Fruit Juice, Rubus Fruticosus Juice, Rubus Idaeus Juice for a natural glow.
â­ Skin compatibility dermatologically approved.

#Nivea #BodyLotion #Skincare #Hydration #HealthySkin #SkinGlow #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah #Beauty

description_en:
Experience effective protection and freshness with **Nivea Clean Protect Women's Antiperspirant Spray with Alum, 150ml**. Its innovative formula provides reliable 48-hour antiperspirant protection, infused with Pure Alum and enriched with Vitamin E to enhance the softness and dryness of your underarms. **Nivea Clean Protect Women's Antiperspirant Spray with Alum, 150ml** is free from alcohol and colorants, making it gentle on your skin, your ideal choice for daily care. Enjoy protected and soft skin with this dermatologically proven formula.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Clean Protect Women's Antiperspirant Spray with Alum, 150ml**:
â­ Hold the can 15cm from the underarm and spray.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Clean Protect Women's Antiperspirant Spray with Alum, 150ml**:
â­ Women's antiperspirant spray.
â­ Enriched with Pure Alum and Vitamin E.
â­ 48-hour sweat protection.
â­ Alcohol and colorant-free.
â­ Gentle on skin.

description_en:
Experience lasting freshness with **Nivea Women Antiperspirant Fresh Cherry Spray**.

Our innovative formula provides reliable 48-hour antiperspirant protection, keeping you confident all day long. Enjoy the uplifting scent of juicy cherries that leaves your skin feeling noticeably dry and clean.

â­ Reliable 48-hour antiperspirant protection.
â­ Indulging fragrance of juicy cherries for a refreshing sensation.
â­ Leaves your skin feeling dry and clean.
â­ Free from alcohol and colorants for gentle skin tolerance.
â­ Dermatologically tested for proven skin compatibility.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Women Antiperspirant Fresh Cherry Spray**:
â­ Shake well before use. Hold can 15cm from the underarm and spray. Allow product to dry completely.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Women Antiperspirant Fresh Cherry Spray**:
â­ Butane, Isobutane, Propane, Cyclomethicone, Aluminum Chlorohydrate, Isopropyl Palmitate, Persea Gratissima Oil, Octyldodecanol, Dimethicone, Parfum.

#Nivea #Deodorant #BodyCare #CherryScent #Skincare #Freshness #WomensProducts #SaudiArabia #Fragrance #AntiperspirantSpray

description_en:
Discover brighter, smoother skin with **Nivea Fairness Cleansing Face Wash**. Enriched with Even Tone Complex & Vitamin C, it deeply cleanses and purifies the skin, reducing shine and enhancing your complexion for visibly fairer and smoother skin. Your skin looks clean and mattified, and feels smooth and supple. Skin compatibility dermatologically approved.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Fairness Cleansing Face Wash**:
â­ Moisten face, apply a small amount of wash and gently massage into a foam.
â­ Rinse off with lukewarm water.
â­ Avoid the eye area.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Fairness Cleansing Face Wash**:
â­ Aqua, Potassium Myristate, Propylene Glycol, Potassium Palmitate, Potassium Stearate, Glycerin, Potassium Laurate, PEG_150, PEG_8, Glyceryl Stearate, Hydrolyzed Pearl, Tocopheryl Acetate, Glycyrrhiza Glabra Root Extract, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Fucus Vesiculosus Extract, Nelumbium Speciosum Flower Extract, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Panthenol, Magnesium Chloride, Glyceryl Glucoside, 4_Butylresorcinol, Cera Alba, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Potassium Arachidate, Trisodium EDTA, Potassium Oleate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Linalool, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Geraniol, Parfum, CI 77891.

#Nivea #FaceWash #SkinLightening #Skincare #RadiantSkin #Glow #Moisturizing #BeautyProducts #SaudiArabia #Riyadh

description_en:
Experience invigorating freshness with **Nivea Fresh Cherry Antiperspirant Roll-On for Women**. This advanced formula provides reliable 48-hour antiperspirant protection, infused with the indulgent fragrance of juicy cherries, leaving you feeling confident all day long. It leaves your skin feeling dry and clean without any irritation, as it's free from alcohol and colorants. Skin tolerance is dermatologically proven, ensuring maximum safety and gentleness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Fresh Cherry Antiperspirant Roll-On for Women**:
â­ Apply underarm.
â­ Do not apply to irritated or damaged skin.
â­ For external use only.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Fresh Cherry Antiperspirant Roll-On for Women**:
â­ Aqua, Aluminum Chlorohydrate, Isoceteth-20, Paraffinum Liquidum, Butylene Glycol, Glyceryl Isostearate, Parfum, Persea Gratissima Oil, Propylene Glycol, PEG-150 Distearate, Maris Limus Extract, Ostrea Shell Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Lactic Acid, Linalool, Geraniol, Citronellol, Benzyl Alcohol, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citral.

#Nivea #Deodorant #CherryFreshness #BodyCare #Cosmetics #FreshScent #48HProtection #DrySkin #Skincare #SaudiArabia

Experience daily hydration for your skin with **Nivea Soft Moisturizing Cream**. Enriched with Vitamin E and Jojoba Oil, it provides unparalleled freshness and smoothness with quick absorption. Ideal for use on the face, hands, and body, and dermatologically approved for all skin types.

Its nourishing formula is perfect for daily use on your face, hands, and body, delivering a highly effective freshness kick with quick absorption.
