description_en:
Experience pure and refreshed skin with **Nivea Micellar Water Face Makeup Remover, 400Ml**. Expertly formulated to remove makeup and gently cleanse your skin without leaving any residue, allowing your skin to breathe freely. Enjoy a superior cleansing experience that requires no rinsing or rubbing, and is fragrance-free for ultimate skin comfort. **Nivea Micellar Water Face Makeup Remover, 400Ml** is dermatologically and ophthalmologically tested and approved for your safety.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Micellar Water Face Makeup Remover, 400Ml**:
â­ Shake well before use to ensure optimal product performance.
â­ Soak a cotton pad with the solution, then gently sweep across your face, eyes, and lips to remove makeup and cleanse the skin.
â­ No rinsing or rubbing is needed; enjoy clean and refreshed skin instantly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Micellar Water Face Makeup Remover, 400Ml**:
â­ Aqua, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Vitis Vinifera Seed Oil, Panthenol, Glyceryl Glucoside, Glycerin, Sorbitol, Decyl Glucoside, Poloxamer 124, Polyquaternium-10, Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Citric Acid, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Acetate, Propylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Trisodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol.

#Nivea #MakeupRemover #MicellarWater #SkinCleansing #Skincare #HealthySkin #Cosmetics #SaudiArabia #Jeddah #Riyadh

description_en:
Experience the gentle yet effective care of **Nivea Natural Fairness Antiperspirant Spray**. This innovative spray is designed to soften and visibly lighten your underarms, providing reliable 48-hour antiperspirant protection. Its alcohol-free and colorant-free formula is infused with Vitamin C to promote a fairer, even-toned complexion. Dermatologically proven to be kind to your skin, it leaves you feeling fresh and confident.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Natural Fairness Antiperspirant Spray**:
â­ Hold the can 15cm away from your underarm.
â­ Spray in short bursts.
â­ Allow the product to dry completely before dressing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Natural Fairness Antiperspirant Spray**:
â­ Enriched with Licorice and Pearl extracts for brighter underarms.
â­ Contains Vitamin C for skin lightening benefits.
â­ Features a quick-dry, anti-yellow staining formula.
â­ Offers 48 hours of antiperspirant protection.

description_en:
Say goodbye to stubborn eye makeup with **Nivea Double Effect Eye Makeup Remover**! Experience superior cleansing for the delicate skin around your eyes. Enriched with cornflower extract and purified water, **Nivea Double Effect Eye Makeup Remover** effectively removes waterproof mascara without harming your delicate lashes, while its gentle formula protects them. It removes makeup without harsh rubbing and leaves your skin refreshed without any unpleasant greasy residue.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Double Effect Eye Makeup Remover**

â­ Shake well before use to combine the formula.
â­ Apply to a cotton pad.
â­ Gently wipe the eye area to remove makeup.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Double Effect Eye Makeup Remover**

â­ Aqua, Isododecane, Isopropyl Palmitate, Dimethicone, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Centaurea Cyanus (Cornflower) Flower Extract, Sodium Chloride, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Trisodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Benzethonium Chloride, CI 60725, CI 61565.

Skin compatibility dermatologically & ophthalmologically approved.

description_en:
Discover natural radiance with **Nivea Antiperspirant Natural Radiance Stick for Women**. Experience reliable 48h antiperspirant protection and gentle Nivea care for softer, fairer, and even-toned underarms. This formula is free from ethyl alcohol, making it gentle on your skin. **Nivea Antiperspirant Natural Radiance Stick for Women** has been dermatologically proven for its skin tolerance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Antiperspirant Natural Radiance Stick for Women**:
â­ Apply underarm.
â­ Do not apply to irritated or damaged skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Antiperspirant Natural Radiance Stick for Women**:
â­ Aqua, Aluminum Chlorohydrate, PPG-14 Butyl Ether, Cetyl Palmitate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Propylene Glycol, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Parfum, Aluminum Sesquichlorohydrate, C20-40 Alkyl Stearate, Oleth-20, Glycyrrhiza Glabra Root Extract, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Hydrolyzed Pearl, Octyldodecanol, Persea Gratissima Oil, Glycerin, Steareth-2, Steareth-21, Myristic Acid, Arachidic Acid, Oleic Acid, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, BHT, Linalool, Citronellol, Geraniol.

description_en:
Experience the transformative power of **Nivea Luminous 630 Stretch Marks Reduction Body Oil 100ml**. See visible results in just 2 weeks, with the formula starting to work from day 1 to visibly reduce the appearance of stretch marks caused by pregnancy, hormonal changes, and weight fluctuations. This advanced oil also helps prevent new stretch marks with regular pinch massage, providing an instant smooth skin feel on stretch marks and 48-hour hydration. Reveal smoother, clearer skin with the effective formula of **Nivea Luminous 630 Stretch Marks Reduction Body Oil 100ml**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Luminous 630 Stretch Marks Reduction Body Oil 100ml**

â­ Apply once daily to targeted areas.
â­ Massage gently into the skin until fully absorbed.
â­ For best results, use on clean, dry skin.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place, away from direct sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Luminous 630 Stretch Marks Reduction Body Oil 100ml**

â­ Enriched with Luminous 630 to effectively target stretch marks.
â­ Deeply moisturizing oils for supple skin.
â­ Vitamin E to nourish and protect the skin.
â­ Dermatologically tested and suitable for all skin types.

description_en:
Indulge your skin with **Nivea All Purpose Moisturizing Cream 250Ml**, your ultimate solution for deep and lasting hydration. This rich and nourishing formula is developed with advanced moisturizing technology, featuring essential ingredients like EuceritÂ®, Panthenol, and Glycerin to provide your skin with a supremely soft and supple feel. It's ideal for daily use on the face, hands, and body, especially on areas that require extra care such as elbows and knees. **Nivea All Purpose Moisturizing Cream 250Ml** offers comprehensive nourishment and protection against dryness and roughness. It is preservative-free and safe even for children's skin, having been dermatologically tested and approved for all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea All Purpose Moisturizing Cream 250Ml**:
â­ Gently massage the cream onto clean, dry skin.
â­ Reapply as needed throughout the day for continuous hydration.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea All Purpose Moisturizing Cream 250Ml**:
â­ Aqua, Paraffinum Liquidum, Cera Microcristallina, Glycerin, Lanolin Alcohol (EuceritÂ®), Paraffin, Panthenol, Magnesium Sulfate, Decyl Oleate, Octyldodecanol, Aluminum Stearates, Citric Acid, Magnesium Stearate, Limonene, Geraniol, Hydroxycitronellal, Linalool, Citronellol, Benzyl Benzoate, Cinnamyl Alcohol, Parfum.

#Nivea #NiveaCream #SkinHydration #HealthySkin #Skincare #BodyMoisturizer #Beauty #SaudiArabia #Dubai #Riyadh

description_en:
Introducing **Nivea Black & White Invisible**, your ultimate solution for 48-hour antiperspirant protection that keeps your favorite clothes stain-free. This innovative formula prevents yellow stains on white clothing and white marks on black clothing, ensuring black stays black and white stays white for longer. Dermatologically tested for skin compatibility, it's free from ethyl alcohol and colorants for maximum comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Black & White Invisible**:
â­ Hold the can 15cm from the underarm and spray generously.
â­ Allow the product to dry completely before dressing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Black & White Invisible**:
â­ Butane, Isobutane, Propane, Cyclomethicone, Aluminum Chlorohydrate, Isopropyl Palmitate, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Palmitamidopropyltrimonium Chloride, Octyldodecanol, Propylene Glycol, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Propylene Carbonate, Dimethiconol, Linalool, Citronellol, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Limonene, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Geraniol, Parfum.

Experience ultimate softness and long-lasting protection with **Nivea Powder Touch Antiperspirant Roll-On for Women**. This unique product leaves your skin feeling silky smooth thanks to its Kaolin powder enrichment, and features a quick-dry formula for all-day comfort. **Nivea Powder Touch Antiperspirant Roll-On for Women** provides reliable 48-hour antiperspirant protection with Nivea's gentle care, dermatologically proven. Its alcohol-free formula ensures gentle and safe care for your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Powder Touch Antiperspirant Roll-On for Women**:
â­ Apply gently to the underarm area.
â­ Do not apply to irritated or damaged skin for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Powder Touch Antiperspirant Roll-On for Women**:
â­ Kaolin powder for a powder-soft skin feel.
â­ Gentle, alcohol-free formula.
â­ Effective 48-hour antiperspirant protection.
â­ Dermatologically proven skin tolerance.

description_en:
Experience ultimate hydration and comfort with **Nivea Aloe & Hydration Body Lotion**, specially formulated for normal and dry skin. This lotion delivers unparalleled moisturizing benefits, reducing skin dryness with its deep moisture serum and gently calming your skin with nourishing aloe vera. Enjoy long-lasting hydration for up to 48 hours, leaving you feeling comfortable and refreshed all day. **Nivea Aloe & Hydration Body Lotion** is skin-compatible and dermatologically approved for the highest level of care and safety.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Aloe & Hydration Body Lotion**:
â­ Apply this body lotion daily all over your body.
â­ Gently massage into your skin for better absorption.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Aloe & Hydration Body Lotion**:
â­ Infused with NIVEA deep moisture serum to reduce the dryness of your skin.
â­ Enriched with nourishing aloe vera for a calming effect.
â­ Locks in deep moisture for 48h.
â­ Suitable for normal and dry skin.
â­ Skin compatibility dermatologically approved.

description_en:
Discover the power of brightening and renewal with **Nivea Luminous 630 Body Cream**, specially formulated to reduce the appearance of stretch marks, sun blemishes, and pigment spots in just 4 weeks. This cream provides deep hydration that lasts for 48 hours, thanks to its light texture that absorbs quickly into the skin, leaving your skin soft and smooth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Luminous 630 Body Cream**:
â­ Gently massage the cream onto the targeted areas daily for optimal results.
â­ One daily application on the areas to be treated is sufficient for effective and comprehensive body care.
â­ With its fast-absorbing formula, the cream penetrates the skin quickly without leaving any greasy feel.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Luminous 630 Body Cream**:
â­ Aqua, Glycerin, Alcohol Denat., Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Glyceryl Stearate, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Tapioca Starch, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cocoglycerides, Octyldodecanol, Isobutylamido Thiazolyl Resorcinol, Tocopherol, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides, Carrageenan, Trisodium EDTA, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Hydroxide, Hydroxyacetophenone, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum.

#Nivea #Luminous630 #BodyCare #SkinBrightening #StretchMarks #SunBlemishes #HealthySkin #SkinMoisture #SkincareProducts #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience ultimate freshness with **Nivea Fresh Powerfruit Blueberry Shower Gel**. This refreshing shower gel transforms into a rich lather for a revitalized skin feeling, enriched with antioxidants and an alluring blueberry fragrance. Its IQ Hydra Formula keeps your skin moisturized, even after towel drying. Dermatologically approved and skin-compatible, enjoy revitalized and radiant skin with every wash.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Fresh Powerfruit Blueberry Shower Gel**:
â­ Apply a small amount of the gel onto a shower puff.
â­ Gently wash your body under water, enjoying the rich lather.
â­ Avoid direct contact with eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Fresh Powerfruit Blueberry Shower Gel**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine.
â­ Decyl Glucoside, Parfum, Glycerin.
â­ Vaccinium Myrtillus Fruit Extract, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate.
â­ Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Sodium Sulfate.
â­ Tocopherol, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate.
â­ Sorbic Acid, Linalool, Geraniol, Citronellol.
â­ CI 16035, CI 42090.

#Nivea #ShowerGel #BodyCare #Moisturizing #Freshness #Blueberry #Beauty #SkinCare #NiveaProducts #HealthAndBeauty

Indulge your skin with **Nivea Cocoa Butter Body Lotion**, specifically formulated for dry skin.

Infused with NIVEA's deep moisture serum, enriched with nourishing cocoa butter and vitamin E, this lotion effectively reduces skin dryness and provides 48 hours of indulging moisture care. Experience noticeably softer skin and deep, long-lasting hydration.

â­ Infused with deep moisture serum to reduce skin dryness.
â­ Enriched with cocoa butter and vitamin E.
â­ Provides indulgent moisture care for 48 hours.
â­ Leaves skin noticeably softer with deep hydration.
â­ Perfectly suitable for dry skin.
â­ Skin compatibility dermatologically approved.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Cocoa Butter Body Lotion**

â­ Cocoa Butter

â­ Cetearyl Alcohol

description_en:
Experience the gentle yet effective cleansing power of **Nivea Face Makeup Remover with Organic Rose Water**. This innovative formula effortlessly removes even waterproof makeup and impurities without any rubbing or rinsing, leaving your skin feeling purified and refreshed. Enriched with organic rose water, it soothes the skin, reducing redness and irritation, making it an ideal choice for dry and sensitive skin types. Enjoy soft, healthy-looking skin with every use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Face Makeup Remover with Organic Rose Water**:
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Soak a cotton pad with the micellar water.
â­ Gently swipe across your face, eyes, and lips to remove makeup and impurities.
â­ No rinsing required after application.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Face Makeup Remover with Organic Rose Water**:
â­ Organic Rose Water to soothe skin and reduce redness.
â­ Non-drying formula to maintain skin's moisture.
â­ Gentle cleanser effectively removes makeup and impurities.
â­ Suitable for dry and sensitive skin.

#Nivea #MicellarWater #MakeupRemover #Skincare #SensitiveSkin #RoseWater #FacialCleanser #Beauty #Hydration #SaudiBeauty

Experience ultimate freshness with **Nivea Fresh Comfort** Deodorant for Women, a spray designed to provide superior protection all day long. Its unique formula offers reliable 48-hour antiperspirant protection, ensuring you feel confident in every moment. Infused with a delightful bergamot and jasmine fragrance for long-lasting freshness, it leaves you feeling vibrant and beautiful. **Nivea Fresh Comfort** is completely free from alcohol and colorants, making it gentle on your skin, with dermatologically proven skin compatibility.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Fresh Comfort**:
â­ Hold the can 15cm from the underarm.
â­ Spray with a smooth motion.
â­ Allow to dry completely before dressing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Fresh Comfort**:
â­ Bergamot and Jasmine.
â­ Gentle, alcohol-free formula.
â­ Active ingredients for sweat protection.

Experience intense hydration and a refreshing boost with **Nivea Hydrating Face Mist, Organic Rose, 150ml**. This revitalizing mist is enriched with organic rose water and is 0% alcohol, leaving your skin with a rosy, glowing, and radiant complexion. Its unique formula primes and fixes makeup for longer wear, making it perfect for all skin types, even sensitive ones.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Hydrating Face Mist, Organic Rose, 150ml**

â­ Hold the bottle 20cm away from your face.
â­ Spray evenly onto the face with eyes closed.
â­ Use anytime during the day for a refreshing beauty boost with a relaxing rose fragrance.
â­ Spray onto the face before sleep for overnight hydration.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Hydrating Face Mist, Organic Rose, 150ml**

â­ Organic Rose Water.
â­ Alcohol-free formula.
â­ Intensely hydrates and tones skin.
â­ Promotes a rosy, glowing complexion.
â­ Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin.

description_en:
Discover radiant, smooth underarms with **Nivea Pearl & Beauty Antiperspirant Stick for Women**. This antiperspirant offers reliable 48-hour protection against sweat and odour, keeping you feeling fresh and confident all day long. Infused with precious pearl extracts, **Nivea Pearl & Beauty Antiperspirant Stick for Women** works to even out skin tone and leave your underarms feeling soft and beautiful. Its gentle formula is free from ethyl alcohol and colorants, and its skin compatibility is dermatologically proven for optimal care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Pearl & Beauty Antiperspirant Stick for Women**:
â­ Apply to clean, dry underarms.
â­ Do not apply to irritated or damaged skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Pearl & Beauty Antiperspirant Stick for Women**:
â­ Aqua, Aluminum Chlorohydrate, PPG-14 Butyl Ether, Cetyl Palmitate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Propylene Glycol, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Parfum, Aluminum Sesquichlorohydrate, C20-40 Alkyl Stearate, Oleth-20, Hydrolyzed Pearl, Octyldodecanol, Persea Gratissima Oil, Steareth-2, Steareth-21, Myristic Acid, Arachidic Acid, Oleic Acid, Oryzanol, BHT, Geraniol, Benzyl Alcohol.

#NiveaDeodorant #NiveaPearlBeauty #Skincare #UnderarmWhitening #SmoothSkin #48HourProtection #StickDeodorant #NiveaProducts #WomensBeauty #BodyCare

description_en:
Discover the gentle power of nature with **Nivea Rose Care Micellar Cleansing Water**, an effective face wash that combines deep cleansing with delicate hydration. It effortlessly removes waterproof makeup without harsh rubbing, leaving your skin clean and refreshed. Enriched with rose water, **Nivea Rose Care Micellar Cleansing Water** soothes the skin and reduces redness, making it ideal for sensitive skin. The innovative micellar technology ensures thorough cleansing without rinsing, preserving the skin's natural balance. Enjoy clean, soft, and smooth skin without any greasy residue. Dermatologically and ophthalmologically approved for all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Rose Care Micellar Cleansing Water**:
â­ Rinse your face with warm water to open pores.
â­ Apply the face wash onto your skin using your fingertips.
â­ Massage gently onto the face and neck in upward circular motions.
â­ Rinse off with lukewarm or cold water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Rose Care Micellar Cleansing Water**:
â­ Aqua, Glycerin, Coco-Betaine, Coco-Glucoside, Glyceryl Glucoside, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Sodium Chloride, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Sodium Benzoate, Trisodium EDTA, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Potassium Sorbate, Sorbic Acid, Linalool, Citronellol, Geraniol, Limonene, Methyl Benzoate, BHT, Parfum.

#Nivea #FaceWash #RoseWater #Skincare #Cleanser #MakeupRemover #HealthySkin #Hydration #Beauty #SaudiArabia

Experience ultimate freshness with **Nivea Waterlily & Oil Shower Gel**. This refreshing shower gel transforms into a rich lather, revitalizing your skin. Enriched with caring oil pearls and a soothing waterlily fragrance, it provides deep hydration that lasts even after towel drying. Its IQ Hydra Formula is gentle on your skin and dermatologically approved for all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Waterlily & Oil Shower Gel**:
â­ Apply a small amount onto your shower puff.
â­ Wash your body under water to create a rich lather.
â­ Enjoy clean, refreshed skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Waterlily & Oil Shower Gel**:
â­ Aqua
â­ Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil
â­ Glycerin
â­ Caring Oil Pearls & Waterlily Fragrance
â­ Tocopherol
â­ Natural Herbal Extracts

Introducing **Nivea All Purpose Moisturizing Cream 60Ml**, your ultimate solution for long-lasting hydration, leaving your skin soft and revitalized.

â­ Features a rich formula with Eucerit, Panthenol, and Glycerin for deep nourishment.
â­ Ideal for daily use on face, hands, and body, especially dry areas like knees, feet, and elbows.
â­ Delivers intensive moisturization, protecting skin from dryness and roughness.
â­ Preservative-free and suitable for children's skin.
â­ Dermatologically approved for all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea All Purpose Moisturizing Cream 60Ml**

description_en:
Discover the gentle cleansing power of **Nivea Micellar Water with Rose Water for Skin, 400ml**. This innovative micellar water effectively removes waterproof makeup, cleanses, and hydrates your skin without harsh rubbing. Enriched with natural Rose Water, **Nivea Micellar Water with Rose Water for Skin, 400ml** helps reduce redness and soothe skin irritation, making it ideal for sensitive skin. Thanks to Micellar Technology, it deeply cleanses and purifies your skin from impurities without stripping its natural barrier or causing dryness. Dermatologically and ophthalmologically approved for all skin types, it leaves your face clean, soft, and radiant with no greasy residue.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Micellar Water with Rose Water for Skin, 400ml**:
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Soak a cotton pad with the micellar water.
â­ Gently swipe the cotton pad across your face, eyes, and lips to remove makeup and impurities.
â­ No rinsing required.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Micellar Water with Rose Water for Skin, 400ml**:
â­ Aqua (Water).
â­ Glycerin for skin hydration.
â­ Rosa Damascena Flower Water for skin soothing.
â­ Micellar agents for effective and gentle cleansing.
â­ Light and refreshing fragrance.

#Nivea #MicellarWater #RoseWater #Skincare #MakeupRemover #FacialCleanser #Hydration #RadiantSkin #Beauty #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Indulge your skin with **Nivea Frangipani & Oil Shower Gel**, a refreshing shower gel that transforms into a rich lather for a revitalized skin feeling. Enriched with caring oil pearls and the exotic frangipani fragrance, it provides deep moisture that lasts. Its IQ HYDRA FORMULA keeps your skin moisturized, even after towel drying. Skin compatibility dermatologically approved.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Frangipani & Oil Shower Gel**:
â­ Apply a small amount of it on your shower puff.
â­ Wash your body under water.
â­ Avoid contact with eye area.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Frangipani & Oil Shower Gel**:
â­ Enriched with caring oil pearls and frangipani fragrance.
â­ IQ HYDRA FORMULA to keep your skin moisturized.
â­ Moisturised skin feeling, even after towel drying.
â­ Microplastic-free & 98% biodegradable formula.
â­ 96% recycled plastic bottle (excluding cap).
â­ Skin compatibility dermatologically approved.

#Nivea #ShowerGel #Skincare #SkinMoisture #Frangipani #Beauty #BathTime #NiveaProducts #SaudiArabia #SkinHealth

description_en:
Experience ultimate softness and lasting protection with **Nivea Pearl & Beauty Women's Antiperspirant Spray**. This innovative formula offers reliable 48-hour antiperspirant protection, infused with pearl extracts to even out skin tone for beautifully smooth underarms. Enjoy a feeling of freshness and confidence all day long with **Nivea Pearl & Beauty Women's Antiperspirant Spray**. It's free from ethyl alcohol and colorants, ensuring it's gentle on your skin, and its skin compatibility is dermatologically proven.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Pearl & Beauty Women's Antiperspirant Spray**:
â­ Hold the can 15cm away from your underarm.
â­ Spray for a few seconds.
â­ Allow the product to dry completely before dressing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Pearl & Beauty Women's Antiperspirant Spray**:
â­ Enriched with pearl extracts for skin softening.
â­ Free from ethyl alcohol and colorants.
â­ Dermatologically proven.
â­ Provides 48-hour sweat and odor protection.
â­ Leaves skin smooth and even-toned.
#Nivea #Deodorant #BodyCare #AntiperspirantSpray #BeautyHealth #Skincare #SaudiArabia #Beauty #Fragrance #Softness

description_en:
Achieve smoother, radiant skin with **Nivea Natural Glow Body Lotion 400 ml**. Its ultralight, fast-absorbing formula is enriched with the even-tone complex & vitamin C, along with vitamin E and glycerin for intense hydration that lasts up to 48 hours. This lotion provides effective UVA/UVB filter protection for well-protected, even-toned, and healthy-looking skin. Suitable for normal and dry skin, and dermatologically approved for skin compatibility.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Natural Glow Body Lotion 400 ml**:
â­ Apply this body lotion daily all over your body.
â­ Gently massage into your skin for optimal absorption.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Natural Glow Body Lotion 400 ml**:
â­ Enriched with the even-tone complex & vitamin C.
â­ Contains vitamin E and glycerin for intense hydration.
â­ Formulated with UVA/UVB filters for skin protection.

Experience superior protection and unparalleled freshness with **Nivea Fresh Roll-On Deodorant for Women 50ml**. Its unique formula is designed to provide reliable 48-hour antiperspirant protection, infused with ocean extracts for a long-lasting fresh feeling throughout the day.

â­ Reliable 48-hour antiperspirant protection.
â­ Infused with ocean extracts for deep, lasting freshness.
â­ Gentle formula, free from alcohol and colorants.
â­ Dermatologically tested and skin compatible.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Fresh Roll-On Deodorant for Women 50ml**

â­ Clean and dry the underarm area thoroughly.
â­ Apply a thin layer of the roll-on.
â­ Do not apply to irritated or damaged skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Fresh Roll-On Deodorant for Women 50ml**

â­ Aqua, Aluminum Chlorohydrate, Isoceteth-20, Paraffinum Liquidum, Butylene Glycol, GlycerylIsostearate, Parfum, Maris Limus Extract, Ostrea Shell Extract, Persea Gratissima Oil, PropyleneGlycol, PEG-150 Distearate, Linalool, Geraniol.

description_en:
Reveal a brighter, smoother complexion with **Nivea Fairness Exfoliating Face Scrub, 100Ml**. Enriched with Vitamin C and a color-perfecting complex, it cleanses pore-deep with purifying peeling scrubs, effectively removing dirt and makeup. This scrub reveals visibly fairer and smoother skin, leaving it feeling revitalized. Experience skin that's less oily and shiny, with dermatological compatibility approved.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Fairness Exfoliating Face Scrub, 100Ml**:

â­ Moisten face, apply a small amount of scrub and gently massage onto skin.
â­ Rinse off with lukewarm water.
â­ Use 2-3 times per week.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Fairness Exfoliating Face Scrub, 100Ml**:

â­ Aqua, Potassium Myristate, Propylene Glycol, Potassium Palmitate, Potassium Stearate, Glycerin, Potassium Laurate.
â­ Glyceryl Stearate, Hydrolyzed Pearl, Glycyrrhiza Glabra Root Extract, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate.
â­ Fucus Vesiculosus Extract, Nelumbium Speciosum Flower Extract, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Carnitine.
â­ Vitamin C and color-perfecting complex for fairness.
â­ Gentle exfoliating particles for pore-deep cleansing.

Its rich formula, enriched with Eucerit, Panthenol, and Glycerin, works to renew the skin and impart superior softness. **Nivea All Purpose Moisturizing Cream 150ml** is ideal for daily use on the face, hands, and body, especially for areas requiring extra care like elbows, knees, and feet.

âœ… Intensive moisturization for all skin types.
âœ… Leaves skin feeling smooth and soft.
âœ… Nourishes and protects the skin from dryness and roughness.
âœ… Preservative-free and suitable for children's skin.
âœ… Dermatologically approved.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea All Purpose Moisturizing Cream 150ml**:
â­ Apply generously to clean, dry skin.
â­ Massage gently until fully absorbed.
â­ Reapply as needed throughout the day to maintain hydration.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea All Purpose Moisturizing Cream 150ml**:
â­ Aqua, Paraffinum Liquidum, Cera Microcristallina, Glycerin, Lanolin Alcohol (EuceritÂ®), Paraffin, Panthenol, Magnesium Sulfate, Decyl Oleate, Octyldodecanol, Aluminum Stearates, Citric Acid, Magnesium Stearate, Limonene, Geraniol, Hydroxycitronellal, Linalool, Citronellol, Benzyl Benzoate, Cinnamyl Alcohol, Parfum.

description_en:
Experience unparalleled protection with **Nivea Invisible Black & White** roll-on. Its innovative formula provides effective 48-hour antiperspirant protection, while preserving the appearance of your clothes. The unique formula ensures black stays black and white stays white for longer, with superior protection against yellow stains. **Nivea Invisible Black & White** is free from alcohol and colorants, and dermatologically tested to ensure maximum skin care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Invisible Black & White**:
â­ Apply underarm.
â­ Do not apply to irritated or damaged skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Invisible Black & White**:
â­ New 5in1 formula: anti-odour, anti-sweat, anti-stains, anti-residues, anti-irritation.
â­ Provides reliable 48hour antiperspirant protection.
â­ White mark protection on black and anti-yellow staining on white.
â­ Black stays black, white stays white for longer.
â­ No ethyl alcohol or colorants.
â­ Skin compatibility dermatologically proven.

description_en:
Experience the invigorating power of the ocean with **Nivea Fresh, Deodorant For Women, Spray 200Ml**. 

â­ Provides reliable 48-hour antiperspirant protection. 
â­ Infused with ocean extracts for a long-lasting fresh feeling. 
â­ Leaves you feeling fresh all day long. 
â­ Free from alcohol and colorants to protect your skin. 
â­ Skin compatibility dermatologically proven. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Fresh, Deodorant For Women, Spray 200Ml**
â­ Hold the can 15cm from the underarm and spray. 
â­ Allow the product to dry completely. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Fresh, Deodorant For Women, Spray 200Ml**
â­ Butane, Alcohol Denat., Isobutane, Propane, Parfum, Butyloctanoic Acid, Methyl Phenylbutanol, Maris Limus Extract, Ostrea Shell Extract, Persea Gratissima Oil, Octyldodecanol, Aqua, Propylene Glycol, Linalool, Citronellol, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Geraniol.

description_en:
Experience ultimate skin nourishment with **Nivea Aloe & Hydration Body Lotion**. Infused with NIVEA's deep moisture serum and enriched with nourishing aloe vera, this lotion provides instant refreshment and locks in deep moisture for 48 hours. Its calming and hydrating formula is perfect for normal to dry skin, leaving it soothed, refreshed, and comfortably fragranced after just one application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Aloe & Hydration Body Lotion**

*  Apply this body lotion daily all over your body.
*  Gently massage into your skin until fully absorbed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Aloe & Hydration Body Lotion**

*  Infused with deep moisture serum to reduce skin dryness.
*  Enriched with nourishing aloe vera for a calming effect.
*  Provides 48-hour hydration.
*  Suitable for normal and dry skin.
*  Skin compatibility dermatologically approved.

It's suitable for dry and very dry skin, with dermatologically approved skin compatibility.

title_ar: Ù†ÙŠÙÙŠØ§ ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ù„ÙˆÙ…ÙŠÙ†ÙˆØ³ Ù„Ù„ÙˆØ¬Ù‡ Ù„Ù„Ø¥Ø´Ø±Ø§Ù‚Ø© Ø§Ù„Ù…ÙˆØ­Ø¯Ø© 40 Ù…Ù„ - ÙˆØ¯Ø§Ø¹Ø§Ù‹ Ù„Ù„Ø¨Ù‚Ø¹ Ø§Ù„Ø¯Ø§ÙƒÙ†Ø©!
description_en:
Reveal your skin's natural radiance with **Nivea Luminous Even Glow Day Fluid SPF 50 40ml**. This advanced formula harnesses the power of the patented LUMINOUS630 ingredient, combined with Hyaluronic Acid and Vitamin E, plus high SPF 50 protection.

The **Nivea Luminous Even Glow Day Fluid SPF 50 40ml** effectively targets existing pigmentation, helping to lighten dark spots and reduce their size. It also works to balance new melanin production, preventing the reappearance of new spots. Enjoy deeply moisturised, even-toned, and luminous skin with its lightweight, non-greasy texture.

This fluid is suitable for pregnant women and is gentle enough for all skin types, including sensitive skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Luminous Even Glow Day Fluid SPF 50 40ml**:
â­ Apply in the morning to a cleansed face.
â­ Use a maximum of 4 times a day after the LUMINOUS630 Serum.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Luminous Even Glow Day Fluid SPF 50 40ml**:
â­ Patented LUMINOUS630.
â­ Hyaluronic Acid.
â­ Vitamin E.
â­ SPF 50.
â­ Aqua, Homosalate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Ethylhexyl Triazone, Butylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Alcohol Denat., Bis-Ethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine, Dimethicone, Silica, Phenylbenzimidazole Sulfonic Acid, Tapioca Starch, Cetearyl Alcohol, Behenyl Alcohol, Methylpropanediol, Glycerin, Isobutylamido Thiazolyl Resorcinol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Chloride, Carbomer, Sodium Sulfate, Trisodium EDTA, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene, Parfum, CI 15985.

#Nivea #DayCream #SkinGlow #EvenSkinTone #DarkSpotCorrector #SkincareSaudi #BeautySaudi #LuminousSkin #Hyperpigmentation #SkincareRoutine

description_en:
Experience superior purity and deep hydration with **Nivea Gentle Cleansing Face Wash**, specially formulated to soothe and moisturize your dry skin. Enriched with natural almond oil, **Nivea Gentle Cleansing Face Wash** gently cleanses your skin while supporting its natural moisture balance, leaving you feeling comfortable and refreshed. Its light, dermatologically tested formula ensures maximum care for your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Gentle Cleansing Face Wash**:
â­ Gently rinse your face with warm water to open pores.
â­ Apply the face wash onto your face using your fingertips.
â­ Rub in small upward-moving circles for one minute all over the face.
â­ Rinse with cold water to ensure pores are closed after cleansing.
â­ Enjoy clean, moisturized, and soft skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Gentle Cleansing Face Wash**:
â­ Natural Almond Oil.
â­ Deep Hydration.
â­ Gentle formula for dry skin.
â­ Dermatologically approved.

#Nivea #FaceWash #SkinCare #DrySkin #Hydration #Freshness #Beauty #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah

description_en:
Experience a refreshing shower with **Nivea Frangipani Flower Shower Gel with Oil Pearls, 500ml**. This luxurious shower gel transforms into a rich lather for a revitalized skin feeling. Enriched with caring oil pearls and the captivating frangipani fragrance, it features the IQ HYDRA FORMULA to keep your skin moisturized. Enjoy a moisturized skin feeling, even after towel drying. The formula is microplastic-free and 98% biodegradable, housed in a 96% recycled plastic bottle (excluding the cap). Skin compatibility dermatologically approved.

â­ Transforms into a rich lather for a revitalized skin feeling.
â­ Enriched with caring oil pearls and frangipani fragrance.
â­ IQ HYDRA FORMULA to keep your skin moisturized.
â­ Moisturised skin feeling, even after towel drying.
â­ Microplastic-free & 98% biodegradable formula, 96% recycled plastic bottle (excluding cap).
â­ Skin compatibility dermatologically approved.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Frangipani Flower Shower Gel with Oil Pearls, 500ml**
â­ Apply a small amount onto your shower puff, then wash your body under water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Frangipani Flower Shower Gel with Oil Pearls, 500ml**
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Decyl Glucoside, Parfum, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Glycerin, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Cellulose, Cellulose Gum, Mannitol, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Algin, Sodium Sulfate, Tocopherol, Sodium Benzoate, Benzoic Acid, Geraniol, Linalool, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene, CI 77492, CI 42090.

description_en:
Experience all-day dryness and freshness with **Nivea Dry Comfort Antiperspirant Roll-On 50ml**. Featuring the DryPlus System for effective perspiration regulation and extra dry protection, combined with NIVEA's gentle care. Enjoy up to 48 hours of reliable antiperspirant protection and feel comfortably dry. Dermatologically tested and approved for your peace of mind.

â­ DryPlus System for effective perspiration regulation and extra dry protection.
â­ Comfortably dry and fresh all day long.
â­ 48H antiperspirant protection with NIVEA's mild care.
â­ Dermatologically tested and approved.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Dry Comfort Antiperspirant Roll-On 50ml**:
â­ Shake the roll-on deodorant bottle well before use.
â­ Lift your arm above your head.
â­ Apply the ball against the skin of your underarm area.
â­ Do not apply to irritated or damaged skin.
â­ For external use only.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Dry Comfort Antiperspirant Roll-On 50ml**:
â­ Aqua, Aluminum Chlorohydrate, PPG-15 Stearyl Ether, Steareth-2, Steareth-21, Parfum, Aluminum Sesquichlorohydrate, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Persea Gratissima Oil, Trisodium EDTA, Limonene, Linalool, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Geraniol, Citronellol, Benzyl Salicylate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citral, Benzyl Benzoate.

#Nivea #Deodorant #BodyCare #Antiperspirant #AllDayDry #Skincare #NiveaProducts #MadeInGermany #WomensFragrance #PersonalCare

description_en:
Stay refreshed and confident all day long with the **Nivea Fresh Natural Antiperspirant Stick for Women**, expertly formulated for reliable 48-hour antiperspirant protection.

â­ Advanced formula provides up to 48 hours of effective antiperspirant protection.
â­ Infused with ocean extracts for a long-lasting, refreshing feeling.
â­ Free from alcohol and colorants for gentle care.
â­ Skin compatibility dermatologically proven for safe and effective use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Fresh Natural Antiperspirant Stick for Women**:
â­ Apply to the underarm area.
â­ Do not apply to irritated or damaged skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Fresh Natural Antiperspirant Stick for Women**:
â­ Aqua, Propylene Glycol, PEG-8, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Parfum, Butyloctanoic Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Octyldodecanol, Persea Gratissima Oil, Distarch Phosphate, Myristic Acid, Arachidic Acid, Oleic Acid, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Sodium Hydroxide.

description_en:
Discover the secret to radiant, even-toned skin with **Nivea Luminous Even Glow Concentrated Serum 30 ml**. Our innovative, patented formula features the effective LUMINOUS630 ingredient, hydrating Hyaluronic Acid, and nourishing Vitamin E, to reduce existing dark spots and prevent new ones from appearing. This lightweight serum delivers visibly more even-toned and brighter skin, is gentle on the skin, and suitable for all skin types, including pregnant women and sensitive skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Luminous Even Glow Concentrated Serum 30 ml**:
â­ Apply morning and evening on cleansed skin.
â­ Follow with a SPF 50 day fluid in the morning for best results.
â­ Can be used a maximum of 4 times a day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Luminous Even Glow Concentrated Serum 30 ml**:
â­ Patented LUMINOUS630.
â­ Hyaluronic Acid for deep hydration.
â­ Vitamin E for protection and enhanced radiance.
â­ Aqua, Isopropyl Palmitate, Cetearyl Isononanoate, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Alcohol Denat., Cocoglycerides, Distarch Phosphate, Butylene Glycol, Methylpropanediol, Tapioca Starch, Isobutylamido Thiazolyl Resorcinol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Stearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Sodium Polyacrylate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Trisodium EDTA, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Sulfate, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Parfum.

#Nivea #SkinSerum #BrighteningSerum #DarkSpots #Skincare #BeautyProducts #Hydration #EvenSkinTone #RadiantSkin #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Experience refreshed and revitalized skin with **Nivea Cleansing Face Wash**. Enriched with the power of lotus flower and Hydra IQ technology, this gentle formula cleanses deeply, invigorates your skin, and supports its natural moisture balance. The mild formula is suitable for normal skin and dermatologically approved, making **Nivea Cleansing Face Wash** your daily essential for a healthy complexion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Cleansing Face Wash**:
â­ Rinse your face with warm water to open pores.
â­ Apply the face wash onto your skin using your fingertips.
â­ Gently massage in upward moving circles.
â­ Rinse off with lukewarm or cold water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Cleansing Face Wash**:
â­ Hydra IQ technology
â­ Lotus flower extract
â­ Supports skin's natural moisture balance
â­ Mild and dermatologically approved formula
â­ Invigorates the skin

Experience ultimate hydration with the **Nivea Organic Rose Water Hydrating Face Mask**, meticulously crafted to deliver deep and long-lasting moisture. Infused with organic Rose Water and Hyaluronic acid, this mask enhances your skin's moisture absorption, revealing a visibly radiant complexion. Its gentle formula is suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin, leaving you with a refreshed and revitalized feeling.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Organic Rose Water Hydrating Face Mask**
â­ For external use only.
â­ For best results, use the mask 3-4 times per week.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes.
â­ Do not apply on irritated or damaged skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Organic Rose Water Hydrating Face Mask**
â­ Organic Rose Water
â­ Hyaluronic Acid
â­ Other moisturizing and nourishing ingredients

description_en:
Rediscover your skin's radiance with **Nivea Micellar Brightening Water**, specially formulated for dull and sensitive skin. Enriched with Amino Acid Complex and a 5% Serum with Vitamin C & E, this micellar water effectively removes waterproof make-up, impurities, and dirt with just a few featherlight swipes, leaving no greasy residue and requiring no rubbing.

**Nivea Micellar Brightening Water** gently cleanses, brightens, revitalizes, and hydrates your skin for a more even and smooth complexion. Clinically tested for its brightening effect, it's perfume-free and has proven skin and eye compatibility, making it a safe choice for your skin.

â­ Removes waterproof make-up, impurities, and dirt with featherlight swipes.
â­ Enriched with 5% Serum with Vitamin C & E and Amino Acid Complex to revitalize and hydrate the skin.
â­ Gently cleanses and hydrates the skin, leaving no greasy residue.
â­ Perfume-free and dermatologically/ophthalmologically tested for safe use on face, eyes, and lips.
â­ Ideal for dull and sensitive skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Micellar Brightening Water**
â­ Shake well to mix both phases, then soak a cotton pad with Micellar Water.
â­ Gently wipe over your face and closed eyes to dissolve make-up and mascara.
â­ No rinsing needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Micellar Brightening Water**
â­ Water, Isododecane, Glycerin, C15-19 Alkane, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Arginine HCL, Citrus Sinensis Fruit Extract, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Isopropyl Palmitate, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Tocopherol, Zea Mays (Corn) Oil, Sodium Chloride, Trisodium EDTA, Sodium Hydroxide, Bis-Ethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxphenyl Triazine, Phenoxyethanol, Benzethonium Chloride, Decyl Alcohol, CI 4080.

title_ar: Ù†ÙŠÙÙŠØ§ ÙˆØ§Ù‚ÙŠ Ø´Ù…Ø³ Ù„Ù„ØªØ­ÙƒÙ… Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ù„Ù…Ø¹Ø§Ù† SPF 50 | Ø­Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ© Ø¹Ø§Ù„ÙŠØ© ÙˆØªØ±Ø·ÙŠØ¨ Ø¹Ù…ÙŠÙ‚
description_en:
Achieve a shine-free complexion and superior protection with **Nivea Sun Face Shine Control Cream**. This moisturizing face sunscreen is ideal for daily use, formulated with naturally derived antioxidant to prevent sun-induced lines, wrinkles, and pigmentation spots. It provides a smoother, brighter skin with highly effective UVA/UVB protection. Featuring a fast-absorbing, non-greasy, and water-resistant formula, it's the perfect choice to keep your skin protected and refreshed all day. Dermatologically approved.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Sun Face Shine Control Cream**:
â­ Apply generously before sun exposure and reapply frequently, especially after swimming, perspiring or toweling to maintain the original protection.
â­ Reducing the quantity will lower the level of protection significantly.
â­ Allow to absorb completely and avoid direct contact with textiles and hard surfaces to prevent staining.
â­ Do not stay too long in the sun, even while using a sunscreen product.
â­ Over-exposure to the sun is a serious health threat.
â­ Keep babies and young children out of direct sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Sun Face Shine Control Cream**:
â­ Aqua, Homosalate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Ethylhexyl Triazone, Butylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Alcohol Denat., Bis-Ethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine, Phenylbenzimidazole Sulfonic Acid, Silica, Cyclomethicone, Tapioca Starch, Behenyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Methylpropanediol, Glycerin, Glycyrrhiza Inflata Root Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Xanthan Gum, Carbomer, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Dimethicone, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Hydroxide, Trisodium EDTA, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Linalool, Limonene, Benzyl Alcohol, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Geraniol, Citronellol, Coumarin, Parfum.

#Nivea #Sunscreen #ShineControl #Skincare #SPF50 #SunProtection #Beauty #SaudiArabia #HealthySkin #SummerEssentials

description_en:
Achieve softer, fairer, and even-toned underarms with **Nivea Natural Radiance Deodorant Spray with Vitamin C & E**. Enjoy reliable 48-hour antiperspirant protection coupled with Nivea's gentle care. Infused with Vitamin C & E, this spray is alcohol and colorant-free and has been dermatologically tested for skin tolerance. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Natural Radiance Deodorant Spray with Vitamin C & E**:
â­ Hold the can 15cm from the underarm and spray.
â­ Allow the product to dry completely.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Natural Radiance Deodorant Spray with Vitamin C & E**:
â­ Vitamin C (Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate)
â­ Vitamin E (Tocopheryl Acetate)
â­ Avocado Oil (Persea Gratissima Oil)
â­ Licorice Root Extract (Glycyrrhiza Glabra Root Extract)
â­ Panthenol
â­ Alcohol and colorant-free formula
â­ Reliable 48h antiperspirant protection
â­ For softer, fairer, and even-toned underarms

#Nivea #Deodorant #Skincare #VitaminC #VitaminE #SaudiArabia #SkinLightening #SoftSkin #HealthySkin #PersonalCare

description_en:
Experience the secret to fairer, softer underarms with **Nivea Roll-On Natural Radiance C&E**. This deodorant offers reliable 48-hour antiperspirant protection combined with Nivea's gentle care, giving you confidence all day long. Its unique formula, infused with Vitamin C&E, works to lighten and soften underarm skin, leaving it even-toned and healthy. **Nivea Roll-On Natural Radiance C&E** is free from ethyl alcohol and colorants for maximum care, and its skin tolerance is dermatologically proven.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Roll-On Natural Radiance C&E**
â­ Apply underarm.
â­ Do not apply to irritated or damaged skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Roll-On Natural Radiance C&E**
â­ Aqua, Aluminum Chlorohydrate, PPG-15 Stearyl Ether, Steareth-2, Steareth-21, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Glycyrrhiza Glabra Root Extract, Persea Gratissima Oil, Panthenol, Glycerin, Pantolactone, Trisodium EDTA, Citric Acid, BHT, Parfum.

#Nivea #Deodorant #BodyCare #RadiantSkin #VitaminC #VitaminE #48hProtection #Skincare #NiveaProducts #SaudiArabia

Experience superior freshness and protection with **Nivea Fresh Comfort** Roll-On Deodorant for Women. Designed for lasting efficacy, it offers reliable 48-hour antiperspirant protection. Enjoy a long-lasting fresh scent infused with bergamot and jasmine, in a gentle formula free from alcohol and colourants. Dermatologically tested for skin compatibility.

â­ Reliable 48-hour antiperspirant protection.
â­ Infused with bergamot and jasmine scent for long-lasting freshness.
â­ Gentle on skin, free from alcohol and colourants.
â­ Dermatologically proven skin compatibility.

description_en:
Reveal revitalized and radiant skin with **Nivea Face Rice Scrub, Dry & Sensitive Skin, 75Ml**. This gentle scrub features a unique formula of organic rice and bio raspberry exfoliants to effectively remove dead skin cells without irritation. Experience a smoother, softer, and more luminous complexion. Perfect for dry and sensitive skin, it's even suitable for daily use for refined results.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Face Rice Scrub, Dry & Sensitive Skin, 75Ml**:
â­ Wet your face.
â­ Gently massage, avoiding the eye and lip area.

â­ Enjoy refined, soft, and radiant skin with **Nivea Face Rice Scrub, Dry & Sensitive Skin, 75Ml** even with daily use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Face Rice Scrub, Dry & Sensitive Skin, 75Ml**:
â­ Organic Rice & Bio Raspberry: 100% natural origin exfoliants.
â­ Rice-based scrub beads.
â­ Mild exfoliation formula.
â­ Suitable for dry and sensitive skin.
â­ Dermatologically approved skin compatibility.

description_en:
Indulge your skin with **Nivea Natural Glow Body Lotion 250 ml**, an innovative formula that grants your skin a natural radiance and even tone.

â­ Ultralight, fast-absorbing formula enriched with an even-tone complex and berry extracts to boost your skin's natural glow.
â­ Enriched with Vitamin C and Glycerin for intense hydration that lasts for 48 hours, keeping your skin soft and revitalized.
â­ Provides effective protection against harmful UVA/UVB rays, helping to prevent pigmentation and ensure evenly toned skin.
â­ Suitable for all skin types, it delivers a feeling of freshness and ultimate care.
â­ Skin compatibility dermatologically approved for maximum safety and efficacy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Natural Glow Body Lotion 250 ml**:
â­ Apply this body lotion daily all over your body.
â­ Gently massage into your skin until fully absorbed for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Natural Glow Body Lotion 250 ml**:
â­ Aqua, Dimethicone, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Cetyl Alcohol, Isopropyl Palmitate, Paraffinum Liquidum, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Glycyrrhiza Glabra Root Extract, Fragaria Ananassa Fruit Juice, Rubus Fruticosus Juice, Rubus Idaeus Juice, Tocopheryl Acetate, Glycerin, Glyceryl Stearate, Propylene Glycol, Arachidic Acid, Myristic Acid, Oleic Acid, Silica, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Sodium Carbomer, Trisodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylparaben, Methylparaben, Linalool, Limonene, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citronellol, Geraniol, Benzyl Alcohol, Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde, Benzyl Salicylate, Coumarin, Citral, BHT, Parfum.

#Nivea #BodyLotion #SkinHydration #Skincare #HealthySkin #RadiantSkin #SkinGlow #SaudiArabia #Jeddah #Riyadh

description_en:
Experience superior protection with **Nivea Black & White Invisible** Antiperspirant Spray for Women. Enjoy 48-hour sweat protection with an innovative formula that ensures black stays black and white stays white for longer, offering advanced protection against yellow stains on white clothing. **Nivea Black & White Invisible** is free from alcohol and colorants, and its skin compatibility has been dermatologically proven.

â­ Effective antiperspirant protection for 48 hours.
â­ Prevents white marks on black clothing.
â­ Protects white clothes from yellowing.
â­ Gentle formula, free from alcohol and colorants.
â­ Dermatologically proven skin compatibility.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Black & White Invisible**
â­ Hold the can 15cm from the underarm.
â­ Spray directly onto clean, dry skin.
â­ Allow the product to dry completely before dressing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Black & White Invisible**
â­ Butane, Isobutane, Propane, Cyclomethicone, Aluminum Chlorohydrate, Isopropyl Palmitate, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Palmitamidopropyltrimonium Chloride, Octyldodecanol, Propylene Glycol, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Propylene Carbonate, Dimethiconol, Linalool, Citronellol, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Limonene, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Geraniol, Parfum.

description_en:
Experience the purifying power of **Nivea Clear Up Deep Pore Cleanser**. This effective cleanser rebalances your skin in 5 ways, helping to soothe and reduce acne irritation. Achieve visibly improved skin in just 7 days. Its potent formula features 99% pure sea salt, salicylic acid, hyaluronic acid, and golden licorice extract for fast, effective results.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Clear Up Deep Pore Cleanser**:
â­ Wet your face with water.
â­ Gently massage the product onto your skin, avoiding the eye and lip area.
â­ Rinse off thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Clear Up Deep Pore Cleanser**:
â­ Aqua
â­ Lauric Acid
â­ Lauryl Hydroxysultaine
â­ Potassium Hydroxide
â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate

description_en:
Achieve visibly spot- and wrinkle-free skin with **Nivea Luminous 630 Dark Spots & Anti-Age Serum**. This innovative serum, featuring the patented Luminous630 ingredient, effectively tackles existing dark spots and reduces the appearance of wrinkles, delivering a more even and youthful-looking complexion in just 2 weeks. Enriched with Hyaluronic Acid and Squalane, its potent formula hydrates and boosts collagen production for plump, healthy skin. Dermatologically approved, the serum is gentle on all skin types, including sensitive skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Luminous 630 Dark Spots & Anti-Age Serum**:
â­ Begin by cleansing your face thoroughly.
â­ Apply the serum by evenly spreading it all over your face.
â­ Make it part of your daily routine in the morning and night for visibly spot- and wrinkle-free skin in 2 weeks.
â­ For best results, use the serum along with LUMINOUS630 Day Fluid SPF50.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Luminous 630 Dark Spots & Anti-Age Serum**:
â­ Aqua, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cocoglycerides, Methylpropanediol, Glyceryl Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Distarch Phosphate, Tapioca Starch, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Cetyl Palmitate, Squalane, Isobutylamido Thiazolyl Resorcinol, Glycine Soja Germ Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Xanthan Gum, Trisodium EDTA, Sodium Chloride, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum.

#Nivea #Luminous630 #Skincare #AntiAging #HyaluronicAcid #DarkSpots #BeautyRoutine #HealthySkin #NiveaSaudi #GlowUp

description_en:
Say goodbye to white marks on black clothes and yellow stains on white with **Nivea Antiperspirant Invisible Black & White Women Stick**. This innovative formula offers superior 48-hour antiperspirant protection, while keeping your clothes looking their best. Enjoy fresh, dry underarms all day long with confidence.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Antiperspirant Invisible Black & White Women Stick**:
â­ Apply to underarms.
â­ Do not apply to irritated or damaged skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Antiperspirant Invisible Black & White Women Stick**:
â­ Aqua, Aluminum Chlorohydrate, PPG-14 Butyl Ether, Cetyl Palmitate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Propylene Glycol, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Parfum, Aluminum Sesquichlorohydrate, C20-40 Alkyl Stearate, Oleth-20, Palmitamidopropyltri- monium Chloride, Steareth-2, Steareth-21, Myristic Acid, Arachidic Acid, Oleic Acid, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, BHT, Linalool, Citronellol, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene.

description_en:
Achieve a purified, shine-free complexion with **Nivea Purifying Face Wash**. This innovative formula is enriched with ocean algae and Hydra IQ for intense moisturization and deep pore cleansing. Its microfine exfoliating particles effectively reduce and prevent impurities, leaving your skin feeling smooth and refreshed. The mild formula is gentle and specifically designed for oily and combination skin, helping to maintain its natural moisture balance. Skin compatibility is dermatologically approved for your peace of mind.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Purifying Face Wash**:
â­ Gently rinse your face with warm water to open the pores.
â­ Apply a suitable amount of the face wash to damp skin.
â­ Massage gently onto the face in small, circular motions.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with cool water to help close the pores.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Purifying Face Wash**:
â­ Enriched with ocean algae extract for purifying and nourishing benefits.
â­ Contains Hydra IQ to maintain the skin's natural moisture balance.
â­ Microfine exfoliating particles for deep cleansing and impurity removal.
â­ Mild formula, safe and gentle for combination and oily skin.
â­ Dermatologically approved for skin compatibility.

#Nivea #FaceWash #Skincare #OilySkin #CombinationSkin #Purifying #ShineControl #BeautyProducts #SkinMoisture #SaudiBeauty

title_ar: Ù†ÙŠÚ¤ÙŠØ§ Ø¯ÙŠØ¨ Ø¥ÙƒØ³ØªØ±ÙŠÙ… Ù„Ù„Ø±Ø¬Ø§Ù„ Ø¨Ø®Ø§Ø® Ù…Ø²ÙŠÙ„ Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø±Ù‚ Ø§Ù„ÙƒØ±Ø¨ÙˆÙ†ÙŠ Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø³ÙˆØ¯ - 72 Ø³Ø§Ø¹Ø© Ø§Ù†ØªØ¹Ø§Ø´ - 150 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Experience unparalleled freshness with **NIVEA Men Deep Extreme Deodorant Spray**, providing deep freshness and superior protection for 72 hours. Enjoy a powerful masculine woody fragrance that boosts your confidence and attractiveness all day long, thanks to its formula enriched with Black Charcoal to effectively absorb moisture and neutralize odors.

â­ Delivers deep freshness that lasts up to 72 hours.
â­ Formula with Black Charcoal for effective moisture absorption and odor neutralization.
â­ Powerful masculine woody scent for all-day confidence and attractiveness.
â­ Protects against bacteria by over 99.9% in vitro.
â­ Leaves no white marks or stains on clothes.
â­ Cooling clean-skin feel with a dry, energized sensation.
â­ Practical 150ml spray design for easy portability and use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **NIVEA Men Deep Extreme Deodorant Spray**:
â­ Shake the canister well before use.
â­ Hold the can about 15 cm away from your underarm or desired area and spray evenly.
â­ Allow the deodorant to dry before dressing to maximize effectiveness.
â­ Use daily or as needed for continuous freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **NIVEA Men Deep Extreme Deodorant Spray**:
â­ Butane, Isobutane, Propane, Isopropyl Palmitate.
â­ Aluminum Chlorohydrate, Dicaprylyl Ether.
â­ Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Parfum.
â­ Charcoal Powder, Octyldodecanol.
â­ Persea Gratissima Oil, Disteardimonium Hectorite.
â­ Propylene Carbonate, Tocopherol.
â­ Linalool, Geraniol, Limonene.

#NiveaMen #Deodorant #MensFragrance #Skincare #MasculineScent #LongLastingFreshness #SaudiBeauty #PersonalCare #Grooming #DeodorantSpray

description_en:
Discover long-lasting freshness with **Nivea Pearl & Beauty Elegant Deodorant Spray**. This effective spray offers reliable 48-hour antiperspirant protection, ensuring you feel refreshed and confident all day long. Its unique formula is enriched with black pearl extract and luxurious perfume oils, working to soften and moisturize your underarm skin, leaving it silky smooth with an elegant and captivating scent. Enjoy a long-lasting fragrance and superior sweat and odor protection, all without alcohol or colorants.

â­ Reliable 48-hour antiperspirant protection.
â­ Softens and moisturizes underarms with black pearl extract.
â­ Long-lasting, elegant, and captivating fragrance.
â­ Alcohol and colorant-free for gentle skin care.
â­ Dermatologically tested and approved.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Pearl & Beauty Elegant Deodorant Spray**:
â­ Hold the can 15cm from your underarm.
â­ Spray evenly onto clean, dry skin.
â­ Allow to dry completely before dressing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Pearl & Beauty Elegant Deodorant Spray**:
â­ Butane, Isobutane, Propane.
â­ Isopropyl Palmitate, Aluminum Chlorohydrate.
â­ Dicaprylyl Ether, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride.
â­ Parfum, Persea Gratissima Oil, Hydrolyzed Pearl.
â­ Glycerin, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Octyldodecanol.
â­ Propylene Carbonate, Aqua, Tocopherol.
â­ Potassium Sorbate, Sorbic Acid, Linalool.
â­ Benzyl Salicylate, Benzyl Alcohol.

#Nivea #Deodorant #DeodorantSpray #PearlAndBeauty #48hProtection #BodyCare #ElegantFragrance #SoftSkin #SaudiArabia #NiveaProducts

description_en:
Experience unparalleled freshness with **Nivea Shower Gel Power Fresh**, specially formulated for men to invigorate both body and mind. Enriched with the power of menthol and a refreshing water mint scent, it leaves you feeling revitalized and energized for the entire day.

âœ¨ **Product Features:**
â­ 3IN1 FORMULA: Perfect for use on your body, hair, and face.
â­ Deeply cleanses the skin, leaving it feeling refreshed and energized.
â­ Enriched with MENTHOL and refreshing MINT for a long-lasting masculine fragrance and freshness.
â­ pH-balanced formula for healthy skin.
â­ Dermatologically tested and approved for skin compatibility.

ğŸ”¹ **Usage Instructions for Nivea Shower Gel Power Fresh**
â­ Wet your body thoroughly.
â­ Apply a suitable amount of **Nivea Shower Gel Power Fresh** to your entire body and face.
â­ Gently massage the shower gel onto your skin.
â­ Rinse your body well with water to remove any residue before patting yourself dry.

ğŸ”¹ **Ingredients of Nivea Shower Gel Power Fresh**
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Coco-Glucoside, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Parfum, Glycerin, Menthol, Mentha Aquatica Leaf Extract, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Limonene, Linalool.

#Nivea #ShowerGel #PowerFresh #Freshness #MensCare #BodyCare #Menthol #Mint #NiveaMen #SaudiArabia

title_ar: Ù†ÙŠÙÙŠØ§ ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ù†Ø§ÙŠØ© Ø§Ù„Ù„ÙŠÙ„ÙŠØ© Ù„ÙˆÙ…ÙŠÙ†ÙˆØ³ 630 Ù„ØªÙˆØ­ÙŠØ¯ Ø§Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© 50 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Wake up to revitalized, even-toned skin with **Nivea Luminous 360 Even Glow Face Cream Night Care, 30Ml**. This advanced night cream effectively targets dark spots, reducing their size, color, and density. Powered by the patented **LUMINOUS630** ingredient, it rebalances your skin tone and visibly lightens existing pigmentation, revealing a brighter, more radiant complexion.

â­ Rebalances skin tone and fights the reappearance of dark spots.
â­ Features patented **LUMINOUS630**, a highly effective ingredient against dark spots.
â­ Acts on 3 dimensions of dark spots: size, color, and intensity.
â­ Visibly lightens existing dark spots and reduces their number.
â­ Dermatologically approved and recommended for all skin types, including sensitive skin. Gentle and suitable for pregnant women.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Luminous 360 Even Glow Face Cream Night Care, 30Ml**:
â­ For best results, use as part of your nightly face care routine.
â­ Apply to face and neck using fingertips, in small circular upward moving strokes.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Luminous 360 Even Glow Face Cream Night Care, 30Ml**:
â­ Aqua, Glycerin, Isopropyl Palmitate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Methylpropanediol, Cocoglycerides, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Palmitate, Distarch Phosphate, Glyceryl Stearate, Dimethicone, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Isobutylamido Thiazolyl Resorcinol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Creatine, 1-Methylhydantoin-2-Imide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Carrageenan, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Chloride, Trisodium EDTA, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum.

#Nivea #NightCream #SkinBrightening #EvenSkinTone #Luminous630 #Skincare #Hydration #DarkSpots #SaudiBeauty #GlowSkin

description_en:
Experience unparalleled freshness with **Nivea Lemongrass & Oil Shower Gel**. This shower gel provides a revitalizing shower experience, leaving your skin soft, invigorated, and nourished with its unique formula.

Enriched with revitalizing lemongrass and care oil pearls, **Nivea Lemongrass & Oil Shower Gel** envelops your body in a silky, soft lather and stimulates your senses with its refreshing fragrance. It's formulated with Hydra IQ Technology, which keeps your skin feeling moisturized even after towel drying. **Nivea Lemongrass & Oil Shower Gel** is pH skin balanced, dermatologically approved, and suitable for all skin types.

At NIVEA, we care for your skin and our planet. That's why this shower gel is microplastic-free, has a 98% biodegradable formula, and its bottle is made from 96% recycled plastic (excluding the cap).

â­ REFRESHING shower gel transforms into a rich lather for a revitalized skin feeling.
â­ ENRICHED WITH caring oil pearls and invigorating lemongrass fragrance.
â­ IQ HYDRA FORMULA for moisturized skin feeling, even after towel drying.
â­ Microplastic-free & 98% biodegradable formula, 96% recycled plastic bottle (excluding cap).
â­ Skin compatibility dermatologically approved.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Lemongrass & Oil Shower Gel**:
â­ Take a shower and wet your skin thoroughly.
â­ Apply the shower gel to your entire body.
â­ Massage gently to create a rich lather.
â­ Rinse off thoroughly before patting yourself dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Lemongrass & Oil Shower Gel**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Decyl Glucoside, Parfum, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Glycerin, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Cellulose, Cellulose Gum, Mannitol, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Algin, Sodium Sulfate, Tocopherol, Sodium Benzoate, Benzoic Acid, Linalool, Citronellol, Citral, CI 77492, CI 10316, CI 42090.

#Nivea #ShowerGel #Skincare #Moisturizing #Freshness #NaturalFragrance #Lemongrass #DailyCare #BodyProducts #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience superior protection and gentle care with **Nivea Protect & Care** Antiperspirant Roll-On Deodorant. Enjoy 48-hour effective antiperspirant protection combined with the precious NIVEA Creme ingredients and its unique scent for a soft skin feeling. Dermatologically tested and approved, this non-irritating formula contains 0% ethyl alcohol, ensuring a gentle touch for your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Protect & Care** Antiperspirant Roll-On Deodorant
â­ Apply smoothly under your arms.
â­ Do not apply to irritated or damaged skin for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Protect & Care** Antiperspirant Roll-On Deodorant
â­ Aqua, Aluminum Chlorohydrate, Glycerin, PPG-15 Stearyl Ether, Steareth-2, Steareth-21, Parfum, Panthenol, Octyldodecanol, Persea Gratissima Oil, Trisodium EDTA, Geraniol, Limonene, Citronellol, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Linalool.

description_en:
Experience superior protection and long-lasting dryness with the **Nivea Antiperspirant Dry Comfort Stick for Women 50ml**. Featuring the DryPlus System, it effectively regulates perspiration and offers extra dry protection for ultimate dryness and all-day freshness. Enjoy 48-hour antiperspirant protection combined with NIVEA's trusted mild care. Dermatologically tested and approved for maximum safety and efficacy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Antiperspirant Dry Comfort Stick for Women 50ml**:
â­ Apply to the underarm area.
â­ Do not apply to irritated or damaged skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Antiperspirant Dry Comfort Stick for Women 50ml**:
â­ Aqua, Aluminum Chlorohydrate, PPG-14 Butyl Ether, Cetyl Palmitate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Propylene Glycol, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Parfum, Aluminum Sesquichlorohydrate, C20-40 Alkyl Stearate, Oleth-20, Octyldodecanol, Persea Gratissima Oil, Steareth-2, Steareth-21, Myristic Acid, Arachidic Acid, Oleic Acid, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, BHT, Citronellol, Limonene, Benzyl Alcohol, Geraniol.

title_ar: Ù†ÙŠÚ¤ÙŠØ§ Ù„Ù„Ø±Ø¬Ø§Ù„ Ø¯ÙŠØ¨ Ø¥ÙƒØ³ØªØ±ÙŠÙ… 72 Ø³Ø§Ø¹Ø© Ù…Ø²ÙŠÙ„ Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø±Ù‚ Ø§Ù„ÙƒØ±Ø¨ÙˆÙ†ÙŠ Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø³ÙˆØ¯ Ø±ÙˆÙ„ Ø£ÙˆÙ† 50 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Experience ultimate protection and freshness with **NIVEA MEN DEEP Extreme 72h Black Carbon Deodorant Roll-on 50ml**. This powerful roll-on offers up to 72 hours of reliable sweat and odor protection, powered by the purifying properties of Black Charcoal. Its advanced formula ensures deep freshness and a clean-skin feel, keeping you confident and energized throughout your day, no matter the activity. **NIVEA MEN DEEP Extreme 72h Black Carbon Deodorant Roll-on 50ml** is designed to be gentle on your skin, leaving it feeling smooth and cared for without irritation. Enjoy a bold, masculine fragrance that complements your active lifestyle. Its residue-free formula means no white marks or stains on your clothes, ensuring you look and feel your best.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **NIVEA MEN DEEP Extreme 72h Black Carbon Deodorant Roll-on 50ml**:
â­ Shake the bottle gently before use to ensure even distribution of the formula.
â­ Apply the roll-on directly to clean, dry underarms, ensuring full coverage.
â­ Allow the product to dry completely before getting dressed to maximize its effectiveness and prevent any staining.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **NIVEA MEN DEEP Extreme 72h Black Carbon Deodorant Roll-on 50ml**:
â­ Aqua
â­ Aluminum Chlorohydrate
â­ PPG-15 Stearyl Ether
â­ Steareth-2
â­ Steareth-21
â­ Parfum
â­ Charcoal Powder
â­ Trisodium EDTA
â­ BHT
â­ Linalool
â­ Citronellol
â­ Limonene
â­ Geraniol

Experience ultimate comfort with **Nivea Micellar Water Soothing**. Specially formulated for sensitive skin, it gently and effectively removes makeup, impurities, and dirt without the need for rubbing, leaving your skin clean, hydrated, and soothed. Its unique formula with Amino Acid Complex and Dexpanthenol deeply cares for your skin without leaving any uncomfortable residue. Enjoy refreshed, healthy-looking skin with every use.

â­ Effectively removes makeup, impurities, and dirt
â­ Gently cleanses, calms, soothes, and hydrates the skin
â­ Leaves 0% residue on the skin
â­ Perfume-free and suitable for sensitive skin
â­ Dermatologically and ophthalmologically tested for safe use on the face, eyes, and lips

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Micellar Water Soothing**
â­ Prepare: Soak a cotton pad with micellar water.
â­ Apply: Gently wipe over your whole face and closed eyes to dissolve makeup and mascara.
â­ Ready: No rinsing needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Micellar Water Soothing**
â­ Aqua, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Glycine, Vitis Vinifera Seed Oil, Panthenol, Pantolactone, Glycerin, Sorbitol, Decyl Glucoside, Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Propylene Glycol, 1-2-Hexanediol, Poloxamer 124, Citric Acid, Polyquaternium-10, Trisodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Cetrimonium Chloride, BHT.
â­ Special Ingredients: Dexpanthenol.
â­ Does not include Perfume.

#Nivea #MicellarWater #SensitiveSkin #Skincare #MakeupRemover #Hydration #SkinCalm #SaudiBeauty #NiveaProducts #SkinHealth

description_en:
Rediscover the radiance of your eyes with **Nivea Luminous 360 Even Glow Eye Serum**. This innovative serum offers an effective solution for dark circles and under-eye puffiness, providing a brighter and more youthful appearance. Powered by the patented LUMINOUS630, **Nivea Luminous 360 Even Glow Eye Serum** works to significantly reduce the appearance of dark spots, deeply moisturize the skin, and minimize fine lines and wrinkles. It's formulated to be gentle on the skin and suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin, and is dermatologically and ophthalmologically approved.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Luminous 360 Even Glow Eye Serum**:
â­ Apply morning and evening to the eye contour area, gently massaging with the applicator until fully absorbed.
â­ Suitable for daily use.
â­ Avoid direct contact with eyes.
â­ Do not use on irritated or damaged skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Luminous 360 Even Glow Eye Serum**:
â­ Aqua, Glycerin, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Methylpropanediol, Glyceryl Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Tapioca Starch, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cocoglycerides, Octyldodecanol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Isobutylamido Thiazolyl Resorcinol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Caffeine, Tocopherol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides, Caprylyl Glycol, Carrageenan, Xanthan Gum, Trisodium EDTA, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, CI 77891.

#Nivea #EyeSerum #DarkCircles #EyeCare #BrightEyes #SaudiBeauty #Skincare #Luminous630 #EyeGlow #RiyadhBeauty

description_en:
Experience unparalleled softness with **Nivea Sensual Musk Body Lotion**. Formulated with HYDRA IQ moisturizing technology for over 24 hours of hydration, it offers your skin superior care. Indulge in an intense and long-lasting musk fragrance that lasts for 48 hours, leaving you feeling comfortable and captivating all day. It leaves your skin noticeably soft and smooth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Sensual Musk Body Lotion**:
â­ Apply this body lotion daily all over your body.
â­ Gently massage into your skin until fully absorbed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Sensual Musk Body Lotion**:
â­ Aqua, Glycerin, Isopropyl Palmitate, Alcohol Denat., Glyceryl Stearate SE, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Dimethicone, Sodium Cetearyl Sulfate, Sodium Carbomer, Phenoxyethanol, Linalool, Limonene, Benzyl Alcohol, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Eugenol, Parfum.

description_en:
Indulge your sensitive skin with **NIVEA MEN Sensitive Shower Gel**. Experience superior freshness and lasting comfort thanks to its gentle formula enriched with bamboo extract. This gel is specially designed to soothe and cleanse your body, face, and hair without causing dryness, while maintaining your skin's pH balance. Its formula is 99% biodegradable and microplastic-free, making it a responsible choice for your daily care. Enjoy an invigorating scent that leaves your skin and hair feeling healthy and revitalized. **NIVEA MEN Sensitive Shower Gel** is your perfect companion for clean and well-cared-for skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **NIVEA MEN Sensitive Shower Gel**:
â­ Shower and wet your skin thoroughly.
â­ Apply the shower gel to your entire body, face, and hair.
â­ Massage the shower gel gently to create a rich lather.
â­ Rinse off residue thoroughly before patting yourself dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **NIVEA MEN Sensitive Shower Gel**:
â­ Bamboo Extract
â­ Especially caring formula
â­ For body, face & hair
â­ 99% biodegradable formula
â­ pH skin-balanced
â­ Microplastic-free formula
â­ Cleansing
â­ Intensive care
â­ Caring
â­ Sensitive skin
â­ All skin types

description_en:
Discover the power of radiant, blemish-free skin with **Nivea Luminous 630 Anti Blemish Marks Serum**. This innovative formula, featuring the patented Luminous630 ingredient, works effectively to fade dark spots, reduce their size, and give your skin visibly bright results in just 2 weeks. The triple-action serum visibly reduces dark spots, smoothes skin for a soft and refined texture, and mattifies for oil control. Harnessing the power of Salicylic Acid, this serum refines the skin through gentle exfoliation. Hyaluronic Acid and Green Tea Extract hydrate the skin and help balance its natural oils.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Luminous 630 Anti Blemish Marks Serum**:
â­ Cleanse your face thoroughly.
â­ Apply the serum by evenly spreading it on your face.
â­ Make it part of your daily routine in the morning and night for visibly blemish-free skin in 2 weeks.
â­ For best results, use the serum along with NIVEA SUN Cream SPF50.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Luminous 630 Anti Blemish Marks Serum**:
â­ Luminous630 (Patented active ingredient)
â­ Salicylic Acid (for refining and gentle exfoliation)
â­ Hyaluronic Acid (for deep hydration)
â­ Green Tea Extract (for balancing natural oils)
â­ Dermatologically approved formula, gentle on the skin.

#Nivea #Luminous630 #SkinSerum #Skincare #BrighteningSerum #DarkSpotCorrector #BlemishFree #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah

description_en:
Experience purity and refreshment with **NIVEA Micellar Restoring Water**, the perfect cleanser for dry and sensitive skin. It effectively removes makeup and impurities without the need for rubbing or rinsing, preserving your skin's natural barrier thanks to innovative Micellar Technology.

The formula is free from parabens, perfumes, and alcohol, ensuring superior care for your skin, making **NIVEA Micellar Restoring Water** your ideal choice for the face, eyes, and lips, leaving your skin smooth, supple, and radiant.

â­ Gently removes makeup and impurities.
â­ Protects the skin's natural barrier.
â­ Free from parabens, perfumes, alcohol, and colorants.
â­ Suitable for dry and sensitive skin.
â­ Requires no rinsing or rubbing.
â­ Leaves skin feeling soft and supple.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **NIVEA Micellar Restoring Water**:
â­ Soak a cotton pad with the micellar water.
â­ Gently sweep the cotton pad over your face, eyes, and lips to remove makeup and impurities.
â­ No rinsing is needed after use.
â­ For stubborn makeup, repeat the process with a fresh cotton pad.
â­ You can follow up with your regular skincare routine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **NIVEA Micellar Restoring Water**:
â­ Aqua, Isododecane, Glycerin, C15-19 Alkane, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Arginine HCL, Citrus Sinensis Fruit Extract, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Isopropyl Palmitate, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Tocopherol, Zea Mays Oil, Sodium Chloride, Trisodium EDTA, Sodium Hydroxide, Bis-Ethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine, Phenoxyethanol, Benzethonium Chloride, Decyl Alcohol, CI 40800.

#Nivea #MicellarWater #SkinCleanser #MakeupRemover #Skincare #SensitiveSkin #DrySkin #BeautyProducts #SkinHydration #HealthyBeauty

description_en:
Experience revitalized and supple skin with **Nivea Body Lotion Firming Moisturizing**. This advanced formula provides 48-hour intensive moisture care and is enriched with powerful antioxidants like Coenzyme Q10 and Vitamin C to visibly firm and tone your skin.

**Key Features & Benefits:**
â­ Delivers deep moisture for up to 48 hours.
â­ Revives and strengthens the skin's natural firmness.
â­ Delivers noticeable effects within 10 days of regular use.
â­ Specifically designed for normal skin types.
â­ Dermatologically tested for skin compatibility.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Body Lotion Firming Moisturizing**
â­ Apply this body lotion daily all over your body.
â­ Gently massage into your skin until fully absorbed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Body Lotion Firming Moisturizing**
â­ Formulated with powerful antioxidants - Coenzyme Q10 and Vitamin C.
â­ Contains essential moisturizing agents for optimal skin health.
