description_en:
Protect and brighten your skin with **Nivea Sun Protect & White Face Cream SPF 50 - 50ml**. This moisturizing face sunscreen is ideal for daily use, formulated with Active Whitening Complex to prevent the appearance of sun-induced fine lines, wrinkles, and pigment spots. It provides highly effective UVA/UVB protection with a fast-absorbing, non-greasy, and water-resistant formula. Skin compatibility is dermatologically approved.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Sun Protect & White Face Cream SPF 50 - 50ml**:
â­ Apply generously before sun exposure and reapply frequently, especially after swimming, perspiring, or toweling to maintain the original protection.
â­ Reducing the quantity will lower the level of protection significantly.
â­ Allow to absorb completely and avoid direct contact with textiles and hard surfaces to prevent staining.
â­ Do not stay too long in the sun, even while using a sunscreen product. Over-exposure to the sun is a serious health threat.
â­ Keep babies and young children out of direct sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Sun Protect & White Face Cream SPF 50 - 50ml**:
â­ Aqua, Butylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Titanium Dioxide, Ethylhexyl Triazone, Glycerin, Bis-Ethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine, Alcohol Denat., Cetyl Alcohol, Cyclomethicone, Diethylhexyl Butamido Triazone, Sodium Phenylbenzimidazole Sulfonate, Cetearyl Alcohol, C18-36 Acid Triglyceride, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides, Phenoxyethanol, Silica, Tocopheryl Acetate, VP/Hexadecene Copolymer, Xanthan Gum, Parfum, PEG-40 Castor Oil, Methylparaben, Ethylhexylglycerin, Ethylparaben, Trisodium EDTA, Sodium Cetearyl Sulfate, Dimethicone, BHT, Glycyrrhiza Glabra Root Extract.

description_en:
Experience nature's freshness with **Nivea Fresh Blends Shower Gel, Raspberry & Almond Milk 300ml**. Indulge in a unique formula that's 98% BIODEGRADABLE*, blended with naturally derived ingredients, FRUIT EXTRACTS, and nourishing ALMOND MILK. It provides beautiful, dewy skin with 90% NATURALLY DERIVED INGREDIENTS**. The **Nivea Fresh Blends Shower Gel, Raspberry & Almond Milk 300ml** bottle is made from 100% RECYCLED PET PLASTIC, offering skin care and love for the planet.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Fresh Blends Shower Gel, Raspberry & Almond Milk 300ml**:
â­ Apply a small amount of it on your shower puff then wash your body under water.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Fresh Blends Shower Gel, Raspberry & Almond Milk 300ml**:
â­ Blended with naturally derived ingredients, FRUIT EXTRACTS, and PLANT-BASED MILK.
â­ Enriched with Raspberry, Blueberry and Almond Milk.
â­ 98% BIODEGRADABLE FORMULA*.
â­ 90% NATURALLY DERIVED INGREDIENTS**.
â­ Bottle made of 100% RECYCLED PET PLASTIC.

#Nivea #ShowerGel #BodyCare #Moisturizing #SoftSkin #Raspberry #Blueberry #AlmondMilk #NaturalIngredients #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Introducing the **Nivea Clear Up Daily Face Scrub**, your ultimate solution for acne-prone skin. This powerful scrub deeply exfoliates and rebalances your skin, helping to reduce acne-causing bacteria by 99% and providing relief from acne redness within 24 hours. Experience visibly reduced acne in just 3 days, along with clearer, hydrated skin. 

â­ Rebalances skin in 5 ways
â­ Relief from acne redness in 24 hours
â­ Helps reduce acne bacteria by 99%
â­ Visibly reduces acne in 3 days

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Clear Up Daily Face Scrub**
â­ Wet face with water.
â­ Gently massage avoiding the eye and lip area.
â­ Rinse off with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Clear Up Daily Face Scrub**
â­ 99% Pure Sea Salt
â­ Salicylic Acid
â­ Hyaluronic Acid
â­ Golden Magnolia Extract

#Nivea #DailyScrub #ClearUp #Skincare #AcneControl #ClearSkin #PoreUnclogger #HydratedSkin #DailyCare #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Discover the secret to radiant, even-toned skin with **Nivea Luminous Even Glow Concentrated Serum 10ml**. This innovative serum features the patented LUMINOUS630 ingredient, powerfully effective against dark spots. It works on existing pigmentation to lighten spots and reduce their size, while also balancing new melanin production to prevent future spots from appearing. Enjoy a lightweight texture for deeply moisturized skin, thanks to cell-activating Hyaluronic Acid and protective Vitamin E. This **Nivea Luminous Even Glow Concentrated Serum 10ml** is suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin, and is safe for use during pregnancy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Luminous Even Glow Concentrated Serum 10ml**:
â­ Apply morning and night on a cleansed face for optimal results.
â­ Use as the first step in your skincare routine before applying the Day Fluid SPF 50.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Luminous Even Glow Concentrated Serum 10ml**:
â­ Contains the patented LUMINOUS630 ingredient.
â­ Enriched with Hyaluronic Acid for deep hydration.
â­ Fortified with Vitamin E for skin protection.

#Nivea #Serum #SkinLightening #DarkSpots #Skincare #Hydration #Beauty #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah

description_en:
Discover purity and softness with **Nivea Micellar Water 3-in-1**. This effective cleanser is designed to provide a comprehensive cleansing experience for dry and sensitive skin, gently removing makeup and impurities without leaving any residue. Let your skin breathe and enjoy a healthy, refreshed look.

**Nivea Micellar Water 3-in-1** offers you a complete solution for clean, hydrated, and soothed skin. Its unique formula is fragrance-free and skin-compatible, dermatologically and ophthalmologically approved, making it the ideal choice for daily care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Micellar Water 3-in-1**:
â­ Shake the bottle well before use to ensure product efficacy.
â­ Apply an appropriate amount to a clean cotton pad.
â­ Gently wipe over your face, eyes, and lips to remove makeup and impurities.
â­ No rinsing or rubbing is needed; enjoy instantly clean and refreshed skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Micellar Water 3-in-1**:
â­ Aqua
â­ PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil
â­ Vitis Vinifera Seed Oil
â­ Panthenol
â­ Glyceryl Glucoside
â­ Glycerin
â­ Sorbitol
â­ Decyl Glucoside
â­ Poloxamer 124
â­ Polyquaternium-10
â­ Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ Sodium Acetate
â­ Propylene Glycol
â­ 1,2-Hexanediol
â­ Trisodium EDTA
â­ Phenoxyethanol

description_en:
Discover gentle cleansing with **Nivea Baby Pure & Mild Shampoo**. This ultra-light formula, enriched with camomile, effectively cleanses and protects your baby's scalp from dryness and irritation. Carefully selected ingredients are ideal for sensitive baby skin, ensuring a 0% alkali scalp, skin-friendly pH value, and a formula free from parabens and colorants.

**Nivea Baby Pure & Mild Shampoo** is developed in cooperation with dermatologists and pediatricians, guaranteeing optimal safety and gentleness. Its eye compatibility is ophthalmologically approved, protecting your baby from tears.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Baby Pure & Mild Shampoo**:
â­ Wet hair and gently massage a small amount into hair and scalp.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Baby Pure & Mild Shampoo**:
â­ Aqua
â­ Decyl Glucoside
â­ Sodium Myreth Sulfate
â­ PEG-200 Hydrogenated Glyceryl Palmate
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract
â­ Bisabolol
â­ Glycerin
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Polyquaternium-10
â­ Sodium Benzoate
â­ Parfum.

#NiveaBaby #BabyShampoo #BabyCare #SensitiveSkin #Camomile #BabyProducts #NewbornEssentials #HairCare #GentleOnSkin #MadeInGermany

description_en:
Discover the gentle yet effective power of **Nivea Natural Fairness Eye Makeup Remover**, crafted to leave your eye area refreshed and revitalized.

Infused with Vitamin C, renowned for its brightening properties, this **Nivea Natural Fairness Eye Makeup Remover** effortlessly dissolves stubborn makeup, including waterproof mascara and eyeliner, in just one swipe. It deeply purifies and cleanses the skin, leaving it feeling clean and soft. The specialized formula also protects sensitive lashes, ensuring they remain healthy and strong. Dermatologically and ophthalmologically approved, you can trust the safety and efficacy of **Nivea Natural Fairness Eye Makeup Remover**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Natural Fairness Eye Makeup Remover**:
â­ Shake well before each use to ensure optimal product consistency.
â­ Apply a sufficient amount onto a cotton pad.
â­ Gently sweep the cotton pad across your eyes and lips to remove makeup.
â­ No rinsing is necessary; simply check for complete makeup removal.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Natural Fairness Eye Makeup Remover**:
â­ Vitamin C: For its brightening and skin-illuminating benefits.
â­ Gentle Formula: Effectively removes makeup without irritation.
â­ Deep Cleansing Agents: Ensure a thorough and purifying cleanse.
â­ Lash Protection: To maintain the health and vitality of your eyelashes.
â­ Medically Approved: Dermatologically and ophthalmologically tested.

#Nivea #MakeupRemover #EyeMakeup #SkinBrightening #Skincare #Beauty #SaudiArabia #Cosmetics #Hydration #Cleanse

description_en:
Experience instant freshness with **Nivea Soft Berry Blossom Cream**, your perfect moisturizer that deeply nourishes your skin with a vibrant, refreshing berry blossom scent. Its unique formula, enriched with Vitamin E and Jojoba Oil, keeps your skin moisturized every day, leaving it feeling smooth and supple thanks to its quick absorption. Ideal for face, hands, and body, and dermatologically approved for all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Soft Berry Blossom Cream**:
â­ Massage cream onto clean and dry skin.
â­ Reapply as needed throughout the day for extra hydration.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Soft Berry Blossom Cream**:
â­ Aqua, Glycerin, Paraffinum Liquidum, Myristyl Alcohol, Butylene Glycol, Alcohol Denat., Stearic Acid, Myristyl Myristate, Cera Microcristallina, Glyceryl Stearate, Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Lanolin Alcohol (EuceritÂ®), Polyglyceryl-2 Caprate, Dimethicone, Sodium Hydroxide, Carbomer, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool, Geraniol, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citronellol, Limonene, Parfum.

description_en:
Achieve radiant and even-toned skin in just 10 days with **Nivea Body Lotion Natural Glow Vitamin C & A 180 ml**. This enriching formula is packed with Vitamin C & A to deeply moisturize and soften your skin, leaving it feeling smooth and supple. Enjoy the delightful cherry scent that provides a lasting sense of freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Body Lotion Natural Glow Vitamin C & A 180 ml**:
â­ Apply this body lotion daily all over your body.
â­ Gently massage into your skin for optimal absorption.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Body Lotion Natural Glow Vitamin C & A 180 ml**:
â­ Aqua, Glycerin, Alcohol Denat., C15-19 Alkane, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Cetyl Alcohol, Isopropyl Palmitate, Dimethicone, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Ascorbic Acid, Malpighia Glabra Fruit Juice, Myrciaria Dubia Fruit Juice, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Mentha Piperita Leaf Extract, Nelumbo Nucifera Flower Extract, Vitis Vinifera Seed Oil, Ubiquinone, Glycyrrhiza Glabra Root Extract, Menthol, Propylene Glycol, Alcohol, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Ethylhexylglycerin, Trideceth-9, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Carbomer, Tapioca Starch, Trisodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Bisabolol, Linalool, Limonene, Citronellol, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, BHT, Parfum, CI 77891.

description_en:
Experience refreshing and effective underarm care with **Nivea Natural Fairness Antiperspirant Spray**. This **Nivea Natural Fairness Antiperspirant Spray** offers reliable 48-hour antiperspirant protection combined with Nivea's gentle touch, leaving your underarms feeling soft, fair, and even-toned. It's free from alcohol and colorants, making it suitable for all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Natural Fairness Antiperspirant Spray**:
â­ Hold the can 15cm from your underarm and spray.
â­ Allow the product to dry completely before dressing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Natural Fairness Antiperspirant Spray**:
â­ Infused with Vitamin C for brighter underarms.
â­ Skin tolerance dermatologically proven.
â­ Anti-yellow staining formula for garment protection.
â­ Quick-dry formula for immediate comfort.
â­ Free from alcohol and colorants.

description_en:
Discover brighter, more even-toned skin in 10 days with **Nivea Body Lotion Natural Glow Vitamin C & E**. Enriched with Vitamin C and Vitamin E, this lotion provides your skin with deep moisture and exceptional softness, while helping to fade dark spots.

Enjoy the refreshing, long-lasting orange scent for a delightful sensory experience. **Nivea Body Lotion Natural Glow Vitamin C & E** has been dermatologically tested for proven skin compatibility.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Body Lotion Natural Glow Vitamin C & E**:
â­ Apply this body lotion daily all over your body.
â­ Gently massage into your skin until fully absorbed.
â­ Reapply on dry skin parts if needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Body Lotion Natural Glow Vitamin C & E**:
â­ Aqua, Distarch Phosphate, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Alcohol Denat., Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Cetyl Alcohol, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ascorbic Acid, Myrciaria Dubia Fruit Juice, Glycyrrhiza Glabra Root Extract, Malpighia Glabra Frit Juice, Ubiquinone, Bisabolol, PEG-40 Castor Oil, Propylene Glycol, Trideceth-9, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Polyisobutene, Polysorbate 20, Sorbitan Isostearate, Glyceryl Glucoside, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Sodium Cetearyl Sulfate, Sodium Polyacrylate, Xanthan Gum, Acrylamide/Ammonium Acrylate Copolymer, Trisodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Ethylparaben, Methylparaben, Phenoxyethanol, Propylparaben, Alcohol, BHT, Parfum, Linalool, Geraniol, Limonene, Benzyl Alcohol, Citronellol.

Discover superior protection with **Nivea Stick Deodorant Active Shield with Alum Extract**. Enjoy 48 hours of reliable antiperspirant protection, thanks to its formula enriched with pure Alum and Vitamin E. It keeps your underarms feeling fresh and dry, while maintaining soft skin. Alcohol and colorant-free, and dermatologically proven, for complete skin comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Stick Deodorant Active Shield with Alum Extract**:
â­ Apply to the underarm area.
â­ Do not apply to irritated or damaged skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Stick Deodorant Active Shield with Alum Extract**:
â­ Aqua, Aluminum Chlorohydrate, PPG-14 Butyl Ether, Cetyl Palmitate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Propylene Glycol, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Parfum, Aluminum Sesquichlorohydrate, C20-40 Alkyl Stearate, Oleth-20, Potassium Alum, Tocopheryl Acetate, Panthenol, Pantolactone, Octyldodecanol, Persea Gratissima Oil, Glycerin, Steareth-2, Steareth-21, Myristic Acid, Arachidic Acid, Oleic Acid, Citric Acid, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydro-cinnamate, Citronellol, Geraniol, Benzyl Alcohol, Linalool, Limonene.

description_en:
Experience radiant skin with the **Nivea Urban Face Mask, Argan Oil & Shea, 1 Pc**. This sheet mask is expertly crafted to provide your skin with a healthy, luminous glow.

â­ Provides Radiance: Gives skin a healthy, natural glow and a radiant complexion.
â­ Nourishes: Intensively nourishes skin, leaving it soft and supple.
â­ Smoothes: Smoothes skin and gives your skin a fresher appearance.
â­ Infused with Argan oil and shea butter, suitable for sensitive skin.
â­ Features a biodegradable fibre mask for eco-conscious care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Urban Face Mask, Argan Oil & Shea, 1 Pc**
â­ For healthy-looking skin, treat yourself to a sheet mask twice a week.
â­ For an extra cooling kick, place the mask in the fridge before use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Urban Face Mask, Argan Oil & Shea, 1 Pc**
â­ Argan oil and shea butter.
â­ Magnolia officinalis bark extract.
â­ Vitis vinifera seed oil.

description_en:
Introducing **Nivea Urban Skin 3-In-1 Face Clay Wash**, your ultimate solution for city-dweller skin. This multi-action formula is enriched with Black Rice, Green Tea Extract, and Natural Clay to combat blemishes and urban impurities.

â­ **As a Wash:** Deeply cleanses the skin, reducing blemish-causing bacteria.
â­ **As a Scrub:** Exfoliates to purify pores and clarify skin by removing dead skin cells.
â­ **As a Mask:** Provides a mattifying effect and leaves skin looking radiant.

**Nivea Urban Skin 3-In-1 Face Clay Wash** is non-comedogenic, ensuring it won't clog pores, leaving your skin feeling refreshed and clean.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Urban Skin 3-In-1 Face Clay Wash**:
â­ As a Wash or Scrub: Apply once a day gently to a wet face, massaging smoothly in small upward circles. Rinse off with lukewarm water.
â­ As a Mask: Leave on the skin for 3-5 minutes before rinsing (2-3 times a week).

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Urban Skin 3-In-1 Face Clay Wash**:
â­ Natural Clay
â­ Green Tea Extract
â­ Black Rice
â­ Glycerin
â­ Paraffinum Liquidum
â­ Aqua

#Nivea #FaceWash #SkinCleanser #Skincare #FaceScrub #FaceMask #ClearSkin #BeautyProducts #SaudiArabia #DailyCare

Experience the daily pampering with **Nivea Soft Moisturizing Cream**, enriched with Vitamin E and Jojoba Oil to keep your skin moisturized every day. Its nourishing and intensive moisturizing formula is perfect for use all over your face, hands, and body, leaving your skin feeling smooth and hydrated. **Nivea Soft Moisturizing Cream** absorbs quickly, providing a refreshing and effective freshness kick. Dermatologically tested and approved for all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Soft Moisturizing Cream**
â­ For best results, apply daily, smoothing gently over the body.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Soft Moisturizing Cream**
â­ Enriched with Vitamin E and Jojoba Oil for daily skin hydration.
â­ Nourishing and intensive moisturizing formula.
â­ Delivers a highly effective freshness kick.
â­ Absorbs quickly, leaving skin smooth and moisturized.
â­ Dermatologically approved for all skin types.

description_en:
Experience light hydration and an instant cooling sensation with **Nivea Body Lotion Natural Fairness Cool Fresh 400ml**. Its non-greasy formula is enriched with Vitamin C for even skin tone and menthol extracts for a cool and fresh feeling. It is formulated with UVA/UVB filters for protection from harmful sun rays with SPF 15. Suitable for normal to dry skin, **Nivea Body Lotion Natural Fairness Cool Fresh 400ml** has skin compatibility dermatologically approved.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Body Lotion Natural Fairness Cool Fresh 400ml**:
â­ Apply daily all over your body.
â­ Gently massage into your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Body Lotion Natural Fairness Cool Fresh 400ml**:
â­ Aqua, Dimethicone, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Cetyl Alcohol, Isopropyl Palmitate, Paraffinum Liquidum, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Glycyrrhiza Glabra Root Extract, Fragaria Ananassa Fruit Juice, Rubus Fruticosus Juice, Rubus Idaeus Juice, Tocopheryl Acetate, Glycerin, Glyceryl Stearate, Propylene Glycol, Arachidic Acid, Myristic Acid, Oleic Acid, Silica, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Sodium Carbomer, Trisodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylparaben, Methylparaben, Linalool, Limonene, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citronellol, Geraniol, Benzyl Alcohol, Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde, Benzyl Salicylate, Coumarin, Citral, BHT, Parfum.

The **Nivea Clear Up Blemish Gel** is your ultimate solution for acne-prone skin, offering instant redness relief in 24 hours and helping to reduce acne bacteria by 99%. This effective gel visibly reduces spots in just 3 days, rebalancing your skin in 5 different ways.

â­ Helps lessen acne bacteria by 99%.
â­ Visibly reduces spots in just 3 days.
â­ Lightweight and fast-absorbing formula.

â­ Apply on spots directly.

â­ 99% Pure Sea Salt

description_en:
Experience the gentle cleansing power of **Nivea Cleansing Face Wipes, All Skin, 25 Wipes**. These innovative wipes are expertly designed to effectively remove waterproof makeup, cleanse, and hydrate your skin without harsh rubbing. Enriched with Rose Water, this unique formula helps reduce redness and soothe skin irritation. Micellar technology purifies your skin from impurities without drying it out or disrupting the skin's natural barrier. Dermatologically and ophthalmologically approved, they are suitable for all skin types, leaving your face clean, soft, and smooth, with no greasy residue.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Cleansing Face Wipes, All Skin, 25 Wipes**:
â­ Gently cleanse face, lips & eye area with a soft wipe, keeping the eyes closed.
â­ No rinsing needed.
â­ Carefully reseal the bag after use with the self-adhesive label to prevent drying out.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Cleansing Face Wipes, All Skin, 25 Wipes**:
â­ Rose Water for reduced redness and skin soothing.
â­ Micellar Technology for effective and gentle cleansing.
â­ Alcohol-free formula to avoid dryness.
â­ Hydrogenated Castor Oil for added cleansing and hydration.
â­ Vitamin E and Panthenol to support skin health.

#Nivea #MicellarWipes #RoseWater #Skincare #MakeupRemover #HealthySkin #Beauty #SaudiArabia #Hydration #CleansingWipes

description_en:
Discover the revitalizing power of the **Nivea Urban Skin Detoxifying Face Mask**, your ultimate solution for tired and stressed skin, especially for combination and oily skin types. Infused with the potent combination of Green Tea and Charcoal, this mask works to deeply cleanse and detoxify your skin from pollutants and daily stressors, leaving it feeling refreshed and looking healthy. It effectively reduces shine and impurities, promoting a mattified and clean complexion while offering a soothing and invigorating experience. Achieve a purified and radiant complexion with this effective facial mask.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Urban Skin Detoxifying Face Mask**
â­ For healthy-looking skin, treat yourself to this sheet mask twice a week.
â­ For an extra cooling kick, place the mask in the fridge before use.
â­ Biodegradable fibre mask.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Urban Skin Detoxifying Face Mask**
â­ Aqua, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Charcoal Powder, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Magnolia Officinalis Bark Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Xanthan Gum, PPG-26-Buteth-26, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Citric Acid, Biosaccharide Gum-4, Sodium Hydroxide, Benzyl Alcohol, Geraniol, Parfum.

#Nivea #FaceMask #Skincare #SkinDetox #GreenTea #Charcoal #HealthySkin #BeautyProducts #SaudiArabia #KSA

description_en:
Revitalize your skin with **Nivea Purifying Rice Scrub**! This effective scrub is formulated with organic rice and bio aloe vera to deeply cleanse, exfoliate, and refine your complexion. It works to clear blackheads, unclog pores, and manage excess oil, leaving your skin feeling refreshed and balanced.

**Product Details:**
â­ Manufacturer: Nivea
â­ Product Form: Gel
â­ Product Type: Scrub
â­ Quantity: 1 Pc
â­ Ideal for: Combination Skin

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Purifying Rice Scrub**:
â­ Wet your face.
â­ Gently massage, avoiding the eye and lip area.
â­ Rinse off thoroughly.
â­ Use up to twice a week for refined, soft, and radiant skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Purifying Rice Scrub**:
â­ Oryza Sativa Powder (Organic Rice)
â­ Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder (Bio Aloe Vera)
â­ Hydrated Silica
â­ Glycerin
â­ Tapioca Starch
â­ Panthenol
â­ Aqua
â­ Coco-Glucoside

description_en:
Experience a revitalized complexion with the **Nivea Clear Up Daily Serum**, meticulously crafted for acne-prone skin. This innovative serum rebalances the skin in 5 key ways, actively working to soothe acne irritation and reduce breakouts. Witness visibly improved skin in just 7 days. The **Nivea Clear Up Daily Serum** harnesses the power of a potent blend of 99% pure sea salt, salicylic acid, hyaluronic acid, and golden licorice to deliver effective results. Achieve clearer, healthier-looking skin with every application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Clear Up Daily Serum**:
â­ Apply to a cleansed face, morning and evening.
â­ Avoid direct eye contact.
â­ For optimal results, use consistently.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Clear Up Daily Serum**:
â­ Aqua, Glycerin, Tapioca Starch, Dimethicone, Cetearyl Alcohol.
â­ Salicylic Acid, Carnitine, Glycyrrhiza Inflata Root Extract, Maris Sal.
â­ Sodium Hyaluronate, Glycyrrhiza Glabra Root Extract.
â­ A potent combination of active ingredients to enhance skin health.

description_en:
Experience ultimate refreshment with **Nivea Urban Face Mask, Hyaluron & Aloe Vera**. This biodegradable fiber mask is infused with Hyaluronic Acid and Aloe Vera to intensely moisturize and smooth your skin, leaving it feeling refreshed, relaxed, and with a visibly fresher appearance. Perfect for regular use to achieve healthy-looking skin.

â­ Infused with Hyaluronic Acid and Aloe Vera for intense hydration.
â­ Refreshes, relaxes, and distresses skin.
â­ Smoothes skin for a fresher, revitalized look.
â­ Biodegradable fiber mask.
â­ Use twice a week for healthy-looking skin.
â­ For an extra cooling kick, place the mask in the fridge before use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Urban Face Mask, Hyaluron & Aloe Vera**
â­ For healthy-looking skin, treat yourself to a sheet mask twice a week.
â­ For an extra cooling kick, place the mask in the fridge before use.
â­ For external use only.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes.
â­ Do not apply to irritated or damaged skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Urban Face Mask, Hyaluron & Aloe Vera**
â­ Aqua, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Magnolia Officinalis Bark Extract, Vitis Vinifera Seed Oil, Xanthan Gum, PPG-26-Buteth-26, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Benzyl Alcohol, Parfum.

#Nivea #FaceMask #SkinHydration #HyaluronicAcid #AloeVera #Skincare #BeautyProducts #DeepMoisture #HealthySkin #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience a refreshing and smoothing sensation with **Nivea Smoothing Rice Scrub with Blueberry, 75ml**. This scrub gently and effectively renews your skin.

â­ **Product Features:**
â­ Features Organic Rice & Bio Blueberry: 100% natural origin exfoliants.
â­ Scrub Formula: Intensive exfoliation with rice-based scrub beads to remove dead skin cells without skin irritation.
â­ Result: Refined, smooth, and fresh skin.
â­ Skin compatibility dermatologically approved.
â­ Ideal for normal skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Smoothing Rice Scrub with Blueberry, 75ml**:
â­ Wet your face, then gently massage the scrub onto your skin, avoiding the eye and lip area.
â­ Rinse off thoroughly.
â­ Enjoy the benefits up to 4 times a week for refined, smooth, and fresh skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Smoothing Rice Scrub with Blueberry, 75ml**:
â­ Oryza Sativa Powder
â­ Aqua
â­ Vaccinium Myrtillus Fruit Extract
â­ Glycerin
â­ Panthenol
â­ Parfum

title_ar: Ù†ÙŠÙÙŠØ§ Ø±ØºÙˆØ© Ø­Ù„Ø§Ù‚Ø© Ù…Ù†Ø¹Ø´Ø© ÙˆØ¨Ø§Ø±Ø¯Ø© - 200 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Experience a superior shave with Nivea Shaving Foam Fresh & Cool. This foam is specifically designed for men's skin, providing a smooth and comfortable shave with an immediate cooling and refreshing sensation. Its rich formula effectively softens the beard, allowing the razor to glide effortlessly while minimizing irritation and nicks. Nivea foam protects your skin during shaving and leaves it invigorated and revitalized afterward.

Product Features:
â­ Delivers a refreshing and cool sensation to the skin.
â­ Softens the beard for a smooth and comfortable shave.
â­ Generates a rich, creamy lather for optimal shaving results.
â­ Protects the skin from cuts and irritation.
â­ Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin.
â­ Easy to use and spreads quickly on the skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Shaving Foam Fresh & Cool**:
â­ Shake the can well before use.
â­ Dispense an adequate amount of foam onto your palm.
â­ Apply the foam evenly on your dampened face.
â­ Gently massage the foam into your beard to soften the hair.
â­ Shave as usual using a razor.
â­ Rinse your face with water to remove excess foam.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Shaving Foam Fresh & Cool**:
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Stearic Acid
â­ Butane
â­ Isobutane
â­ Propane
â­ Glycerin
â­ Potassium Hydroxide
â­ Menthol
â­ Parfum (Fragrance)
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ Linalool
â­ Limonene

#Nivea #ShavingFoam #SmoothShave #CoolingFreshness #MensCare #HealthySkin #ComfortableShave #NiveaProducts #SaudiArabia #MensGrooming

description_en:
**Nivea Men Face Body Moisturising Cream** is your ultimate skincare solution.

**Nivea Men Face Body Moisturising Cream** is specially formulated for extra-fast absorption by men's skin, preventing dryness and providing long-lasting deep hydration. Its light, non-greasy formula, enriched with vitamin E and a pleasant masculine-fresh fragrance, makes it ideal for your face, body, and hands, leaving you feeling refreshed and confident. Dermatologically approved and suitable for all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Men Face Body Moisturising Cream**:
â­ Massage cream onto clean and dry skin on your face, body, and hands.
â­ Reapply as needed throughout the day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Men Face Body Moisturising Cream**:
â­ Aqua, Glycerin, Paraffinum Liquidum, Alcohol Denat, Cetyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides, Stearyl Alcohol, Cera Microcristallina, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Carbomer, Myristic Acid, Arachidic Acid, Oleic Acid, Dimethicone, Phenoxyethanol, Methylparaben, Geraniol, Parfum.

description_en:
Experience a superior shave with **Nivea Men Deep Shaving Foam**, offering advanced protection and a deep clean for your skin.

This innovative foam cleanses your skin deeply, providing an ultra-smooth glide for your razor, with exceptional protection that leaves your skin feeling clean and refreshed long-lastingly. Its unique formula with black carbon transforms from black to white, powerfully acting against bacteria for healthy-looking skin.

â­ Deeply cleanses the skin and provides a long-lasting clean feeling.
â­ Innovative formula with black carbon acts powerfully against bacteria.
â­ Acts as a protective lubricating shield for the razor.
â­ Ensures a smooth and precise razor glide for a comfortable shaving experience.
â­ Protects the skin from micro-cuts, sensitivity, and irritations.
â­ Supports the skin's natural protective barrier.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Men Deep Shaving Foam**:
â­ Shake the can well before use and hold it upright.
â­ Massage the foam directly onto a wet face.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Men Deep Shaving Foam**:
â­ Aqua, Isobutane, Triethanolamine, Laureth-23, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Glycerin, Charcoal Powder, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose, PEG-7M, Myristic Acid, Arachidic Acid, Oleic Acid, Potassium Hydroxide, Butane, Propane, Piroctone Olamine, Linalool, Limonene, Parfum, CI 77266

#Nivea #ShavingFoam #MensGrooming #DeepClean #BlackCarbon #Skincare #Shaving #SmoothShave #HealthySkin #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience ultimate gentleness with **Nivea Cleansing Face Wipes, Normal, 25 Wipes**. These wipes are specially designed to cleanse and moisturize your skin gently with their advanced formula and ultra-soft, interlocked layers. The alcohol-free formula effectively removes all traces of makeup and impurities without causing dryness, leaving your skin clean and refreshed.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Cleansing Face Wipes, Normal, 25 Wipes**
â­ Gently cleanse face, lips & eye area with a soft wipe, keeping the eyes closed.
â­ No rinsing needed.
â­ Carefully reseal the bag after use with the self-adhesive label to prevent drying out.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Cleansing Face Wipes, Normal, 25 Wipes**
â­ Gentle, alcohol-free formula.
â­ Enriched with Vitamin E.
â­ Cleanses thoroughly.
â­ Moisturizes and refreshes.
â­ Suitable for normal skin.

title_ar: Ø¨Ø®Ø§Ø® Ù†ÙŠÙÙŠØ§ Ù„Ù„Ø­Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ© ÙˆØ§Ù„ØªØ±Ø·ÙŠØ¨ Ø¨Ø¹Ø§Ù…Ù„ Ø­Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ© 50+ | ØªØ±Ø·ÙŠØ¨ ÙˆØ­Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ© Ø¹Ø§Ù„ÙŠØ©
description_en:
Experience superior sun protection with **Nivea Protect & Moisture SPF 50+ Spray**. Designed to offer broad-spectrum protection against harmful UVA and UVB rays, its powerful SPF50+ rating helps prevent sunburn and premature skin aging.

The Nivea spray features a lightweight formula that absorbs quickly into the skin without leaving a greasy or sticky residue, making it ideal for everyday use and outdoor activities. In addition to protection, its moisturizing ingredients work to nourish and keep the skin hydrated, even in sunny conditions. It is suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin, and is dermatologically tested for safety.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Protect & Moisture SPF 50+ Spray**:
â­ Shake the can well before use.
â­ Spray generously and evenly onto exposed skin 15-20 minutes before sun exposure.
â­ Reapply every two hours, or more frequently after swimming, sweating, or towel drying.
â­ Avoid prolonged direct sun exposure, especially during peak hours.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Protect & Moisture SPF 50+ Spray**:
â­ Aqua, Homosalate, Alcohol Denat., Glycerin, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Bis-Ethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Dibutyl Adipate, Ethylhexyl Triazone, Glyceryl Stearate, Phenylbenzimidazole Sulfonic Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, Butylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Hydrogenated Rapeseed Oil, Copernicia Cerifera Cera, Cetyl Palmitate, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Xanthan Gum, Cellulose Gum, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Trisodium EDTA, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Chloride, Linalool, Benzyl Alcohol, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citronellol, Anise Alcohol, Parfum.

title_ar: Ù†ÙŠÙÙŠØ§ ØµÙ† ÙÙŠØ³ Ø¯ÙŠØ±Ù…Ø§ Ù„Ù…ÙƒØ§ÙØ­Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø´ÙˆØ§Ø¦Ø¨ Ø¨Ø¹Ø§Ù…Ù„ Ø­Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ© Ù…Ù† Ø§Ù„Ø´Ù…Ø³ 50+ØŒ 40 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Experience superior sun protection with **Nivea Sun Face Derma Blemish Control SPF 50+, 40 ml**. This sunscreen is specifically developed to shield your facial skin from harmful sun rays, focusing on blemish control for a clear complexion.

â­ HIGH SUN PROTECTION: **Nivea Sun Face Derma Blemish Control SPF 50+, 40 ml** is developed to protect healthy facial skin from the inside out with SPF 50+.
â­ IMMEDIATE UVA & UVB DEFENSE: Formulated with SPF 50+, this sun protection cream absorbs quickly for immediate defense against harmful UVA and UVB rays, and protects from HEV light effects like premature skin aging.
â­ FOR BLEMISH-PRONE SKIN: The sunscreenâ€™s anti-blemish formula with Niacinamide protects and helps prevent blemishes by absorbing excess oil from the skinâ€™s surface.
â­ DELIVERS A MATTIFYING LOOK: It provides 8 hours of matte effect, delivering a non-shiny look. Plus, the sunscreen does not clog pores, leaving your skin looking healthy and moisturized.
â­ IDEAL FOR NORMAL TO COMBINATION SKIN: Developed for normal to combination skin, this lightweight daily sunblock is also dermatologically and ophthalmologically approved, ensuring it does not cause irritation when applied around the eye area.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nivea Sun Face Derma Blemish Control SPF 50+, 40 ml**:
â­ Apply generously before sun exposure and reapply frequently, especially after swimming, perspiring, or toweling to maintain original protection.
â­ Reducing the quantity will significantly lower the level of protection.
â­ Allow to absorb completely and avoid direct contact with textiles to prevent staining.
â­ Do not stay too long in the sun, even while using a sunscreen product.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nivea Sun Face Derma Blemish Control SPF 50+, 40 ml**:
â­ Aqua, Alcohol Denat., C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Butylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Ethylhexyl Triazone, Isopropyl Palmitate, Bis-Ethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine, Dibutyl Adipate, Diethylamino Hydroxybenzoyl Hexyl Benzoate, Phenylbenzimidazole Sulfonic Acid, Tapioca Starch, Polyglyceryl-6 Stearate, Distarch Phosphate, Silica Dimethyl Silylate.
â­ Glycyrrhiza Inflata Root Extract, Carnitine, Niacinamide, Decylene Glycol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Oryza Sativa Starch, Copernicia Cerifera Cera, Polyglyceryl-6 Behenate, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose, Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Hydroxide, Hydroxyacetophenone, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum.

description_en:
Discover the power of growth with **Nuralac Plus Milk (3)**, the advanced formula specially designed to support your child's development from 1 to 3 years old. Give your child a healthy start with every sip, ensuring they receive essential vitamins and minerals for optimal physical and cognitive development.

â­ Promotes physical and mental growth.
â­ Contains a balanced blend of vitamins and minerals.
â­ Pleasant taste for children.
â­ Easy to digest.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nuralac Plus Milk (3)**

*   Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water before preparing the feed.
*   Boil the bottle, nipple, and cap for 5 minutes.
*   Boil water for 5 minutes and then let it cool to 40Â°C.
*   Add the correct number of scoops for your child's age as indicated in the feeding table.
*   Use only the scoop provided inside the package.
*   After preparation, cover the bottle and shake well before use.
*   Always hold your baby during feeding. Leaving them alone may cause choking.
*   Do not keep leftover feed for more than 2 hours.
*   Do not freeze the feed.
*   Consume the can within one month of opening.
*   Store the can in a cool, dry place at room temperature.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nuralac Plus Milk (3)**

*   Skimmed Milk.
*   Lactose.
*   Vegetable Oils (Palm Olein, Coconut, Soy, High Oleic Sunflower).
*   Whey Protein Concentrate (from Cow's Milk).
*   Galacto-Oligosaccharides (GOS).
*   Emulsifier (Soy Lecithin).
*   Corn Syrup Solids.
*   Calcium Carbonate.
*   Sodium Ascorbate.
*   Choline Chloride.
*   Potassium Chloride.
*   Arachidonic Acid (ARA).
*   Docosahexaenoic Acid (DHA).
*   A variety of essential vitamins and minerals for healthy growth.

description_en:
Discover **Nuralac Baby Milk (2)**, specifically designed to meet the needs of infants from 6 to 12 months old, as part of their diet during and after weaning. This advanced formula features the NuraComplete system, combining high-quality proteins, Omega-3 and Omega-6, DHA, and prebiotic dietary fibers to support your baby's healthy growth and cognitive development.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nuralac Baby Milk (2)**:
â­ Important Note: Breast milk is the best food for infants. Consult your doctor before deciding to use infant formula.
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water before preparing the feed.
â­ Boil clean bottles, nipples, and rings in water for 5 minutes.
â­ Boil water for 5 minutes and then cool it down to 40Â°C.
â­ Add the correct number of scoops for your baby's age as indicated on the feeding chart on the can.
â­ Use only the scoop provided inside the can.
â­ After preparation, cover the bottle and shake well before feeding.
â­ Always hold your baby during feeding. Leaving your baby unattended could cause choking.
â­ Do not store leftover feed for more than 2 hours after the start of feeding.
â­ Do not freeze the feed.
â­ Consume the contents within one month of opening the can.
â­ Store the can in a cool, dry place at room temperature not exceeding 25Â°C, away from heat.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nuralac Baby Milk (2)**:
â­ Corn syrup solids, skim milk, vegetable oils (palm olein, coconut, soy, high oleic sunflower).
â­ Whey protein (cowâ€™s milk), galacto-oligosaccharides (GOS), lactose, emulsifier (soy lecithin).
â­ Calcium carbonate, acidity regulator (potassium hydroxide), sodium ascorbate, D-glucose.
â­ Sodium caseinate, choline chloride, magnesium phosphate.
â­ Arachidonic acid (ARA) from single-cell oil, docosahexaenoic acid (DHA) from single-cell oil.
â­ Inositol, ferrous sulfate, taurine, DL-alpha tocopheryl acetate, zinc sulfate.
â­ Cytidine monophosphate, retinyl palmitate, antioxidant (ascorbyl palmitate).
â­ Ascorbic acid, niacinamide, adenosine monophosphate, uridine monophosphate, phytomenadione.
â­ Cholecalciferol, calcium pantothenate, cupric sulfate, D-biotin.
â­ Guanosine monophosphate, riboflavin, thiamine hydrochloride, pyridoxine hydrochloride.
â­ Manganese sulfate, sodium iodide, folic acid, sodium selenite, cyanocobalamin.

#Nuralac #BabyFormula #InfantNutrition #Stage2Formula #BabyHealth #HealthyBabyFood #SaudiMoms #BabyCare #FormulaFeeding #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Introducing **Nuralac Baby Milk (1)**, the ideal solution for your baby's nutrition from birth up to 6 months when breastfeeding is not possible. Specially formulated to provide essential nutrients for healthy and comprehensive growth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nuralac Baby Milk (1)**

âœ… Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water before preparation.
âœ… Boil the baby's bottle, nipple, and cap for 5 minutes to ensure sterilization.
âœ… Boil water for 5 minutes and let it cool to 40Â°C.
âœ… Add the appropriate number of scoops for your baby's age as per the feeding guide.
âœ… Use only the scoop provided inside the package.
âœ… After preparation, cover the bottle and shake well before feeding.
âœ… Always hold your baby while feeding, and never leave baby unattended.
âœ… Do not store leftover formula after 2 hours from the start of feeding.
âœ… Do not freeze the formula.
âœ… Consume the can within one month of opening.
âœ… Store the product in a cool, dry place at room temperature (not exceeding 25Â°C).
âœ… Keep away from heat sources.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nuralac Baby Milk (1)**

â­ Lactose, Vegetable Oils (Palm Olein, Coconut, Soy, High Oleic Sunflower), Skim Milk, Whey Protein (from Cow's Milk).
â­ Galacto-oligosaccharides (GOS), Emulsifier (Soy Lecithin), Corn Syrup Solids.
â­ Essential Minerals and Vitamins for baby's development such as: Calcium, Iron, Zinc, Vitamin D, and B vitamins.
â­ Contains Arachidonic Acid (ARA) and Docosahexaenoic Acid (DHA) to support brain and eye development.
â­ Acidity regulators, Magnesium Phosphate, Inositol, Taurine, etc.

description_en:
Discover optimal nutrition for your child with **Nuralac Plus Milk 3 Growing Up**, specifically designed to support their vital growth stages. This 900 gm twin pack offers a perfect balance of essential nutrients for healthy growth and proper development.

**Why choose Nuralac Plus Milk 3 Growing Up?**
â­ Fortified with essential vitamins and minerals for strong bones and immune system.
â­ Contains DHA and ARA to support brain development and vision.
â­ Balanced formula for easy digestion and nutrient absorption.
â­ Economical twin pack for continuous supply.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nuralac Plus Milk 3 Growing Up**:
â­ Wash hands thoroughly before preparing the milk.
â­ Sterilize all feeding utensils.
â­ Use cooled boiled water (40Â°C) to prepare the formula.
â­ Add the specified amount of powder according to the feeding guide.
â­ Shake the bottle well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Check the milk's temperature before feeding your baby.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nuralac Plus Milk 3 Growing Up**:
â­ Skimmed Milk Powder.
â­ Lactose.
â­ Vegetable Oils (Palm Olein, Rapeseed Oil, Coconut Oil).
â­ Demineralized Whey.
â­ Whey Protein Concentrate.
â­ Vitamins (A, D3, E, K1, C, B1, B2, Niacin, B6, Folic Acid, B12, Biotin, Pantothenic Acid).
â­ Minerals (Calcium Carbonate, Potassium Chloride, Magnesium Chloride, Ferrous Sulfate, Zinc Sulfate, Copper Sulfate, Manganese Sulfate, Potassium Iodide, Sodium Selenite).
â­ Essential Fatty Acids (DHA, ARA).
â­ Natural Flavour (if applicable).
â­ Soy Lecithin (as emulsifier).

description_en:
Product Description:

**Nuralac** H8 is a specialized infant formula for babies from birth up to 12 months, specifically developed to support infants experiencing colic, gas, and fussiness resulting from protein or lactose intolerance. Its easily digestible formulation features partially hydrolyzed protein and a lower lactose load for gentle comfort for your baby.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nuralac**:

â­ Hygiene First: Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water before preparing the feed.
â­ Sterilize Equipment: Boil the clean bottle, nipple, and cap in water for 5 minutes.
â­ Water Temperature: Boil water for 5 minutes, then cool it to approximately 40Â°C before mixing.
â­ Accurate Measurement: Add the correct number of scoops for your baby's age as per the feeding guide on the back of the can. Use only the scoop provided.
â­ Preparation: After adding water, cover the bottle and shake well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ During Feeding: Always hold your baby during feeding. Leaving your baby unattended may cause choking.
â­ After Feeding: Do not save unfinished formula. Discard any remaining formula within 2 hours of starting the feed.
â­ Storage: Store the can in a cool, dry place at room temperature (not exceeding 25Â°C). Keep away from heat.
â­ Shelf Life: Consume the contents within one month of opening the can.
â­ Important Warning: Do not freeze the powder and never heat prepared formula in a microwave.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nuralac**:

â­ Vegetable oils (palm olein, coconut, soy, high oleic sunflower).
â­ Partially hydrolyzed whey protein (cow's milk).
â­ Corn syrup solids.
â­ Emulsifier (soy lecithin).
â­ Potassium chloride.
â­ Calcium phosphate.
â­ Calcium carbonate.
â­ Magnesium phosphate.
â­ Protein stabilizer (potassium citrate).
â­ Choline chloride.
â­ Protein stabilizer (sodium citrate).
â­ Sodium ascorbate.
â­ D-glucose.
â­ Sodium caseinate.
â­ Arachidonic acid (ARA) from single cell oil.
â­ Docosahexaenoic acid (DHA) from single cell oil.
â­ Inositol.
â­ Taurine.
â­ Ferrous sulfate.
â­ DL-alpha tocopheryl acetate.
â­ Zinc sulfate.
â­ L-carnitine.
â­ Retinyl palmitate.
â­ Antioxidant (ascorbyl palmitate).
â­ Cytidine monophosphate.
â­ Niacinamide.
â­ Vitamin K (Phytomenadione).
â­ Ascorbic acid.
â­ Cholecalciferol.
â­ Uridine monophosphate.
â­ Calcium pantothenate.
â­ Adenosine monophosphate.
â­ D-biotin.
â­ Cupric sulfate.
â­ Guanosine monophosphate.
â­ Riboflavin.
â­ Thiamine hydrochloride.
â­ Pyridoxine hydrochloride.
â­ Manganese sulfate.
â­ Sodium iodide.
â­ Folic acid.
â­ Sodium selenite.
â­ Cyanocobalamin.

description_en:
Introducing **Nuralac Plus** Stage 4, the advanced growth formula designed to support your child's development from 3 to 7 years old. This nourishing formula provides essential nutrients for healthy growth and cognitive development.

â­ Supports healthy bone development with essential calcium and Vitamin D.
â­ Contains DHA and ARA for brain and vision development.
â­ Balanced blend of vitamins and minerals to boost immunity.
â­ Delicious taste that children will love.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nuralac Plus**:

â­ Add 5 scoops of **Nuralac Plus** powder to 150 ml of lukewarm water (around 40Â°C).
â­ Shake well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Serve warm to your child.
â­ Discard any leftover formula within two hours of feeding.
â­ Store the can in a cool, dry place and consume within one month of opening.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nuralac Plus**:

â­ Skimmed milk powder.
â­ Vegetable oil blend (palm olein, coconut, soy, high oleic sunflower).
â­ Galacto-oligosaccharides (GOS).
â­ Minerals and Vitamins (Calcium, Iron, Vitamin D, Vitamin A, Vitamin C).
â­ Docosahexaenoic Acid (DHA) and Arachidonic Acid (ARA).

title_en: Nuralac Baby Milk AR 400 gm - For Reflux Relief
title_ar: Ù†ÙŠÙˆØ±Ø§Ù„Ø§Ùƒ Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ Ø§ÙŠÙ‡ Ø§Ø± 400 Ø¬Ù… - Ù„Ø¹Ù„Ø§Ø¬ Ø§Ù„Ø§Ø±ØªØ¬Ø§Ø¹
description_en:
Introducing **Nuralac Baby Milk AR 400 gm**, a specially formulated infant milk designed to help manage regurgitation in healthy infants from birth up to 12 months of age. It can be used as the sole source of nutrition for the first six months. Please note that it should not be used with separate thickeners or antacids, and always consult a pediatrician before use.

â­ Specially formulated for infants with regurgitation.
â­ Suitable from birth up to 12 months.
â­ Can be used as the sole source of nutrition for the first six months.
â­ Use under medical supervision.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nuralac Baby Milk AR 400 gm**
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water.
â­ Boil bottle, nipple, and cap for 5 minutes.
â­ Boil water, then cool to 40Â°C.
â­ Add the correct number of scoops per infant's age as per the feeding guide on the can.
â­ Use only the scoop provided.
â­ Cover the bottle and shake well before feeding.
â­ Always hold your baby while feeding; leaving them alone may cause choking.
â­ Discard any leftover formula after 2 hours.
â­ Do not freeze prepared formula.
â­ Consume within one month of opening.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place at room temperature, away from heat.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nuralac Baby Milk AR 400 gm**
â­ Skim milk, vegetable oils (palm olein, coconut, soy, high oleic sunflower).
â­ Whey protein concentrate, corn starch.
â­ Galacto-oligosaccharides (GOS), emulsifier (soy lecithin).
â­ Essential vitamins and minerals for healthy development.
â­ Calcium carbonate, sodium ascorbate, choline chloride.

title_ar: Ù†ÙŠÙˆØ±Ø§Ù„Ø§Ùƒ Ø¨Ù„Øµ Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ (3) Ø¯Ø§Ø¹Ù… Ù„Ù„Ù†Ù…Ùˆ 400 Ø¬Ù…
description_en:
Introducing **Nuralac Plus Milk (3) Growing Up**, an advanced formula meticulously crafted to support the healthy growth and development of toddlers aged 1 to 3 years. This milk provides essential nutrients crucial for their well-being during this vital stage.

â­ Supports healthy growth for children aged 1-3 years.
â­ Balanced formula to meet nutritional needs.
â­ Pleasant taste and easy to digest.
â­ Contains essential vitamins and minerals to support immunity and cognitive development.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nuralac Plus Milk (3) Growing Up**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water before preparing the feed.
â­ Boil clean bottles, nipples, and caps for 5 minutes.
â­ Boil water for 5 minutes and then cool it to approximately 40Â°C.
â­ Add the appropriate number of scoops for your child's age as per the feeding guide on the can.
â­ Use only the scoop provided inside the pack.
â­ Cover the bottle and shake well before feeding.
â­ Always hold your baby during feeding. Leaving the baby unattended may cause choking.
â­ Do not store leftover feed after 2 hours from the start of the feed.
â­ Do not freeze the feed.
â­ Consume the opened can within one month.
â­ Store the can in a cool, dry place at room temperature not exceeding 25Â°C.
â­ Keep away from excessive heat.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nuralac Plus Milk (3) Growing Up**:
â­ Skimmed Milk
â­ Lactose
â­ Vegetable Oils (Palm Olein, Coconut, Soy, High Oleic Sunflower), Partially Hydrolyzed Whey Protein (Cowâ€™s Milk), Corn Syrup Solids, Emulsifier (Soy Lecithin), Potassium Chloride, Calcium Phosphate, Calcium Carbonate, Magnesium Phosphate, Protein Stabilizer (Potassium Citrate)
â­ Choline Chloride, Protein Stabilizer (Sodium Citrate), Sodium Ascorbate, D-Glucose, Sodium Caseinate, Arachidonic Acid (ARA) from Single Cell Oil, Docosahexaenoic Acid (DHA) from Single Cell Oil, Inositol, Taurine, Ferrous Sulfate
â­ DL-Alpha Tocopheryl Acetate, Zinc Sulfate, L-Carnitine, Retinyl Palmitate, Antioxidant (Ascorbyl Palmitate), Cytidine Monophosphate, Niacinamide, Phytomenadione, Ascorbic Acid, Cholecalciferol, Uridine Monophosphate, Calcium Pantothenate, Adenosine Monophosphate, D-Biotin, Cupric Sulfate
â­ Guanosine Monophosphate, Riboflavin, Thiamine Hydrochloride, Pyridoxine Hydrochloride, Manganese Sulfate, Sodium Iodide, Folic Acid, Sodium Selenite, Cyanocobalamin.

#Nuralac #BabyFormula #GrowingUpMilk #ToddlerNutrition #SaudiMoms #KidHealth #InfantCare #FormulaMilk #NuralacPlus #RaisingKids

description_en:
Discover the optimal nutrition for your baby with **Nuralac Baby Milk (1)**, specially formulated to meet the needs of infants from birth to 6 months, serving as a safe and effective alternative when breastfeeding is not achievable.

**Nuralac Baby Milk (1)** offers a complete formula that supports healthy growth and provides your baby with essential nutrients for a strong start in life.

â­ Balanced formula for healthy growth support.
â­ Contains essential vitamins and minerals.
â­ Suitable for infants from birth to 6 months.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nuralac Baby Milk (1)**

Important Note: Breast milk is best for babies. Consult your doctor before using infant formula.
â­ Wash hands thoroughly with soap and water before preparation.
â­ Boil bottle, nipple, and ring for 5 minutes.
â­ Boil water for 5 minutes and then cool it to 40Â°C.
â­ Add the correct number of scoops according to your baby's age, as shown on the back of the can.
â­ Use only the scoop provided in the can.
â­ Cover and shake the bottle well after preparation.
â­ Always hold your baby during feeding. Leaving the baby alone may cause choking.
â­ Do not store the feed for more than 2 hours after the start of feeding.
â­ Do not freeze the feed.
â­ Consume the can within one month of opening.
â­ Store the can in a cool, dry place at room temperature (25Â°C), away from heat.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nuralac Baby Milk (1)**

â­ Lactose, Vegetable Oils (Palm Olein, Coconut, Soy, High Oleic Sunflower).
â­ Skim Milk, Whey Protein (from Cowâ€™s Milk).
â­ Galacto-oligosaccharides (GOS), Emulsifier (Soy Lecithin).
â­ Corn Syrup Solids, Calcium Carbonate, Sodium Ascorbate, Choline Chloride, Potassium Chloride.
â­ Essential vitamins and minerals for healthy growth.

title_ar: Ù†ÙŠÙˆØ±Ø§Ù„Ø§Ùƒ Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ Ø±Ù‚Ù… (2) - 400 Ø¬Ù…: Ø§Ù„ØªØºØ°ÙŠØ© Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø«Ù„Ù‰ Ù„Ù†Ù…Ùˆ Ø·ÙÙ„Ùƒ
description_en:
Introducing **Nuralac baby milk (2)**, the premium follow-up formula designed for healthy infants from 6 to 12 months, serving as an ideal nutritional complement during and after the weaning period. **Nuralac baby milk (2)** features the advanced 'Neura-Complete' system, providing an optimal balance of high-quality proteins essential for healthy growth. It is further fortified with Omega-3 and Omega-6 fatty acids, DHA for visual development, and prebiotic dietary fibers to support your baby's overall well-being and digestive health.

â­ Fortified with Omega-3 and Omega-6 for healthy brain development.
â­ Contains DHA to support visual development.
â­ Enriched with prebiotics to promote digestive health.
â­ Provides balanced nutrition crucial for the developmental stage.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nuralac baby milk (2)**:

â­ Important Note: Breast milk is the best nutrition for infants. Before deciding to use infant formula, consult your pediatrician.
â­ Wash hands thoroughly with soap and water before preparing the feed.
â­ Boil bottles, nipples, and caps for 5 minutes.
â­ Boil water for 5 minutes and let it cool to 40Â°C before mixing.
â­ Add the correct number of scoops for your baby's age as indicated in the feeding guide on the package.
â­ Use only the scoop provided inside the package.
â­ After preparation, cover the bottle and shake well.
â­ Always hold your baby upright while feeding. Leaving your baby unattended during feeding can lead to choking.
â­ Do not store unfinished formula for more than 2 hours.
â­ Do not freeze the prepared feed.
â­ Use the contents of the can within one month of opening.
â­ Store the can in a cool, dry place at room temperature (25Â°C) and away from heat.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nuralac baby milk (2)**:

â­ Lactose, Vegetable Oils (Palm Olein, Coconut, Soy, High Oleic Sunflower), Skimmed Milk, Whey Protein (from Cow's Milk), Galacto-oligosaccharides (GOS), Emulsifier (Soy Lecithin), Corn Syrup Solids, Calcium Carbonate, Ascorbate Sodium, Choline Chloride, Potassium Chloride, D-Glucose, Sodium Caseinate, Arachidonic Acid (ARA) from Single-cell Oil, Docosahexaenoic Acid (DHA) from Single-cell Oil.
â­ Acidity Regulator (Potassium Hydroxide), Magnesium Phosphate, Inositol, Taurine, Ferrous Sulfate, DL-alpha Tocopheryl Acetate, Zinc Sulfate, Cytidine Monophosphate, L-Carnitine, Retinyl Palmitate, Antioxidant (Ascorbyl Palmitate), Niacinamide, Uridine Monophosphate, Vitamin K.
â­ Ascorbic Acid, Cholecalciferol, Adenosine Monophosphate, Calcium Pantothenate, Cupric Sulfate, D-Biotin, Guanosine Monophosphate, Riboflavin, Thiamine Hydrochloride, Pyridoxine Hydrochloride, Manganese Sulfate, Sodium Iodide, Folic Acid, Sodium Selenite, Cyanocobalamin.

#Nuralac #BabyMilk #InfantNutrition #GrowthStage #BabyHealth #SaudiBabies #BabyProducts #FormulaMilk #HealthyGrowth #FollowUpFormula

title_en: Nuralac Baby Milk Lacto-Free 400 gm - Specialized Nutrition for Your Baby

description_en:
Product Description:

Introducing **Nuralac** LF, a specialized lactose-free baby milk formula designed for the dietary management of lactose intolerance and its related symptoms like diarrhea. This formula is meticulously crafted to provide complete nutrition for infants from birth up to one year of age, supporting healthy growth and development. **Nuralac** LF can be used as the sole source of nutrition from birth to 6 months, or as part of a mixed feeding regimen thereafter. Ensure your baby receives optimal care with **Nuralac**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nuralac**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water.
â­ Boil clean bottles, nipples, and rings for 5 minutes.
â­ Boil water for 5 minutes and allow it to cool to approximately 40Â°C (104Â°F).
â­ Add the correct number of scoops for your baby's age as indicated on the feeding chart.
â­ Use only the scoop provided in the can.
â­ After preparation, cover the bottle and shake well.
â­ Always hold your baby during feeding; falling asleep while feeding can cause choking.
â­ Discard any unused prepared formula after 2 hours.
â­ Do not freeze prepared formula.
â­ Consume the contents of the can within one month of opening.
â­ Store the can in a cool, dry place at room temperature (not exceeding 25Â°C).

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nuralac**:
â­ Vegetable oils (palm olein, coconut, soy, high oleic sunflower).
â­ Skimmed milk powder.
â­ Whey protein concentrate (from cow's milk).
â­ Galacto-oligosaccharides (GOS).
â­ Emulsifier (soy lecithin).
â­ Corn syrup solids.
â­ Calcium carbonate.
â­ Sodium ascorbate.
â­ Choline chloride.
â­ Potassium chloride.
â­ D-glucose.
â­ Sodium caseinate.
â­ Arachidonic acid (ARA) from single cell oil.
â­ Docosahexaenoic acid (DHA) from single cell oil.
â­ Acidity regulator (potassium hydroxide).
â­ Magnesium phosphate.
â­ Inositol.
â­ Taurine.
â­ Ferrous sulfate.
â­ DL-alpha tocopheryl acetate.
â­ Zinc sulfate.
â­ Cytidine monophosphate.
â­ L-carnitine.
â­ Retinyl palmitate.
â­ Antioxidant (ascorbyl palmitate).
â­ Niacinamide.
â­ Phytomenadione.
â­ Ascorbic acid.
â­ Cholecalciferol.
â­ Uridine monophosphate.
â­ Calcium pantothenate.
â­ Adenosine monophosphate.
â­ D-biotin.
â­ Cupric sulfate.
â­ Guanosine monophosphate.
â­ Riboflavin.
â­ Thiamine hydrochloride.
â­ Pyridoxine hydrochloride.
â­ Manganese sulfate.
â­ Sodium iodide.
â­ Folic acid.
â­ Sodium selenite.
â­ Cyanocobalamin.

description_en:
Discover **Nuralac Plus Milk (3) Growing Up**, the advanced formula meticulously crafted to support your child's growth and healthy development from 1 to 3 years. **Nuralac Plus Milk (3) Growing Up** provides essential nutrition to promote physical and cognitive development, featuring high-quality ingredients to ensure your child's health and well-being.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nuralac Plus Milk (3) Growing Up**

â­ Wash hands thoroughly with soap and water before preparation.
â­ Sterilize bottles, nipples, and caps by boiling for 5 minutes.
â­ Boil water for 5 minutes, then cool to approximately 40Â°C (104Â°F).
â­ Add the correct number of scoops as indicated in the feeding guide on the can.
â­ Use only the scoop provided inside the can.
â­ Cover the bottle and shake well before feeding.
â­ Always hold your baby upright during feeding to prevent choking.
â­ Discard any unreconstituted product left after 2 hours of feeding.
â­ Do not freeze the powder or prepared formula.
â­ Consume the contents within one month of opening.
â­ Store the can in a cool, dry place at room temperature, away from excessive heat.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nuralac Plus Milk (3) Growing Up**

â­ Skimmed Milk Powder
â­ Lactose, Vegetable oils (palm olein, coconut, soy, high oleic sunflower)
â­ Whey protein concentrate (from cow's milk)
â­ Galacto-oligosaccharides (GOS)
â­ Emulsifier (soy lecithin)
â­ Corn syrup solids, Calcium carbonate, Sodium ascorbate, Choline chloride
â­ Magnesium phosphate, Inositol, Taurine, Ferrous sulfate
â­ Essential Fatty Acids: Arachidonic acid (ARA) and Docosahexaenoic acid (DHA)
â­ Essential vitamins and minerals for comprehensive growth support.

title_ar: Ù†ÙŠÙˆØ±Ø§Ù„Ø§Ùƒ Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ Ø±Ù‚Ù… (2) Ø¹Ø¨ÙˆØ© Ù…Ø²Ø¯ÙˆØ¬Ø© (2*900 Ø¬Ù…)
description_en:
Nuralac 2 is an advanced follow-on milk, specifically designed to meet the nutritional needs of infants from 6 to 12 months old, serving as an ideal part of the diet during and after weaning. It features the advanced Nura-complete nutrition system, providing high-quality protein, along with Docosahexaenoic Acid (DHA), prebiotics, and over 25 essential nutrients to support your baby's growth and development.

â­ Supplemented with HMO for immune support.
â­ Contains Prebiotics to promote digestive health.
â­ Rich in DHA for brain and eye development.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nuralac**:

*   Wash hands thoroughly with soap and water before preparing the feed.
*   Boil bottles, teats, and caps for 5 minutes.
*   Boil water for 5 minutes and allow it to cool to 40Â°C before mixing.
*   Add the correct number of scoops according to your baby's age, using only the scoop provided.
*   After preparation, cover the bottle and shake well.
*   Discard any leftover feed after 2 hours from the start of feeding.
*   Do not freeze prepared feeds.
*   Consume the contents within one month of opening.
*   Store the can in a cool, dry place at room temperature (not exceeding 25Â°C).
*   Keep away from excessive heat.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nuralac**:

*   Lactose, Vegetable Oils (Palm Olein, Coconut, Soy, High Oleic Sunflower).
*   Skim Milk, Whey Protein (from Cow's Milk).
*   Galacto-oligosaccharides (GOS).
*   Cow's Milk Protein.
*   Emulsifier (Soy Lecithin).
*   Other ingredients include: Calcium Citrate, Corn Syrup Solids, Maltodextrin, 2'fucosyllactose, Choline Chloride, Calcium Carbonate, Magnesium Phosphate, Docosahexaenoic Acid (DHA), Potassium Chloride, D-glucose, Sodium Ascorbate, Sodium Caseinate, Protein Stabilizer, Sodium Chloride, Acidity Regulator, Inositol, Ferrous Sulfate, Taurine, Cytidine Monophosphate, Zinc Sulfate, L-carnitine, DL-alpha Tocopheryl Acetate, Retinyl Palmitate, Antioxidant (Ascorbyl Palmitate), Uridine Monophosphate, Niacinamide, Ascorbic Acid, Adenosine Monophosphate, Calcium Pantothenate, Cupric Sulfate, Phytomenadione, Thiamine Hydrochloride, Riboflavin, Inosine Monophosphate, Manganese Sulfate, Pyridoxine Hydrochloride, Guanosine Monophosphate, Folic Acid, Sodium Iodide, Cyanocobalamin, Sodium Selenite, Cholecalciferol, D-biotin.

description_en:
Discover **Nuralac 1**, an advanced baby milk formula designed for newborns up to 6 months when breastfeeding is not possible. Our Nura-complete nutrition system delivers high-quality protein, DHA, prebiotics, and over 25 essential nutrients for healthy growth and development.

Product Features:
â­ Supplemented with HMO to support immunity.
â­ Enriched with prebiotics for digestive health.
â­ Contains DHA for brain and eye development.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nuralac 1**:
â­ For your baby's health, carefully follow the feeding instructions on the back of the can.
â­ Wash hands thoroughly with soap and water. Boil clean bottle, nipple, and cap for 5 minutes.
â­ Boil water for 5 minutes and let it cool to 40Â°C before mixing.
â­ Add the correct number of scoops for your baby's age as per the feeding guide.
â­ Use only the scoop provided inside the can.
â­ After preparation, cover the bottle and shake well before feeding.
â­ Never heat reconstituted product in a microwave.
â­ Discard any unused prepared formula after 2 hours.
â­ Do not freeze prepared formula.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nuralac 1**:
â­ Lactose, vegetable oils (palm olein, coconut, soy, high oleic sunflower), skim milk, whey protein (cowâ€™s milk), galacto-oligosaccharides (GOS), emulsifier (soy lecithin), calcium citrate, maltodextrin, corn syrup solids, 2'fucosyllactose, choline chloride, calcium carbonate, magnesium phosphate, docosahexaenoic acid (DHA) from single cell oil, potassium chloride, D-glucose, sodium caseinate, protein stabilizer (potassium citrate), sodium chloride, sodium ascorbate, acidity regulator (potassium hydroxide), inositol, taurine, ferrous sulfate, cytidine monophosphate, L-carnitine, zinc sulfate, antioxidant (ascorbyl palmitate), DL-alpha tocopheryl acetate, retinyl palmitate, uridine monophosphate, niacinamide, adenosine monophosphate, calcium pantothenate, ascorbic acid, cupric sulfate, phytomenadione, thiamine hydrochloride, riboflavin, inosine monophosphate, manganese sulfate, pyridoxine hydrochloride, guanosine monophosphate, folic acid, sodium iodide, cyanocobalamin, sodium selenite, cholecalciferol, D-biotin.

description_en:
Discover **Nuralac Plus SureGrow 3+ Vanilla 400 gm**, the perfect solution for your child's nutrition from 3 years onwards. This balanced nutritional supplement is rich in essential vitamins and minerals to support your child's healthy growth and development, with a delicious vanilla flavor.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nuralac Plus SureGrow 3+ Vanilla 400 gm**:
â­ To prepare one 240ml serving: Add five level scoops of **Nuralac Plus SureGrow 3+ Vanilla 400 gm** to 200ml of pre-boiled water at 40Â°C.
â­ Ensure the can is tightly closed after each use.
â­ Consume the contents within one month of opening.
â­ Store the can in a cool, dry place at room temperature (not in the refrigerator).
â­ Do not freeze powder and avoid excessive heat.
â­ Never heat reconstituted product in a microwave.
â­ Do not consume if there is any packaging defect.
â­ Consult a doctor for usage longer than 3 months.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nuralac Plus SureGrow 3+ Vanilla 400 gm**:
â­ Skim milk, sucrose, vegetable oils (palm olein, coconut, soy, high oleic sunflower).
â­ Maltodextrin, corn syrup solids, whey protein (cowâ€™s milk), lactose.
â­ Medium-chain triglycerides (MCT) from coconut oil, inulin, fructo-oligosaccharides (FOS).
â­ Emulsifier (soy lecithin), nature-identical vanilla flavour.
â­ Calcium phosphate, protein stabilizer (potassium citrate), calcium carbonate, sodium ascorbate, sodium citrate.
â­ Magnesium phosphate, choline bitartrate, taurine, ferrous sulfate, inositol.
â­ Docosahexaenoic acid (DHA) from single-cell oil, sodium caseinate, niacinamide.
â­ DL-alpha tocopheryl acetate, zinc sulphate, arachidonic acid (ARA) from single-cell oil.
â­ Sodium chloride, L-carnitine, retinyl palmitate, ascorbic acid, cholecalciferol.
â­ Antioxidant (ascorbyl palmitate), phytomenadione, calcium pantothenate, pyridoxine hydrochloride, thiamine hydrochloride.
â­ Cupric sulphate, riboflavin, folic acid, manganese sulfate, D-biotin, sodium iodide.
â­ Sodium selenite, cyanocobalamin.

shortdescription_en: Nuralac Plus SureGrow 3+ Vanilla 400 gm: Complete nutrition to support your child's growth from 3+ years with a delicious vanilla flavor.

title_en: Nuralac Plus Milk (3) Growing Up 250 Ml 6 Pcs
title_ar: Ù†ÙŠÙˆØ±Ø§Ù„Ø§Ùƒ Ø¨Ù„Øµ Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ (3) Ø¯Ø§Ø¹Ù… Ù„Ù„Ù†Ù…Ùˆ 250 Ù…Ù„ 6 Ù‚Ø·Ø¹
description_en:
Discover **Nuralac Plus Milk (3) Growing Up**, the advanced formula specifically designed to support your child's growth from 1 to 3 years. **Nuralac Plus Milk (3) Growing Up** provides the balanced nutrition your child needs during this crucial stage, fortified with essential proteins, vitamins, and minerals to promote their health and development.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nuralac Plus Milk (3) Growing Up**:
â­ Ready to use. Do not add water.
â­ Shake the container well before opening.
â­ Open the cap and pour the contents into a clean, sterilized cup.
â­ Do not store leftover milk within two hours after feeding begins.
â­ Important Note: Breast milk is the best food for infants. Consult your pediatrician before deciding to use infant formula.
â­ Store away from heat. Do not freeze the container. Avoid using the microwave to prepare the feed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nuralac Plus Milk (3) Growing Up**:
â­ Water, skim milk, whole milk, corn syrup solids, sucrose.
â­ Vegetable oils (palm olein, coconut, soy, high oleic sunflower).
â­ Galacto-oligosaccharides (GOS), lactose, inulin, fructo-oligosaccharides (FOS).
â­ Calcium phosphate, emulsifier (soy lecithin), calcium carbonate.
â­ Acidity regulator (potassium hydroxide), sodium citrate, sodium ascorbate.
â­ Magnesium phosphate, choline bitartrate, D-glucose, sodium caseinate.
â­ Nature-identical vanilla flavour, taurine, protein stabilizer (potassium citrate).
â­ Docosahexaenoic acid (DHA) from fish oil, ferrous sulfate.
â­ Sodium chloride, zinc sulphate, niacinamide, choline chloride.
â­ DL-alpha tocopheryl acetate, retinyl palmitate, ascorbic acid, cholecalciferol.
â­ Calcium chloride, antioxidant (ascorbyl palmitate), phytomenadione, calcium pantothenate.
â­ Pyridoxine hydrochloride, cupric sulphate, thiamine hydrochloride, riboflavin.
â­ Folic acid, manganese sulfate, sodium iodide, D-biotin.
â­ Sodium selenite, cyanocobalamin.

#Nuralac #GrowingUpMilk #KidsNutrition #BabyFormula #ChildrensHealth #BabyCare #SaudiArabia #InfantNutrition #MilkFormula #HealthyKids

description_en:
Shop now for **Nuralac Baby Milk Premature**, the advanced nutritional formula specifically designed to support the healthy and complete growth of premature and low birth weight infants. **Nuralac Baby Milk Premature** has been meticulously developed to provide the essential nutrition your baby needs in their early stages, enriched with vital nutrients for proper development.

â­ Balanced and nutritious formula.
â­ Fortified with essential nutrients for brain and vision development.
â­ Easily digestible for baby's comfort.
â­ Ideal for the complete nutrition of newborns.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nuralac Baby Milk Premature**

â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water before preparation.
â­ Boil all feeding utensils (bottle, nipple, cap) for 5 minutes.
â­ Boil water for 5 minutes and let it cool to 40Â°C (104Â°F).
â­ Add the correct number of scoops as indicated in the feeding guide on the can.
â­ Use only the scoop provided in the can.
â­ After adding powder and water, cover the bottle and shake well.
â­ Check the milk's temperature before feeding your baby.
â­ Consume within one month of opening.
â­ Store the can in a cool, dry place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nuralac Baby Milk Premature**

â­ Lactose.
â­ Vegetable oils (palm olein, coconut, soy, high oleic sunflower).
â­ Skimmed milk and whey protein.
â­ Galacto-oligosaccharides (GOS).
â­ Emulsifier (soy lecithin).
â­ Corn syrup solids.
â­ Essential minerals and vitamins including Calcium, Magnesium, Iron, Vitamins A, D, E, K, C, B.
â­ Essential fatty acids like ARA and DHA.

description_en:
Discover the ideal nutrition for your baby with **Nuralac (1)**, the advanced liquid formula specifically designed to meet the needs of newborns from birth up to 6 months, when breastfeeding is not achievable. **Nuralac (1)** provides complete and easily digestible nutrition to support your baby's healthy growth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nuralac (1)**
â­ Important Note: Breast milk is best for babies. Consult your doctor before deciding to use infant formula.
â­ **Nuralac (1)** is ready to feed; do not add water.
â­ Shake the container well before use.
â­ Pour the appropriate amount into a clean, sterilized feeding bottle, following your doctor's instructions.
â­ Discard any unused formula within two hours after feeding begins.
â­ Store away from heat at room temperature (25Â°C).
â­ Do not freeze the container.
â­ Never heat the product in a microwave.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nuralac (1)**
â­ Water, lactose, vegetable oils (palm olein, coconut, soy, high oleic sunflower), skim milk, whey protein (cowâ€™s milk), corn syrup solids, galacto-oligosaccharides (GOS), emulsifier (soy lecithin), sodium ascorbate. Calcium chloride, protein stabilizer (potassium citrate), acidity regulator (potassium hydroxide), choline chloride, D-glucose, sodium caseinate, magnesium phosphate, docosahexaenoic acid (DHA) from single cell oil, sodium chloride, arachidonic acid (ARA) from single cell oil, inositol, taurine, zinc sulfate, DL-alpha tocopheryl acetate. Ferrous sulfate, cytidine monophosphate, antioxidant (ascorbyl palmitate), L-carnitine, retinyl palmitate, uridine monophosphate, niacinamide, phytomenadione, adenosine monophosphate, cholecalciferol, calcium pantothenate, cupric sulfate, guanosine monophosphate, ascorbic acid, D-biotin. Riboflavin, thiamine hydrochloride, pyridoxine hydrochloride, manganese sulfate, folic acid, sodium iodide, sodium selenite, cyanocobalamin.

description_en: **Hansaplast Aqua Protect** offers superior 100% waterproof protection to keep your wounds dry and safe. These adhesive plasters are designed with high flexibility for optimal comfort and strong, long-lasting adhesion, preventing water and bacteria from entering and promoting faster healing. Ideal for daily protection from water during washing, showering, and swimming, they are also suitable for use after minor surgical procedures. The non-stick, light beige wound pad combined with a transparent backing provides a discreet and barely-there look.

description_en:
Say goodbye to foot odor with **Hansaplast Foot Deodorant Spray**. 

Experience superior, long-lasting odor protection with its innovative formula.
â­ Provides effective and continuous protection against unpleasant odors.
â­ Enriched with Octenidine, it effectively prevents Athlete's Foot.
â­ Delivers an extra-fresh sensation that lasts all day, boosting your confidence.
â­ Can be applied to shoes for added freshness.
â­ Dermatologically approved for skin compatibility and is suitable for diabetics.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Hansaplast Foot Deodorant Spray**:
â­ Clean the affected area thoroughly and dry it completely.
â­ Shake the can well before use, then spray onto dry skin from a distance of 15cm.
â­ Specifically spray on the toes for complete coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Hansaplast Foot Deodorant Spray**:
â­ Formula enriched with Octenidine and refreshing ingredients.

#Hansaplast #FootCare #FootDeodorant #AllDayFreshness #HealthyFeet #AthletesFootTreatment #SkinCare #PersonalCare #SaudiArabia #FootMoisturizer

description_en:
Experience superior wound care with **Hansaplast Sensitive Plasters**. These gentle, skin-friendly adhesive strip bandages feature sterile wound dressings for optimal protection. Crafted from a soft, breathable material that adheres securely yet removes painlessly, they are perfect for even the most sensitive skin.

**Hansaplast Sensitive Plasters** are flexible and ideal for covering all types of smaller wounds, including being suitable for diabetics. The non-stick wound pad protects and cushions the wound, promoting healing.

â­ Extra skin-friendly.
â­ Strips made of soft and breathable material for added comfort.
â­ Painless to remove, available in various sizes and colors.
â­ Hypoallergenic wound protection, dermatologically approved for skin compatibility.
â­ Non-stick wound pad protects and cushions the wound.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Hansaplast Sensitive Plasters**:
â­ Available as strips in different sizes and colors that seal all around the wound.
â­ Available as dressing length which can be cut to the ideal size for your wound.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Hansaplast Sensitive Plasters**:
â­ Soft and breathable material.

#Hansaplast #WoundPlaster #WoundCare #SensitiveSkin #MedicalProducts #DiabetesCare #SkinHealth #WoundHealing #Pharmacy #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Hansaplast Water-Resistant Plasters 40 pcs offer superior protection for your everyday wounds. These plasters feature advanced water-resistant technology, ensuring effective sealing against moisture and sweat, keeping your wound clean and dry. The flexible, breathable fabric backing of **Hansaplast** provides exceptional comfort and a secure fit, while the non-stick wound pad cushions and protects. Available in various sizes, **Hansaplast** Universal Plasters are ideal for covering minor injuries like cuts, grazes, and scratches, ensuring appropriate coverage for all your needs.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Hansaplast**:
â­ Gently clean the wound and dry the surrounding skin.
â­ Apply the plaster carefully to avoid contamination.
â­ Change the dressing daily or as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Hansaplast**:
â­ Water-resistant and breathable adhesive strip.
â­ Non-stick wound pad for protection and cushioning.
â­ Flexible material for comfortable wear.

#Hansaplast #Plasters #WoundCare #MedicalSupplies #WaterResistant #SaudiArabia #HealthAndBeauty #SkinCare #FirstAid #EverydayEssentials

description_en:
Make healing a magical experience for your child with **Hansaplast Disney Princess Kids Plasters**. These colorful plasters come in a pack of 20 strips, bringing joy to your little one with beloved Disney Princess characters like Cinderella, Ariel, Aurora, Snow White, or Jasmine. **Hansaplast Disney Princess Kids Plasters** help turn everyday scrapes and cuts from adventures into a gentle and fun experience, helping them forget the tears and get back to playing.

â­ Features 20 colorful plaster strips with Disney Princess designs.
â­ Made from soft, breathable, and skin-friendly material safe for children's delicate skin.
â­ Designed for painless removal and gentle on young skin.
â­ The non-stick wound pad protects and cushions for comfort.
â­ Locks out dirt and bacteria for fast healing.
â­ Strong adhesion ensures the plaster stays in place during play and activities.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Hansaplast Disney Princess Kids Plasters**
â­ Clean and dry the wound thoroughly before applying the plaster.
â­ Carefully apply the plaster, ensuring the wound is fully covered.
â­ Change the plaster regularly, especially after washing hands or if it becomes dirty.
â­ Use as protection for minor cuts and scrapes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Hansaplast Disney Princess Kids Plasters**
â­ Skin-friendly adhesive.
â­ Non-stick wound pad.
â­ Colorful Disney Princess designs.
â­ Soft and breathable materials.

#Hansaplast #KidsPlasters #DisneyPrincess #ChildCare #KidsHealth #SaudiArabia #Health #Skin #Wounds #Treatment

Experience superior flexibility and complete protection for everyday finger wounds with **Hansaplast** Elastic Finger Plasters. â­ Suitable for covering all types of smaller wounds on fingers.

â­ 0% Latex - Product is not made with natural rubber latex.
