Hansaplast Universal Spot plasters offer reliable, waterproof protection for small everyday wounds. These durable, round plasters feature a strong adhesive that keeps them securely in place, while their discreet size and shape make them barely noticeable on your skin. They effectively repel dirt and moisture thanks to their breathable material and non-stick wound pad, ensuring optimal healing conditions.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Hansaplast Universal Spot**:
â­ Ideal for covering everyday wounds like scratches, cuts, and grazes.
â­ Ensure the wound and surrounding skin are clean and dry before application.
â­ Change the plaster regularly for best hygiene and protection.

description_en:
Experience superior wound care with **Hansaplast Plasters Elastic 20 pcs**. These ultra-flexible strip bandages are designed to stretch with your skin's movements, offering unparalleled comfort and a relaxed fit. The strong and durable adhesive of **Hansaplast Plasters Elastic 20 pcs** ensures reliable protection, especially on joints and other movable parts of the body.

Perfect for covering and protecting minor everyday wounds such as cuts, scrapes, and grazes. The non-stick wound pad gently protects and cushions the wound, promoting healing.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Hansaplast Plasters Elastic 20 pcs**:
â­ Clean and dry the wound gently.
â­ Apply the plaster to the wound.
â­ Change the plaster regularly or as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Hansaplast Plasters Elastic 20 pcs**:
â­ Flexible strips made of breathable fabric.
â­ Strong and durable adhesive material.
â­ Non-stick, cushioning wound pad.

description_en:
Introducing **Hansaplast** Elastic Waterproof Plasters, expertly designed to protect your everyday wounds with efficiency and comfort.

These plasters feature a strong, water-resistant adhesive strip, making them ideal for damp or sweaty skin. The flexible fabric backing ensures superior comfort and breathability, while the cushioned wound pad protects and buffers the injury. **Hansaplast** packs come in various sizes to suit all types of wounds, from minor scratches to simple cuts, providing optimal coverage and reliable protection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Hansaplast**:
â­ Gently clean the wound with water and pat the surrounding skin dry.
â­ Apply the plaster without stretching to avoid wrinkles.
â­ Change the plaster daily or as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Hansaplast**:
â­ Flexible and waterproof adhesive strip.
â­ Non-stick wound pad for protection.
â­ Breathable materials for optimal comfort.

#Hansaplast #Plasters #WoundCare #Waterproof #Adhesive #Medical #Health #SaudiArabia #Jeddah #Riyadh

description_en:
Introducing the **Hansaplast** Marvel Avengers Kids Plasters, the ultimate solution for your little heroes' daily scrapes and cuts. Each pack contains 20 vibrant, character-filled plasters featuring beloved Marvel characters, designed to distract and delight your children, turning healing time into a fun adventure.

Be ready to face any scrape or cut with a smile! These colorful and comfortable plasters will help your little ones overcome their tears and get back to playing and having fun in no time.

â­ Safe for kids COLORFUL STRIPS made of SOFT and BREATHABLE material.
â­ PAINLESS removal and gentle on young skin.
â­ The NON-STICK wound pad protects and cushions for comfort.
â­ Dirt and bacteria are locked out for fast HEALING.
â­ The STRONG ADHESION ensures that the plaster stays in place during play.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Hansaplast** Marvel Avengers Kids Plasters:
â­ Clean and dry the wound thoroughly.
â­ Gently apply the plaster, ensuring the wound pad completely covers the injured area.
â­ Change the plaster daily or as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Hansaplast** Marvel Avengers Kids Plasters:
â­ Skin-friendly adhesive material.
â­ Sterile and non-stick wound pad.
â­ Child-safe Marvel colors and character designs.

title_ar: Ù‡Ø§Ù†Ø³Ø§Ø¨Ù„Ø§Ø³Øª Ù„ØµÙ‚Ø§Øª Ø§ÙƒØ³ØªØ±Ø§ - Ø­Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ© ÙØ§Ø¦Ù‚Ø© 16 Ø­Ø¨Ø©
description_en:
Experience unparalleled protection with **Hansaplast Extra Tough** strips, specifically designed for demanding and challenging situations. These plasters feature 100% waterproof strip bandages with a strong and durable adhesive that ensures steadfastness in all conditions. The flexible fabric backing, made from durable and breathable material, provides superior comfort and a relaxed fit. The waterproof and breathable membrane prevents any water from getting trapped around the wound, reducing the risk of infection and promoting quicker healing. The fiber-reinforced pad ensures exceptional adhesive strength, keeping the plaster in place even during strenuous activities like work, hobbies, or household chores.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Hansaplast Extra Tough**:
â­ Gently clean the wound and dry the surrounding skin.
â­ Remove the plaster from its protective backing.
â­ Apply the plaster over the wound, ensuring the wound pad completely covers the injury.
â­ Gently press down on the edges to ensure a secure seal.
â­ Change the plaster daily or as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Hansaplast Extra Tough**:
â­ Durable and breathable fabric for flexibility and comfort.
â­ Waterproof and breathable membrane to keep the wound dry and prevent infection.
â­ Strong and durable adhesive ensures the plaster stays in place.
â­ Fiber-reinforced wound pad for extra protection and cushioning.
â­ Latex-free to minimize allergy risk.

#Hansaplast #MedicalPlasters #WoundCare #WoundProtection #Waterproof #HealthAndBeauty #SaudiArabia #SkinCare #MedicalProducts #SaudiPharmacy

description_en:
Scrapes, cuts, and grazes are part of everyday adventures for children, but **Hansaplast Disney Mickey Mouse & Friends Plasters** turn healing into a cheerful experience! This pack of 20 colorful strip bandages features beloved Disney characters like Mickey Mouse, Minnie, and Pluto, making the recovery process a fun event for your little one.

â­ Make wound care a fun experience with favorite Disney characters.
â­ Made from SOFT, BREATHABLE, and KID-SAFE material.
â­ GENTLE on skin and PAINLESS to remove.
â­ The NON-STICK wound pad protects and cushions for comfort.
â­ DIRT and BACTERIA are locked out for fast HEALING.
â­ STRONG ADHESION ensures the plaster stays in place.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Hansaplast Disney Mickey Mouse & Friends Plasters**:
â­ Gently clean and dry the wound.
â­ Choose the appropriate size plaster.
â­ Apply the plaster gently over the wound, ensuring the edges seal.
â­ Change the plaster regularly, especially if it becomes wet or dirty.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Hansaplast Disney Mickey Mouse & Friends Plasters**:
â­ Non-woven fabric.
â­ Absorbent wound pad.
â­ Skin-friendly adhesive.
â­ Kid-safe color printing.

description_en:
Discover intensive care for your feet with **Hansaplast Dry Foot Moisturizing Cream 100 ml**. This daily cream is specifically designed for rough and dry skin, providing sustainable hydration and a soft skin feeling. With its special formula containing 10% urea, **Hansaplast Dry Foot Moisturizing Cream 100 ml** boosts skin moisture and acts as a protective barrier. It helps protect your feet from cracks and prevents the formation of rough skin. It absorbs quickly, leaving the skin soft and supple. Its skin compatibility is confirmed, dermatologically recommended, and suitable for diabetics.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Hansaplast Dry Foot Moisturizing Cream 100 ml**
â­ Gently massage into the skin.
â­ Apply twice a day.
â­ Apply regularly to maintain soft and smooth feet.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Hansaplast Dry Foot Moisturizing Cream 100 ml**
â­ Contains 10% urea to increase skin moisture.
â­ Moisturizing and fast-absorbing formula.
â­ Provides an instant feeling of softness.
â­ Nourishes the skin and protects it from dryness.
â­ Suitable for daily use.

#FootCare #FootMoisturizer #MoisturizingCream #Hansaplast #Skincare #SoftSkin #IntensiveHydration #DrySkinTreatment #DiabeticFoot #FootHealth

title_ar: Ù‡Ø¬ÙŠØ² Ø¹Ù†Ø§ÙŠØ© ÙØ§Ø¦Ù‚Ø© Ù…Ù‚Ø§Ø³ 6 Ø¬Ø§Ù…Ø¨Ùˆ 56 Ø­ÙØ§Ø¶Ø©
description_en:
Product Description:

Experience superior dryness and ultimate comfort for your little one with **Huggies Extra Care Diapers** Size 6 Jumbo. These premium diapers are crafted to provide unparalleled softness and protection for your baby's delicate skin, ensuring they stay dry and happy all day long.

â­ Up to 12 hours of dryness thanks to advanced triple absorbent channels.
â­ Soft, breathable materials to protect against skin irritation and rashes.
â­ Stretchy waistband for a perfect fit and freedom of movement.
â­ Fragrance-free, latex-free, and chlorine-free for gentle care of sensitive skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Huggies Extra Care Diapers**:
â­ Help the baby lie on a flat surface.
â­ Slowly hold the ankles of the baby and lift the bottom.
â­ Gently push the tape-style diaper below the baby's bottom.
â­ Keep the colored face of the diaper faced upwards to snuggle the diaper perfectly around the baby.
â­ Seal it with the tape of the diaper for optimum fit and comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Huggies Extra Care Diapers**:
â­ Super absorbent core for exceptional dryness.
â­ Breathable outer cover.
â­ Soft, stretchy waistband.
â­ Re-sealable adhesive tabs.
â­ Free from fragrances, latex, and chlorine bleach.

#Huggies #HuggiesExtraCare #BabyDiapers #Skincare #DrynessComfort #Newborn #SaudiMoms #BabyEssentials #BabyGear #SensitiveSkin

title_ar: Ù‡Ø¬ÙŠØ² ÙƒÙ„ÙˆØª Ù…Ù‚Ø§Ø³ 6ØŒ Ø¹Ø¨ÙˆØ© Ø¬Ø§Ù…Ø¨Ùˆ (40 ÙƒÙ„ÙˆØª) - Ø±Ø§Ø­Ø© ÙˆØ­Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ© ÙØ§Ø¦Ù‚Ø© Ù„Ø·ÙÙ„Ùƒ
description_en:
Say goodbye to diaper change struggles with **Huggies Pants Size 6**! This jumbo pack includes 40 pants specifically designed for maximum comfort and ease for both moms and their active toddlers. **Huggies Pants Size 6** are incredibly easy to put on and take off, making diaper changes a quick and hassle-free experience.

With **Huggies Pants Size 6**, enjoy unparalleled protection thanks to their double leak guards and a dry touch layer that ensures your baby's skin stays soft and dry for hours. The wetness indicator provides a clear alert when it's time for a change, ensuring continuous comfort for your little one. These pants are designed to be exceptionally gentle on your baby's delicate skin, being free from perfumes, latex, and chlorine to minimize the risk of irritation.

â­ Easy to put on and take off for quick, convenient changes.
â­ Double leak guards for extra protection against leaks.
â­ Dry touch layer keeps baby's skin dry and comfortable.
â­ Wetness indicator for easy tracking of change times.
â­ Free from perfumes, latex, and chlorine; gentle on sensitive skin.
â­ Perfect fit and superior comfort for your active baby.
â­ Easy to pack and store, ideal for diaper bags.
â­ Trusted quality from Huggies since 1968.
â­ Perfect for moms seeking the best care for their baby.
â­ Provides peace of mind with every diaper change.

description_en:
Give your baby the ultimate comfort and protection with **Huggies Extra Care**.

**Huggies Extra Care** diapers feature superior absorbency technology that keeps your baby's skin dry for up to 12 hours, thanks to three absorbent channels and soft cushions that instantly lock away wetness. The flexible waistband and stretchy sides provide a perfect fit and freedom of movement for your active baby, whether they're crawling, walking, or sleeping.

These diapers are meticulously designed for your baby's delicate skin, being free from fragrances, latex, and chlorine bleach, which minimizes the risk of skin irritation and diaper rash. The soft, breathable materials ensure your baby's skin stays healthy and dry.

**ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for Huggies Extra Care**

â­ Help the baby lie on a flat surface.
â­ Gently hold the baby's ankles and lift the bottom.
â­ Place the taped portion of the diaper under the baby's bottom.
â­ Keep the colored side of the diaper facing backward to wrap the diaper snugly around the baby.
â­ Seal it with the diaper's tape for an optimal fit and comfort.

**ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of Huggies Extra Care**

â­ Super absorbent materials.
â­ Triple absorbent channels.
â­ Elastic and flexible waistband.
â­ Soft and breathable outer layer.
â­ Fragrance-free.
â­ Latex-free.
â­ Chlorine bleach-free.

Specially designed for your baby's sensitive skin, these diapers offer unparalleled protection thanks to their three absorbent channels and soft cushions. A flexible, stretchy waistband ensures a perfect fit and freedom of movement for your active baby, keeping their skin dry and healthy, free from irritation or rash. **Huggies** provides you with absolute peace of mind with superior care for your baby's skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Huggies**:
â­ Help the baby lie on a flat surface.
â­ Slowly hold the ankles of the baby and lift the bottom.
â­ Gently push the tape-style diaper below the baby's bottom.

â­ Flexible waistband for a perfect fit and freedom of movement.
â­ Made with breathable materials to reduce the risk of diaper rash.
â­ Fragrance-free, latex-free, and chlorine-free for sensitive skin care.
â­ Soft and gentle fabric for your baby's delicate skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Huggies Extra Care Diapers**:
â­ Help the baby lie on a flat surface.
â­ Slowly hold the baby's ankles and lift the bottom.
â­ Place the diaper with the sticky part facing the back, under the baby's bottom.
â­ Face the colored part forward, then wrap the diaper snugly around the baby's body.
â­ Seal the diaper with the designated adhesive tapes for a comfortable fit.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Huggies Extra Care Diapers**:
â­ High-quality absorbent materials.
â­ Breathable outer layer.
â­ Flexible waistband.
â­ Re-sealable adhesive tabs.
â­ Fragrance-free.
â­ Latex-free.
â­ Chlorine bleach-free.

description_en:
Ensure ultimate comfort and dryness for your little one with **Huggies** Size 5 Mega Pack.

These diapers offer superior protection for sensitive skin, with a design that guarantees maximum absorbency and dryness for up to 12 hours. **Huggies** feature flexible stretchy sides that adapt to your active baby's movements, providing them with freedom to move.

DRYNESS AND COMFORT: Keeps your baby's skin dry and protected from rashes all day long.
SKIN CARE: Gentle formula for sensitive skin, free from fragrances and harsh chemicals.
HIGHLY ABSORBANT: Three absorbent channels evenly distribute wetness and keep skin dry.
STRETCHY WAISTBAND: Perfect fit and freedom of movement for your active baby.

description_en:
Discover ultimate comfort with **Huggies** Size (4+) Mega Pack. These diapers are meticulously designed to ensure your baby stays dry and comfortable all day long, keeping their skin soft and healthy. Featuring advanced absorption technology that prevents leaks for up to 12 hours, and flexible elastic sides for a perfect fit and complete freedom of movement for your active baby. **Huggies** guarantees optimal protection and the softness your baby's sensitive skin deserves.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Huggies**:
â­ Help the baby lie on a flat surface.
â­ Slowly hold the ankles of the baby and lift the bottom.
â­ Gently push the tape-style diaper below the baby's bottom.
â­ Keep the colored face of the diaper faced upwards to snuggle the diaper perfectly around the baby.
â­ Seal it with the tape of the diaper for optimum fit and comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Huggies**:
â­ Soft, breathable materials for skin comfort.
â­ Three absorbent channels for rapid wetness absorption.
â­ Soft cushions that absorb wetness in seconds.
â­ Flexible elastic waistband for maximum comfort.
â­ Free from fragrances, latex, and chlorine bleach for sensitive skin care.
â­ Suitable for babies weighing 10-16 kg.
